GSP33brssgo3u:331: ākasmikatvāsaṃbhavādanuśayasadbhāvaṃ sūcayati, abhyudayapratyavāyayoḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛtahetutvasya sāmānyataḥ śāstreṇāvagamitvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:332: smṛtirapi 'varṇā āśramāśca svakarmaniṣṭhāḥ pretya karmaphalamanubhūya tataḥ śeṣeṇa viśiṣṭadeśajātikularūpāyuḥśrutavṛttasukhamedhaso janma pratipadyante' iti sānuśayānāmevāvarohaṃ darśayati - kaḥ punaranuśayo nāmeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:333: kecittāvadāhuḥ - svargārthasya karmaṇo bhuktaphalasyāvaśeṣaḥ kaścidanuśayo nāma bhāṇḍānusārisnehavat
GSP33brssgo3u:334: yathāhi snehabhāṇḍaṃ ricyamānaṃ na sarvātmanā ricyate bhāṇḍānusāryeva kaścitsnehaśeṣo 'vatiṣṭhate tathānuśayo 'pīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:341: yathā kila kaścitsevakaḥ sakalaiḥ sevopakaraṇai rājakulamupasṛpaścirapravāsātparikṣīṇavahūpakaraṇaśchatrapādukādimātrāvaśeṣo na rājakule 'vasthātuṃ śaknoti /
GSP33brssgo3u:346: na svargaphalasya karmaṇo nikhilasya bhuktaphalatvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:348: svargārthaṃ kila karma svargasthasyaiva svargaphalaṃ nikhilaṃ na janayati svagracyutasyāpi kañcitphalaleśaṃ janayatīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:352: natviha tathā svargaphalasya karmaṇo leśānuvṛttirdṛśyate nāpi kalpayituṃ śakyate svargaphalatvaśāstravirodhāt
GSP33brssgo3u:356: yadihi yena sukṛtena karmaṇeṣṭādinā svargamanvabhūvaṃstasyaiva kaścidekadeśo 'nuśayaḥ kalpyeta tato ramaṇīya evaiko 'nuśayaḥ syānna viparītaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:361: yaduktaṃ yatkiñcetyaviśeṣaparāmarśātsarvasyeha kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalopabhogenāntaṃ prāpya niranuśayā avarohantīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:364: yatkiñcidiha kṛtamāmuṣmikaphalaṃ karmārabdhabhogaṃ tatsarvaṃ phalopabhogena kṣapayitveti gamyate
GSP33brssgo3u:365: yadapyuktaṃ prāyaṇamaviśeṣādanārabdhaphalaṃ kṛtsnameva karmābhivyanakti tatra kenacitkarmaṇāmuṣmiṃlloke phalamārabhyate kenacidasminnityatvaṃ pratyuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:368: yathaiva tarhi prākprayāṇādārabdhaphalena karmaṇā pratibaddhasyetarasya vṛttyudbhavānupapattirityevaṃ prāyaṇakāle 'pi viruddhaphalasyānekasya karmaṇo yugapatphalārambhāsaṃbhavādbalavatā pratibaddhasya durbalasya vṛttyuddhavānupapatitiriti /
GSP33brssgo3u:369: nahyanārabdhaphalatvasāmānyena jātyantaropabhogyaphalamapyanekaṃ karmaikasminprāyaṇe yugapadabhivyaktaṃ sadekāṃ jātimārabhata iti śakyaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:371: nāpi kasyacitkarmaṇaḥ prāyaṇe 'bhivyaktiḥ kasyaciduccheda iti śakyate
GSP33brssgo3u:375: smṛtirapi viruddhaphalena karmaṇā pratibaddhasya karmāntarasya ciramavasthānaṃ darśayati- 'kadācitsukṛtaṃ karma kūcasthamiha tiṣṭhati //
GSP33brssgo3u:377: yadi ca kṛtsnamanārabdhaphalaṃ karmaikasminprāyaṇe 'bhivyaktaṃ sadekāṃ jātimārabheta tataḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:381: naca dharmādharmayoḥ svarūpaphalasādhanādisamadhigame śāstrādatiriktaṃ kāraṇaṃ śakyaṃ saṃbhāvayatum
GSP33brssgo3u:382: naca dṛṣṭaphalasya karmaṇaḥ kārīryādeḥ prāyaṇamabhivyañjakaṃ saṃbhavatītyavyāpikāpīyaṃ prāyaṇasyābhivyañjakatvakalpanā
GSP33brssgo3u:385: yathāhi pradīpaḥ samāne 'pi saṃnidhāne sthūlaṃ rūpamabhivyanakti na sūkṣmam /
GSP33brssgo3u:386: evaṃ prāyaṇaṃ samāne 'pyanārabdhaphalasya karmajātasya prāptāvasaratve balavataḥ karmaṇo vṛttimudbhāvayati na durbalasyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:400: tat tatrāvarohatāṃ jīvānāṃ madhye iha karmabhūmau ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ puṇyakarmaṇaḥ iti yat tat ābhyāśoha avaśyaṃ hītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:405: yathetamityārabhya śvādiyonimityantaṃ vākyaṃ yāvattāvadāmnāyata iti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo3u:406: atra yāvatsaṃpātamiti viśeṣaṇādramaṇīyacaraṇā iti vākyācca saṃśayamāha-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo3u:407: anuśayaḥ karma, atra pūrvapakṣe karmābhāvenāgateraniyamādvairāgyādārḍhyaṃ, siddhānte karmasattvenāgatiniyamādvairāgyadārḍhyamiti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:408: teṣāmiṣṭādikāriṇāṃ yadā tatkarma paryavaiti viparikṣīṇaṃ bhavati tadā punarāvartanta iti śrutyantareṇāpi kṛtsrakarmaṇaścandraloke bhuktatvamucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:410: ayaṃ naro yatkiñcidiha loke karma karoti tasyāntaṃ phalaṃ paraloke prāpya karmārthaṃ punarāyātīti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:416: tat tatrāvarohatāṃ jīvānāṃ madhye ye kecidiha karmabhūmau ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ puṇyakarmāṇaḥ puṇyayonibhāja iti yat tat abhyāśo ha avaśyaṃ hītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:419: 'puṇyo vai puṇyena karma bhavati pāpaḥ pāpena'ityādiśāstreṇa
GSP33brssgo3u:421: tataśca janmārabya dṛṣṭo bhogaḥ karmahetukaḥ bhogatvāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:424: smṛtavāśramāḥ āśramiṇaḥ pretya mṛtvā lokāntare karmaphalaṃ bhuktvā tataḥ śeṣeṇa bhuktādanyena karmaṇā anuśayākhyena punarjanma pratipadyante iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:425: viśiṣṭā deśādayo medhāntā daśa guṇā yeṣu te tathoktāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:428: kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ svarge bhoge sati bhuktasya karmaṇo leśo 'nuśayastadvānavarohati bhāṇḍe snehaleśasya dṛṣṭatvāt, tataḥ śeṣeṇeti smṛteścetyekadeśivyākhyāmāha-kecidityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:430: nanu bhoganāśyatvāt karmaṇo leśo na yuktaḥ iti śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:431: kṛtsnakarmaṇo bhoge jāte nāśaḥ syāt, natu bhogo jāta iti parihārārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:441: kṣapayitvā punarāgacchantīti prāpyantamiti vākyena gamyata iti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo3u:443: yatkiñceti yāvatsaṃpātamiti ca sāmānyaśabdayorāmuṣmikaviṣayatvena saṅkoco nyāyya iti bhāvaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:449: ārabdhavadanārabdhasyāpi balavataḥ pratibandhakatvānna sarvakarmaṇaḥ phaladānāyābhivyaktiriti samādhatte-yatheti /
GSP33brssgo3u:451: astu tarhi durbalasya karmaṇo nāśa ityata āha-nāpīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:452: nābhuktaṃ kṣīyate karmetyekānta utsargaḥ sa ca prāyaścitabrahmajñānadhyānairbādhyate na maraṇamātraṇetyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:463: kiñca vyañjakatve 'pi maraṇasya kiṃ sarvakarmavyañjakatvaṃ kalpyate uta yatkiñcitkarmavyañjakatvam
GSP33brssgo3u:466: rūpāṇāṃ pradīpavat, maraṇaṃ na kasyacidapi karmaṇo vayañjakaṃ kintu
GSP33brssgo3u:471: evaṃ sarvakarmasaṅgha ekajanmārambhaka ityaikabhavikaḥ karmāśaya iti
GSP33brssgo3u:477: avarohamārga itthaṃ śrūyate-'tasmin yāvatsaṃpātamuṣitvā athaitamevādhvānaṃ punarnivartante yathetamākāśamākaśādvāyuṃ vāyurbhūtvā dhūmo bhavati dhūmo bhūtvābhraṃ bhūtvā megho bhavati bhūtvā pravarṣati
GSP33brssgo3u:478: ta iha vrīhiyavā oṣadhivanaspatayastilamāṣā iti jāyante ato vai khalu durniṣprapataraṃ yo yo hyannamatti yo retaḥ siñcati tadbhūya eva bhavati tadya iha ramaṇīyacaraṇā ramaṇīyāṃ yonimāpadyante'iti dhūmādyadhvanā yathetaṃ yathāgataṃ tathetamadhvānaṃ punarāyantītyuktvā dhūmādirūpapitṛmārgastharātryādikaṃ noktamadhikaṃ cābhrādikamuktamiti matvā sūtrakṛtoktaṃ yathetamanevaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:490: śrutiśca karmācaraṇe bhedena vyapadiśati- 'yathākārī yathācārī tathā bhavati' (bṛ. 4.4.5) iti, 'yānyanavadyāni karmāṇi tāni sevitavyāni no
GSP33brssgo3u:491: itarāṇi, yānyasmākaṃ sucaritāni tāni tvayopasyāni' (tai. 1.11.2) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo3u:498: anugrahaśca jñānaṃ ca śīlametadvidurbudhāḥ'iti smṛtāvuktāvadrohādayaḥ śāstrārthajñānarūpaṃ śīlaṃ sarvakarmāṅgamuktaṃ tadbodhakaṃ caraṇapadamaṅginaḥ śrautādikarmaṇo lakṣakaṃ, karmaṇa evottarāvasthā dharmādharmākhyāpūrvamiti karmalakṣaṇayaiva tadabhinnāpūrvākhyānuśayasiddhiriti kārṣṇājinimatam //9//
GSP33brssgo3u:505: nanu śīlasyaiva śrautasya vihitapratiṣddhasya sādhvasādhurūpasya śubhāśubhayonyāpattiḥ phalaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssgo3u:511: nahi sadācārahīnaḥ kaścidadhikṛtaḥ syāt- 'ācārahīnaṃ na punanti vedāḥ'
GSP33brssgo3u:513: iṣṭādau hi karmajāte phalamārabhamāṇe tadapekṣa evācārastatraiva kañcidatiśayamārapsyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:517: nahi padbhyāṃ palāyituṃ pārayamāṇo jānubhyāṃ raṃhitumarhatīti // 10 //
GSP33brssgo3u:519: caraṇaśabdavācyasyaiva grahaṇasaṃbhavānna lakṣaṇā yukteti śaṅkitvaiva brūte-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:523: vedāstadarthakarmāṇyācāraṃ vinā na phalantīti smṛtyā śīlasya karmāṅgatvānna pṛthakphalāpekṣā, aṅgiphalenārthavattvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:525: aṅgasya phalāsaṃbhavena mukhyārthasyācārasya grahaṇāyogāllakṣaṇā yukteti samādhānārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:526: yadyācārasya snānādivat puruṣasaṃskāratayā puruṣārthatvaṃ tadāpyavirodha ityāha-puruṣārthatve 'pīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:528: astu tarhi śīlakhyācārādeva yonyāpattirityāśaṅkya 'puṇyo vai puṇyena karmaṇā'ityādi śrutyā virodhānnaivamityāha-karma ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:533: bādaristvācāryaḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛte eva caraṇaśabdena pratyāyyete iti manyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:535: tathāhi- aviśeṣeṇa karmamātre caratiḥ prayujyamāno dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:536: yo hīṣṭādilakṣaṇaṃ puṇyaṃ karma karoti taṃ laukikā ācakṣate dharmaṃ caratyeṣa mahātmeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:539: tasmādramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ praśastakarmaṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā ninditakarmāṇa iti nirṇayaḥ // 11 //
GSP33brssgo3u:541: yadyapyakrodhādirūpaṃ śīlaṃ sādhāraṇadharmātmakaṃ viśeṣarūpāt karmaṇo 'bhinnaṃ tathāpi caraṇācāraśabdau karmavācināveva na śīlavācakāviti na
GSP33brssgo3u:547: atastatsamabhivyāhṛtaḥ karmasāmānyavācako yathākārīti śabdastaditaraviśeṣaparaḥ evamanavadyāni karmāṇīti sāmānyataḥ, asmākaṃ sucaritānīti viśeṣa iti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:555: ye tvitare 'niṣṭādikāriṇaste 'pi kiṃ candramasaṃ gacchantyuta na gacchantīti cintyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:556: tatra tāvadāhuḥ - iṣṭādikāriṇa eva candramasaṃ gacchantītyetanna /
GSP33brssgo3u:559: ethāhyaviśeṣeṇa kauṣītakinaḥ samāmananti- 'ye vai ke cāsmāllokātprayanti
GSP33brssgo3u:563: iṣṭādikāriṇāmitareṣāṃ ca samānagatitvaṃ na yuktamiti cet /
GSP33brssgo3u:566: evaṃ puṇyātmanāṃ gatyāgaticintayā vairāgyaṃ nirūpya pāpināṃ taccintayā
GSP33brssgo3u:569: śruteśca saṃśaye prathamādhikaraṇena siddhaniyamākṣepasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-tatretyādinā
GSP33brssgo3u:570: yamarājaṃ pāpijanānāṃ samyaggamyaṃ, haviṣā prīṇayateti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:571: pūrvapakṣe puṇyavatāmeva candragatiriti niyamābhāvāt puṇyavaiyarthyaṃ pāpādvairāgyādārḍhyaṃ ceti phalaṃ, siddhānte pāpināṃ candralokadarśanamapi nāstīti puṇyārthavattvaṃ vairāgyadārḍhyaṃ ceti phalam /
GSP33brssgo3u:583: yathā kaścidvṛkṣamārohati puṣpaphalopādānāyaiva na niṣprayojanaṃ nāpi patanāyaiva /
GSP33brssgo3u:586: te tu saṃyamanaṃ yamālayamavagāhya svaduṣkṛtānurūpā yāmīryātanā anubhūya punarevemaṃ lokaṃ pratyavaronti /
GSP33brssgo3u:589: tathāhi yamavacanasarūpā śrutiḥ prayatāmaniṣṭādikāriṇāṃ yamavaśyatāṃ darśayati- 'na sāṃparāyaḥ pratibhāti bālaṃ pramādyantaṃ vittamohena mūḍham
GSP33brssgo3u:590: ayaṃ loko nāsti para iti mānī punaḥ punarvaśamāpadyate me' (kaṭha. 2.6)
GSP33brssgo3u:595: saṃyamane yamaloke yamakṛtā yātanā anubhūyāvarohantītyevamārohāvarohāviti yojanā sūtrasya jñeyā /
GSP33brssgo3u:597: samyak parastātprāpyata iti saṃparāyaḥ paralokaḥ tadupāyaḥ sāṃparāyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:598: bālamajñaṃ, viśeṣato vittarāgeṇa mūḍhaṃ mohātpramādaṃ kurvantaṃ prati na bhāti /
GSP33brssgo3u:599: sa ca bālo 'yaṃ strīvittādiloko 'sti na paraloko 'stīti mānī /
GSP33brssgo3u:601: pāpināṃ yamavaśyatāvādiviśeṣaśrutismṛtibalāt'ye vai ke ca'ityaviśeṣaśrutiriṣṭādikāriviṣayatvena vyākhyeyeti bhāvaḥ //13//
GSP33brssgo3u:605: apica manuvyāsaprabhṛtayaḥ śiṣṭāḥ saṃyamane pure yamāyattaṃ kapūyakarmavipākaṃ smaranti nāciketopākhyānādiṣu sūtratrayasya bhāṣyaṃ subodham //14 // //15 // //16//
GSP33brssgo3u:609: apica sapta narakā rauravapramukhā duṣkṛtaphalopabhogabhūmitvena smaryante paurāṇikaiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:615: yāvatā teṣu rauravādiṣvanye citraguptādayo nānādhiṣṭhātāraḥ smaryanta iti
GSP33brssgo3u:619: yamaprayuktā eva hi te citraguptādayo 'dhiṣṭhātāraḥ smaryante // 16 //
GSP33brssgo3u:623: pañcāgnividyāyām 'vettha yathāsau loko na saṃpūryate' (chā. 5.3.3) ityasya praśnasya prativacanāvasare śrūyate- 'athaitayoḥ pathorna katareṇacana tānīmāni kṣudrāṇyasakṛdāvartīni bhūtāni bhavanti jāyasva mriyasvetyetattṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ tenāsau loko na saṃpūryate' (chā.
GSP33brssgo3u:628: vidyākarmaṇī hi devayānapitṛyāṇayoḥ pathoḥ pratipattau prakṛte /
GSP33brssgo3u:629: 'tadya itthaṃ viduḥ' iti vidyā tayā pratipattavyo devayānaḥ panthāḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:631: 'iṣṭāpūrte dattam' (chā. 5.10.1,3) iti karma tena pratipattavyaḥ pitṛyāṇaḥ panthāḥ prakīrtitaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:633: etaduktaṃ bhavati- ye na vidyāsādhanena devayāne patyadhikṛtā nāpi karmaṇā pitṛyāṇe teṣāmeṣa kṣudrajantulakṣaṇo 'sakṛdāvartī tṛtīyaḥ panthā bhavatīti
GSP33brssgo3u:636: te 'pi candrabimbamāruhya tato 'varuhya kṣudrajantutvaṃ pratipatsyanta iti
GSP33brssgo3u:639: apica sarveṣu prayatsu candralokaṃ prāpnuvatsvasau lokaḥ prayadbhiḥ saṃpūryetetyataḥ praśnaviruddhaṃ prativacanaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:640: tathāhi prativacanaṃ dātavyaṃ yathāsau loko na saṃpūryate /
GSP33brssgo3u:646: sthānaṃ tenāsau loko na saṃpūryate' (chā. 5.10.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:651: ye vai kecidadhikṛtā asmāllokātprayanti candramasameva te sarve gacchantīti // 17 //
GSP33brssgo3u:656: etayorvidyākarmaṇoḥ pathidvayasādhanayoranyatareṇāpi sādhanena ye narā na yuktāste janmamaraṇāvṛttirūpatṛtīyamārgasthāni bhūtāni bhavanti,
GSP33brssgo3u:657: kriyāvṛttau loṭ, tena pāpināṃ candragatyabhāvāccandraloko na saṃpūryata iti śrutyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:660: apica pāpināṃ candragatau asau lokaḥ saṃpūryeta 'ataśca na
GSP33brssgo3u:664: avaroha eva tṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ śrutyuktamityata āha-avarohasyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:673: na tṛtīye sthāne dehalābhāya pañcasaṃkhyāniyama āhutīnāmādartavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:675: tathāhyantareṇaivāhutisaṃkhyāniyamaṃ varṇitena prakāreṇa tṛtīyasthānaprāptirupalabhyate 'jāyasva mriyasvetyetattṛtīyaṃ sthānam'
GSP33brssgo3u:677: apica 'pañcamyāmāhutāvāpaḥ puruṣavacaso bhavanti' (chā. 5.3.3) iti manuṣyaśarīrahetutvenāhutisaṃkhyā saṃkīrtyate na
GSP33brssgo3u:679: apica pañcamyāmāhutāvapāṃ puruṣavacastvamupadiśyate nāpañcamyāmāhutau puruṣavacastvaṃ pratiṣidhyate, vākyasya dvyarthatādoṣāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:680: tatra yeṣāmārohāvarohau saṃbhavatasteṣāṃ pañcamyāmāhutau deha udbhaviṣyati
GSP33brssgo3u:693: dhṛṣṭadyumnādīnāṃ tu yoṣitpuruṣaviṣaye dve apyāhutī na staḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:695: balākāpyantareṇaiva retaḥsekaṃ garbhaṃ dhatta iti lokarūḍhiḥ // 19 //
GSP33brssgo3u:701: apica caturvidhe bhūtagrāme jarāyujāṇḍajasvedajodbhijjalakṣaṇe svedajodbhijjayorantareṇaiva grāmyadharmamutpattidarśanādāhutisaṃkhyānādaro bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:704: 'aṇḍajāni ca jarāyujāni ca svedajāni codbhijjāni ca
GSP33brssgo3u:709: nanu 'teṣāṃ khalveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ trīṇyeva bījāni bhavanti aṇḍajaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:711: atra trividha eva bhūtagrāmaḥ śrūyate kathaṃ caturvidhatvaṃ bhūtagrāmasya pratijñātamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:714: 'āṇḍajaṃ jīvajamujadbhijam' (chā. 6.3.1) ityatra tṛtīyenodbhijjaśabdenaiva svedajopasaṃgrahaḥ kṛtaḥ pratyetavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:716: sthāvarodbhedāttu vilakṣaṇo jaṅgamodbheda ityanyatra svedajodbhijjayorbhedavāda ityavirodhaḥ FN: saṃśokajaṃ svedajam /
GSP33brssgo3u:717: anayā śrutyā cāturvidhyaṃ kathamuktaṃ śrutyantare trīṇyevetyavadhāraṇavirodhāditi śaṅkottaratvena sūtramādatte-nanvityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:718: jīvajaṃ jarāyujaṃ manuṣyādi, bhūmimudbhidya jāyate vṛkṣādikaṃ, udakaṃ bhittvā jāyate yūkādi jaṅgamamiti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:727: tatreyamavarohaśrutirbhavati- 'athaicamevādhvānaṃ punarnivartante yathetamākāśamākāśādvāyuṃ vāyirbhūtvā dhūmo bhavati dhūmo bhūtvābhraṃ bhavatyabhraṃ bhūtvā megho bhūtvā pravarṣati' (chā. 5.10.5) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:735: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - ākāśādisāmyaṃ pratipadyanta iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:736: candramaṇḍale yadaṃmayaṃ śarīramupabhogārthamārabdhaṃ tadupabhogakṣaye sati pravilīyamānaṃ sūkṣmamākāśasamaṃ bhavati tato vāyorvaśameti tato dhūmādibhiḥ saṃpṛcyata iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:748: evaṃ pāpināṃ gatyāgatī vicārya saṃpratīṣṭādikāriṇāmavarohe viśeṣamāha-sābhāvyāpattirūpapatteḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:750: nivṛttāścānuśayinaḥ karmānte drutadehā ākāśaṃ gatā ākāśasadṛśā bhavanti
GSP33brssgo3u:751: ākāśasādṛśyānantaraṃ piṇḍīkṛtā atisūkṣmaliṅgopahitāḥ vāyunetastataśca nīyamānā vāyusamā bhavanti
GSP33brssgo3u:752: so 'nuśayī saṃgho vāyusamo bhūtvā dhūmasaṃgatastatsamo bhavati,
GSP33brssgo3u:754: apo bibhartītyabhraṃ, mehati siñcatīti vṛṣṭikartā meghastatsamo bhūtvā varṣadhārādvārā pṛthivīṃ praviśya vrīhiyavādirūpo bhavatīti siddhāntagatyā śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:755: pūrvottarayuktidvayaṃ saṃśyabījaṃ mantavyaṃ, pūrvatra mārgadvayamuktvā tṛtīyatvokteryuktaṃ sthānaśabdasya mārgalakṣakatvamiha tu dugdhaṃ dadhi
GSP33brssgo3u:756: bhavatītyādiprayoge bhavatiśrutervikārasvarūpāpattau mukhyatvāt sādṛśyāpattilakṣaṇābījaṃ nāstīti pratyudāharaṇasaṅgatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:759: samāno bhāvo dharmo yasya tadbhāvaḥ sābhāvyaṃ sāmyamiti sūtrapadārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:777: tathāhi vrīhyādibhāvāpatteranantaraṃ viśinaṣṭi- 'ato vai khalu durniṣprapataram'
GSP33brssgo3u:781: tadatra duḥkhaṃ niṣprapatanaṃ pradarśayanpūrveṣu sukhaṃ niṣprapatanaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:786: uktaṃ sādṛśyamupajīvya loke gantṛṇāṃ cirāciragatidarśanātsaṃśayaṃ vadan
GSP33brssgo3u:788: aniyamāt kadācidvilambena yonyāpattiriti pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ, siddhānte tu vrīhīyavādibhāvādanuśayināṃ vilambena nirgamanamiti
GSP33brssgo3u:790: nanvākāśādiṣvanuśayināṃ sukhaṃ vrīhiyavādiṣu duḥkhamiti duḥśabdādbhāti na cirāciranirgamanamityata āha-sukhaduḥkhatāviśeṣaścāyamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:797: tasminnevārohe pravarṣaṇānantaraṃ paṭhyate- 'ta iha vrīhiyavā oṣadhivanaspatayastilamāṣā iti jāyante' (chā. 5.10.6)
GSP33brssgo3u:799: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimasminnavadhau sthāvarajātyāpannāḥ sthāvarasukhaduḥkhabhājo 'nuśāyino bhavatyāhosvitkṣetrajñāntarādhiṣṭhiteṣu sthāvaraśarīreṣu saṃśleṣamātraṃ gacchantīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:807: yathā śvayoniṃ vā sūkarayoniṃ vā camḍālayoniṃ veti mukhyamevānuśayināṃ śvādijanma tatsukhaduḥkhānvitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:808: evaṃ vrīhyādiṣu saṃsargamātramanuśayinaḥ pratipadyante na tatsukhaduḥkhānvitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:810: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ anyairjīvairadhiṣṭhiteṣu vrīhyādiṣu saṃsargamātramanuśayinaḥ pratipadyante na tatsukhaduḥkhabhājo bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:818: yathākāśādiṣu pravarṣaṇānteṣu na kañcitkarmavyāpāraṃ parāmṛśatyevaṃ vrīhyādijanmanyapi /
GSP33brssgo3u:820: yatra tu sukhaduḥkhabhāktvamabhipraiti parāmṛśati tatra karmavyāpāraṃ ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā iti ca /
GSP33brssgo3u:821: apica mukhye 'nuśayināṃ vrīhyādijanmani vrīhyādiṣu lūyamāneṣu kaṇḍyamāneṣu pacyamāneṣu bhakṣyamāṇeṣu ca tadabhimānino 'nuśayinaḥ pravaseyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:822: yo hi jīvo yaccharīramabhimanyate sa tasminpīḍyamāne pravasatīti prasiddham /
GSP33brssgo3u:831: iha bhūmau varṣadhārādvārā patitāste 'nuśayino vrīhyādisāmyena jāyanta iti śrutyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:832: atra jāyanta iti śruteḥ pūrvatrākāśādivarṣāntasādṛśyokteśca saṃśayamāha-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo3u:834: durniṣprapataraśabdena ciranirgalanalakṣaṇoktā na yuktā, duḥkhena nirgamanamiti mukhyasaṃbhavādityākṣepasaṅgatyā
GSP33brssgo3u:837: siddhānte vrīhyādisaṃśleṣamātraṃ parihartuṃ yatnalāghavaṃ vairāgyadārḍhyaṃ ceti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:838: nanu dehotpattyā jīvānāṃ janma syānna svataḥ, vrīhyadestu na dehatvamityata āha-sthāvarabhāvasyeti
GSP33brssgo3u:843: kratvarthahiṃsāderapi hiṃsātvādisāmānyena pravṛtterna hiṃsyādityādiśāstraniṣiddhatvākāreṇa duritāpūrvakāritvamaviruddhamiti sāṅkhyā āhuḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:846: pūrvavaditi padaṃ dṛṣṭāntatvena hetvaṃśatvena ca vyākhyātaṃ yadatra prakaraṇe karmaviśeṣaparāmarśakamucyate
GSP33brssgo3u:848: apica 'yo yo hyannamatti yo retaḥ striyāṃ siñcati tadbhūya eva bhavati'iti vākyaśeṣe vrīhyādiṣu praviṣṭasyānuśayisaṃghasyānnadvārā
GSP33brssgo3u:859: yatpunaruktaṃ paśuhiṃsādiyogādaśuddhamādhvarikaṃ karma tasyāniṣṭamapi phalamavakalpata ityato mukhyamevānuśayināṃ vrīhyādijanmāstu tatra gauṇī kalpanānarthiketi tatparihriyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:861: ayaṃ dharmo 'yamadharma iti śāstrameva vijñāne kāraṇam /
GSP33brssgo3u:863: yasmindeśe kāle nimitte ca yo dharmo 'nuṣṭhīyate sa eva deśakālanimittāntareṣvadharmo bhavati
GSP33brssgo3u:864: tena śāstrādṛte dharmādharmaviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ na kasyacidasti /
GSP33brssgo3u:865: śāstrācca hiṃsānugrahādyātmako jyotiṣṭomo dharma ityavadhāritaḥ sa kathamaśuddha iti śakyate vaktum /
GSP33brssgo3u:866: nanu 'na hiṃsyātsarvā bhūtāni' iti śāstrameva bhūtaviṣayāṃ hiṃsāmadharma ityavagamayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:872: tena na tasya pratirūpaṃ phalaṃ jātisthāvaratvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:876: vaidikaṃ karmāśuddhaṃ na bhavati śāstravihitatvāditi sūtrārthaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:878: śucau deśe prātaḥ sāyaṅkāle jīvanādinimitte kṛtamagnihotraṃ dharmo bhavati sa evāśucideśe madhyarātre maraṇādinimitte kṛtaḥ sannadharmo bhavatīti nirṇayaḥ śāstraikasādhya ityarthaḥ tataḥ kiṃ tatrāha-śāstrācceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:879: nanu yā hiṃsā so 'dharma ityutsargasya viśeṣavidhinā bādho 'tra na yuktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:882: ayamarthaḥ-kāmye karmaṇi sarvatra karaṇāṃśe rāgataḥ pravṛttiḥ, aṅgeṣu vidhita iti sthitiḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:883: tathāca śyenākhye karmaṇi niṣedhe 'pi rāgaprābalyāt pravṛttiḥ syāt
GSP33brssgo3u:885: sa ca vidhiryadyutsargaprāptamanarthahetutvaṃ na bādheta tarhi pravartako na syāt, pravartakatve vā vidhiranarthāya syāt, ato niravakāśo vidhiḥ sāvakāśamutsargamavihitahiṃsādiṣu sthāpayatīti idaṃ ca niṣedhaśāstrasya hiṃsātvādisāmānyena pravṛttimaṅgīkṛtyoktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:887: pratirūpaṃ duḥkharūpaṃ tasya phalaṃ neti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo3u:892: itaśca vrīhyādisaṃśleṣamātraṃ tadbhāvo yatkāraṇaṃ vrīhyādibhāvasyānantaramanuśayināṃ retaḥsigbhāva āmnāyate - 'yo yo hyannamatti yo retaḥ siñcati tadbhūya eva bhavati' (chā. 5.10.6) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:899: tatrānnasthānuśayino retaḥ sekakartṛtvāyogādyogamātraṃ vācyaṃ tadvadupakrame 'pi yoga evāstheyaḥ, anyathopakramopasaṃhārayorvirodhaḥ syāditi matvoktam-ityavirodha iti //26//
GSP33brssgo3u:903: atha retaḥsigbhāvasyānantaraṃ yonau niṣikte retasi yoneradhikaśarīramanuśayināmanuśayaphalopabhogāya jāyata ityāha śāstram -
GSP33brssgo3u:905: tasmādapyavagamyate nāvarohe vrīhyādibhāvāvasare taccharīrameva sukhaduḥkānvitaṃ bhavatīti
GSP33brssgo3u:909: evaṃ karmiṇāṃ gatyāgatisaṃsāro durvāra ityanusandhānāt karmaphalādvairāgyaṃ tattvajñānasādhanaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:911: iti śrīmadparamahaṃsaparivrājakācārya śrīmadgovindabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ tṛtīyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP33brssgo3u:920: atikrīnte pāde pañcāgnividyāmudāhṛtya jīvasya saṃsāragatiprabhedaḥ prapañcitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:922: idamāmananti- 'sa yatra prasvapiti' (bṛ. 4.3.9) ityupakramya 'na tatra rathā na rathayogā na panthāno bhavantyatha rathānrathayogānpathaḥ sṛjate'
GSP33brssgo3u:924: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ prabodha iva svapne 'pi pāramārthikī sṛṣṭirāhosvinmāyāmayīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:934: uktavairāgyasādhyastattvaṃpadārthaviveko vākyārthajñānasādhanamasmin pāde nirūpyata iti pādayorhetusādhyabhāvasaṃgatimāha-atikrānta iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:936: asmin pāde 'na sthānato 'pi'ityataḥ prāguddeśyatvena prathamaṃ jijñāsitatvaṃpadārtho 'vasthādvārā vivicyate,
GSP33brssgo3u:937: tadārabhyāpādasamāptervidheyatatpadārthavivekaḥ, tatra pūrvaṃ gatyāgaticintayā jāgradavasthā nirūpitā tadanantarabhāvinīṃ svapnāvasthāṃ śrutyuktāṃ viṣayīkṛtya tatra svapne
GSP33brssgo3u:940: svapnarathādayo jāgradrathādivat vyāvahārikasattākā uta śuktirajatavat prātītikā iti saṃśayārthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:944: mumūrṣoḥ sarvendriyopasaṃhārādetallokānanubhavo sati vāsanāmātreṇa imaṃ lokaṃ smarataḥ karmabalādhṛdaye manasā paralokasphūrtirūpaḥ svapno
GSP33brssgo3u:945: bhavati, so 'yaṃ lokadvayasandhau bhavatīti saṃdhyaḥ svapnaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:946: tathāca śrutiḥ-'tasmin saṃdhye sthāne tiṣṭhannete ubhe sthāne paśyati
GSP33brssgo3u:948: ayaṃ svapnaḥ kādācitka ityarucyā nityasvapnasya prabodhasaṃprasādasaṃdhibhavatvamuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:951: lakṣaṇato lokadvayasparśitvāt nityasvapnasyaiva lokadvayasaṃdhyatvaṃ grāmadvayasparśimārgasya tatsaṃdhyatvavaditi vyācakṣate /
GSP33brssgo3u:952: na kevalaṃ śrutyā svapnārthānāṃ vyāvahārikasatyatvaṃ kintu
GSP33brssgo3u:958: nirmātāramātmānamāmananti- 'ya eṣa supteṣu jāgarti kāmaṃ kāmaṃ puruṣo
GSP33brssgo3u:960: putrādayaśca tatra kāmā abhipreyante kāmyanta iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:963: 'śatāyuṣaḥ putrapautrānvṛṇīṣva' (ka. 1.23) iti prakṛtyānte 'kāmānāṃ tvā kāmabhājaṃ karomi' (ka. 1.24) iti prakṛteṣu tatra tatra putrādiṣu kāmaśabdasya prayuktatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:966: tadviṣaya eva ca vākyaśeṣo 'pi- 'tadeva śukraṃ tadbrahma tadevāmṛtamucyate
GSP33brssgo3u:967: tasmiṃllokāḥ śritāḥ sarve tadu nātyeti kaścana'' (ka. 5.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:968: prājñakartṛkā ca sṛṣṭistathyarūpā samadhigatā jāgaritāśrayā tathā svapnāśrayāpi sṛṣṭirbhavitumarhati
GSP33brssgo3u:969: tathāca śrutiḥ - atho khalvāhurjāgaritadeśa evāsyaiṣa iti yāni hyeva
GSP33brssgo3u:970: jāgratpaśyati tāni suptaḥ (bṛ. 4.3.14) iti svapnajāgaritayoḥ samānanyāyatāṃ śrāvayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:975: yaḥ supteṣu nirvyāpāreṣu karaṇeṣu jāgarti tadeva śukraṃ svaprakāśaṃ brahmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:995: sa īyate 'mṛto yatra kāmam' (bṛ. 4.3.12) iti sthitigatipratyayabhedaśca nāniṣkrānte jantau sāmañjasyāmaśnuvīteti /
GSP33brssgo3u:997: nahi suptasya jantoḥ kṣaṇamātreṇa yojanaśatāntaritaṃ deśaṃ paryetuṃ viparyetuṃ ca tataḥ sāmarthyaṃ saṃbhāvyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:998: kvacicca pratyāgamanavarjitaṃ svapnaṃ śrāvayati kuruṣvahamadya śayāno nidrayābhiplutaḥ svapne pañcālānabhigataścāsminpratibuddhaśceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:999: dehāccedapeyātpañcāleṣu pratihudhyeta na tānasāvabhigata iti kuruṣveva tu pratibudhyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1000: yena cāyaṃ dehena deśāntaramaśnuvāno manyate tamanye pārśvasthāḥ śayanadeśa eva paśyanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1001: yathābhūtāni cāyaṃ deśāntarāṇi svapne paśyati na tāni tathābhūtānyeva bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1003: darśayati ca śrutirantareva dehe svapnam- 'sa yatraitatsvapnyayā carati'
GSP33brssgo3u:1006: yo hi vasannapi śarīre na tena prayojanaṃ karoti sa bahiriva śarīrādbhavatīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1008: kālavisaṃvādo 'pi ca svapne bhavati rajanyāṃ supto vāsaraṃ bhārate varṣe manyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1010: nimittānyapi ca svapne na buddhaye karmaṇe vocitāni vidyante /
GSP33brssgo3u:1012: rathādinirvartane 'pi kuto 'sya nimeṣamātreṇa sāmarthyaṃ dāruṇī vā /
GSP33brssgo3u:1016: ratho 'yamiti hi kadācitsvapne nirdhāritaḥ kṣaṇena manuṣyaḥ saṃpadyate
GSP33brssgo3u:1018: spaṣṭaṃ cābhāvaṃ rathādīnāṃ svapne śrāvayati śāstram - ''na tatra rathā na
GSP33brssgo3u:1024: svapnarathādayaḥ prātītikā jāgradrathādau kḷptasāmagrīṃ vinā dṛṣṭatvācchuktirūpyādivaditi siddhāntayati-tuśabda ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:1025: cinmātraniṣṭhāvidyā cittvāvacchedena jīve 'pi sthitā rathādyākārā māyeti
GSP33brssgo3u:1026: sūtrabhāṣyayoruktā māyāvidyayorabhedajñāpanāya mātrapadena tu sati pramātaryabādhyatvarūpasya vyāvahārikasatyatvasya nirāsa uktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1027: kārtsnyamatra jāgrati yā kḷptasāmagrī, tajjanyatvaṃ paramārthavastuno jāgradarthasya kāryasya dharmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1029: saṃvṛte saṅkīrṇe, paryetuṃ gantuṃ, viparyetumāgantuṃ, śrāvayati prabuddho janaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:1032: yatra kāle svapnyayā vṛttyā carati tathā svaśarīre yatheṣṭaṃ caratītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1034: kulāyāddehāt bahirivāmṛta ātmā caritvā yatra kāmaṃ yatheṣṭamīyate viharatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1037: evaṃ sati śrutiyuktibhyāṃ antareva svapne satītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1039: atra rātrisamaye 'pi ketumālādivarṣāntare vāsaro bhavati iti bhārata ityuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1043: sūcakaśca hi śruter ācakṣate ca tadvidaḥ |
GSP33brssgo3u:1047: tathāhi śrūyate - 'yadā karmasu kāmyeṣu striyaṃ svapneṣu paśyati /
GSP33brssgo3u:1048: samṛddhiṃ tatra jānīyāttasminsvapnadarśane' (chā. 5.2.9) tathā puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇadantaṃ paśyati sa enaṃ hanti ityevamādibhiḥ svapnairacirajīvitvamāvedyata iti śrāvayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:1049: ācakṣate ca svapnādhyāyavidaḥ - 'kuñjarārohaṇādīni svapne dhanyāni kharayānādīnyadhanyāni' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1051: tatrāpi bhavatu nāma sūcyamānasya vastunaḥ satyatvaṃ, sūcakasya tu strīdarśanāderbhavatyeva vaitathyaṃ bādhyamānatvādityabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1053: yaduktam 'āha hi' iti tadevaṃ sati bhāktaṃ vyākhyātavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1054: yathā lāṅgalaṃ gavādīnudvahatīti nimittamātratvādevamucyate, natu pratyakṣameva lāṅgalaṃ gavādīnudvahati
GSP33brssgo3u:1055: evaṃ nimittamātratvādevātsupto rathādīnsṛjate sa hi karteti cocyate, natu pratyakṣameva supto rathādīnsṛjati /

GSP33brssgo3u:1367: yohi yasmiñśarīre suptaḥ sa tasminnotiṣṭhatyanyasmiñśarīre supto
GSP33brssgo3u:1375: yatpunaruktaṃ yathā jalarāśau prakṣipto jalabindurnoddhartuṃ śakyata evaṃ sati saṃpanno jīvo notpatpatitumarhatīti, tatparihriyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1377: iha tu vidyate vivekakāraṇaṃ karma cāvidyā ceti vaiṣamyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1378: dṛśyate ca durvivecayorapyasmajjātīyaiḥ kṣīrodakayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭayorhaṃsena vivecanam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1379: apica na jīvo nāma kaścitparasmādanyo vidyate yo jalabinduriva jalarāśeḥ sato vivicyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:1383: sa evāyamupādhiḥ svāpaprabodhayorbījāṅ kuranyāyenetyataḥ sa eva jīvaḥ pratibudhyata iti yuktam sa eva tu karmānusmṛtiśabdavidhibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1384: suṣuptau upādhināśāt karmānusmṛtyāderdarśanācca saṃśaye satyasmādbrahmaṇo jīvasyotthānaśruterbrahmaiva suṣuptisthānamityuktamayuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1388: siddhānte tu ajñātabrahmātmanā sthitasyājñānabalena punastasyaivotthānāvaśyaṃbhāvādajñānanāśāya jñānāpekṣeti phalam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1391: jñānaṃ vinā buddhyādyupādheratyantanāśābhāvādyayā buddhyopahito jīvaḥ suṣuptau kāraṇātmanā sthitastasyaiva nānākarmānubhavasaṃskāravatyopahita uttiṣṭhatīti siddhāntayati-sa eva tvityādinā sāmikṛtasyārdhakṛtasya ekasyaiva jyotiṣṭomāderanekayajamānakatvāpāto
GSP33brssgo3u:1396: pratiniyataṃ gamanaṃ yathā bhavati tathā pratiyonyāgacchati jāgaraṇāyeti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1398: iha pūrvaprabodhe ye bhavanti ta eva tadottaraprabodhe bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1400: sa evottiṣṭhatīti niścīyate ityarthaḥ atraivotsūtraṃ yuktyantaramāha-apicetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:1403: asmadādyaśakyamapi vivecanaṃ prāṇyadṛṣṭāpekṣa īśvaraḥ karotīti matvā
GSP33brssgo3u:1406: abhede sa vānyo vottiṣṭhati iti cintānavakāśa ityāśaṅkya buddhibhedena jīvabhedāccintetyāha-evaṃ satīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1407: suṣuptau buddhināśena pratyahaṃ buddhyupādhibhedādekajīvasya vyavahāro na syādityata āha-sa evāyamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1414: asti mugdho nāma yaṃ mūrchita iti laukikāḥ kathayanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1416: tisrastāvadavasthāḥ śarīrasthasya jīvasya prasiddhā jāgaritaṃ svapnaḥ suṣuptiriti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1418: natu pañcamīkācidavasthā jīvasya śrutau smṛtau vā prasiddhāsti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1419: tasmāccatasṛṇāmevāvasthānāmanyatamāvasthā mūrchetyevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ- na tāvanmugdho jāgaritāvastho bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo3u:1423: yatheṣukāro jāgradapīṣvāsaktamanastayā nānyānviṣayānīkṣata evaṃ mugdho musalasaṃpātādijanitaduḥkhānubhavavyagramanastayā jāgradapi nānyānviṣayānīkṣata iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1427: mugdhastu labdhasaṃjño bravītyandhe tamasyahametāvantaṃ kālaṃ prakṣipto
GSP33brssgo3u:1433: mugdhe hi jantau mṛto 'yaṃ syānna vā mṛta iti saṃśayānā ūṣmāsti nāstīti hṛdayadeśamālabhante niścayārthaṃ prāṇo 'sti nāstīti ca nāsikādeśam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1436: atha tu prāṇamūṣmāṇaṃ vā pratipadyante tato nāyaṃ mṛta ityadhyavasāya saṃjñālābhāya bhiṣajyanti
GSP33brssgo3u:1442: mugdhaḥ kadācicciramapi nocchvasiti savepathurasya deho bhavati bhayānakaṃ ca vadanaṃ visphārite netre /
GSP33brssgo3u:1443: suṣuptastu prasannavadanastulyakālaṃ punaḥ punarucchvasiti nimīlite asya netre bhavataḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1445: pāṇipeṣaṇamātreṇa ca suṣuptamutthāpayanti natu mugdhaṃ mudgaraghātenāpi /
GSP33brssgo3u:1452: yāvatā suptaṃ prati tāvaduktaṃ śrutyā - 'satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati'
GSP33brssgo3u:1454: setumahorātre tarato na jarā na mṛtyurna śoko na sukṛtaṃ na dṛṣkṛtam'
GSP33brssgo3u:1456: jīve hi sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ prāptiḥ sukhitvaduḥkhitvapratyayotpādanena bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:1457: naca sukhitvapratyayo duḥkhitvapratyayo vā suṣupte vidyate, mugdhe 'pi tau pratyayau naiva vidyete /
GSP33brssgo3u:1459: atrocyate - na brūmo mugdher'dhasaṃpattirjīvasya brahmaṇā bhavatīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1460: kiṃ tarhyardhena suṣuptapakṣasya bhavati mugdhatvamardhenāvasthāntarapakṣasyeti brūmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1463: yadāsya sāvaśeṣaṃ karma bhavati tadā vāṅmanase pratyāgacchataḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1464: yadā tu niravaśeṣaṃ karma bhavati tadā prāṇoṣmāṇāvapagacchataḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1475: pratyabhijñayotthitasya suptābhedavadviśeṣajñānābhāvāviśeṣeṇa liṅgena suṣuptireva mūrccheti pratyabhijñānātsuṣuptyantargatā mūrccheti dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣamāha-tisrastāvaditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:1476: pūrvapakṣe prasiddhāvasthātaḥ pṛthagātmano mūrcchāto vivekārthaṃ yatnāsiddhiḥ phalaṃ, siddhānte pṛthagyatnadhrauvyamiti bhedaḥ pariśeṣaṃ darśayan siddhāntayati-na tāvadityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:1478: aindriyakamarthajñānaṃ dehadhāraṇaṃ ca tasyāsti na mugdhasyeti vaiṣamyoktyā dūṣayati-netyādinā
GSP33brssgo3u:1485: uktasārūpyavairūpyābhyāmardhasaṃpattiḥ sarvaiḥ suṣuptidharmairasaṃpanno mugdhaḥ suṣupto na bhavati, sarvairmaraṇāvasthādharmairasaṃpattermṛto
GSP33brssgo3u:1486: 'pi na kintu avasthāntaraṃ gata iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1487: atra sūtre jīvasya brahmaṇārdhasaṃpattirukteti bhrāntaḥ śaṅkate-kathamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1489: upādhyabhāvaśca mugdhasyāpi mama iti yatastasmāt kṛtsnasaṃpattirevetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1493: mugdhatvaṃ hi suṣuptasyārdhena niḥsaṃjñatvādidharmeṇa sāmyena saṃpannaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:1505: yena brahmaṇā suṣuptyādiṣu jīva upādhyupaśamātsaṃpadyate tasyedānīṃ svarūpaṃ śrutivaśena nirdhāryate
GSP33brssgo3u:1506: santyubhayaliṅgāḥ śrutayo brahmaviṣayāḥ 'sarvakarmā sarvakāmaḥ sarvagandhaḥ sarvarasaḥ' (chā. 3.14.2) ityelamādāyāḥ saviśeṣaliṅgāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1509: yadāpyanyataraliṅgaṃ tadāpi kiṃ saviśeṣamuta nirviśeṣamiti mīmāṃsyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1511: na tāvatsvata eva parasya brahmaṇa ubhayaliṅgatvamupapadyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1512: nahyekaṃ vastu svata eva rūpādiviśeṣopetaṃ tadviparītaṃ cetyādhārayituṃ śakyaṃ virodhāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:1524: sarvābhiravasthābhiraliptastvamartha iti nirūpayitukāmaḥ prathamaṃ tasya nirviśeṣatvamāha-na sthānato 'pi parasyobhyaliṅgaṃ sarvatra hi /
GSP33brssgo3u:1527: nirviśeṣatvaṃsav iśeṣatvaṃ cetyubhayaṃ liṅgyate jñāpyate yābhistā ubhayaliṅgaḥ śrutayaḥ saṃśayabījatvena santītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1528: yathā viruddhasuṣuptimaraṇobhayarūpaṃ mugdhatvaṃ tathā śrutiprāmāṇyādubhayarūpaṃ brahma dhyeyamiti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1530: kimubhayarūpatvaṃ svataḥ, uta svato nirguṇasya sarvagandhatvādiviśeṣa upādhitaḥ satyaḥ, āhosvitsvataḥ saviśeṣameva brahmeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1534: upādheḥ satyatve 'pi tatkṛtaṃ mithyeti dṛṣṭaṃ brahmaṇi tūpādhīnāṃ mithyātvāttatkṛto viśeṣo mithyeti kimu vācyamityāha-upādhīnāmiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1540: na bhedād iti cen na pratyekamatadvacanāt |
GSP33brssgo3u:1541: athāpi syādyaduktaṃ nirvikalpamekaliṅgameva brahma nāsya svataḥ sthānato vobhayaliṅgatvamastīti
GSP33brssgo3u:1545: bhinnā hi pratividyaṃ brahmaṇa ākārā upadiśyante /
GSP33brssgo3u:1546: catuṣpādbrahma ṣoḍaśakalaṃ brahma vāmanītvādilakṣaṇaṃ brahma trailokyaśarīravaiśvānaraśabdoditaṃ brahmetyevañjātīyakāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1551: anyathā hi nirviṣayameva bhedaśāstraṃ prasajyeteti cet /
GSP33brssgo3u:1556: 'yaścāyamasyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ tejomayo 'mṛtamayaḥ puruṣo yaścāyamadhyātmaṃ śārīrastejomayo 'mṛtamayaḥ puruṣo 'yameva sa yo 'yamātmā' (bṛ. 2.5.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:1558: ataśca na bhinnākārayogo brahmaṇaḥ śāstrīya iti śakyate vaktum /
GSP33brssgo3u:1560: bhidyata iti bhedo viśeṣaḥ, nirviśeṣatvaśrutāvapi viśeṣasyāpi śruterubhayarūpatvaṃ syāditi śaṅkāṃ vyācaṣṭe-athāpi syāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:1563: kimupādhigata eva rūpabhedo brahmaṇyupacaryate dhyānārthamutopādhiyogātsatyaviruddharūpavattayā brahmaṇo bhedo bhavatīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1568: apicaivaṃ bhedadarsananindāpūrvakamabhedadarśanamevaike śākhinaḥ samāmananti - 'manasaivedamāptavyaṃ neha nānāsti kiñcana /
GSP33brssgo3u:1569: mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyupamāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati' (ka. 4.11) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1570: tathānyepi 'bhoktā bhogyaṃ preritāraṃ ca matvā sarvaṃ trividhaṃ brahma me tat' (śve. 1.12) iti samastasya bhogyabhoktṛniyantṛlakṣaṇasya prapañcasya brahmaikasvabhāvatāmadhīyate // 13 dvaitanindāpūrvakamadvaitokteśca nirviśeṣaṃ tattvamiti
GSP33brssgo3u:1572: bhoktā jīvo bhogyaṃ śabdādi tayoḥ preritāramīśvaraṃ ca matvā vicārya me mama proktaṃ tatsarvaṃ trividhaṃ brahmaiveti jānīyādityarthaḥ //13//
GSP33brssgo3u:1575: kathaṃ punarākāravadupadeśinīṣvanākāropadeśinīṣu ca brahmaviṣayāsu śrutiṣu satīṣvanākārameva brahmāvadhāryate na punarviparītamti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1583: mukti. 2.72) 'ākāśo vai nāma nāmarūpayornirvahitā te yadantarā tadbrahma'
GSP33brssgo3u:1586: sarvānabhūḥ' (bṛ. 2.5.19) ityevamādīni vākyāni niṣprapañcabrahmātmatattvapradhānāni narthāntarapradhānānītyetatpratiṣṭhāpitaṃ 'tattu samanvayāt' (bra.sū.
GSP33brssgo3u:1590: upāsanāvidhipradhānāni hi tāni teṣvasati virodhe yathāśrutamāśrayitavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1591: sati tu virodhe tatpradhānānyatatpradhānebhyo balīyāṃsi bhavantīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1593: yenobhayīṣvapi śrutiṣu satīṣvanākārameva brahmāvadhāryate na punarviparītamiti // 14 //
GSP33brssgo3u:1594: dvividhaśrutiṣu satīṣu nirviśeṣatve kiṃ niyāmakamiti śaṅkate-kathaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:1596: tatparātaparavirodhe tatparaṃ balavaditi nyāyo niyāmaka ityāha-arūpavadeveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1604: yathā prakāśaḥ sauraścāndramaso vā viyadvyāpyāvatiṣṭhamāno 'ṅgulyādyupādhisaṃbandhātteṣvṛjuvakrādibhāvaṃ pratipadyamāneṣu tadbhāvamiva pratipadyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1605: evaṃ brahmāpi pṛthivyādyupādhisaṃbandhāttadākāratāmiva pratipadyate tadālambano brahmaṇa ākāraviśeṣopadeśa upāsanārtho na virudhyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1607: nahi vedavākyānāṃ kasyacidarthavattvaṃ kasyacidanarthavattvamiti yuktaṃ pratipattuṃ pramāṇatvāviśeṣāt
GSP33brssgo3u:1613: satyāmeva ca naisargikyāmavidyāyāṃ lokavedavyavahārāvatāra iti tatra tatrāvocāma // 15 //
GSP33brssgo3u:1619: upādhīnāṃ kalpitatvādaupādhikasya satyatvādupapatterna satyamubhayarūpatvamiti pūrvamuktaṃ, saṃprati satyaṃ nirviśeṣatvaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:1620: mithyā saviśeṣatvamityucyata ityubhayarūpatvāṅgīkāre 'pi na pūrvāparavirodha ityāha-neti brūma iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1621: dvaitasya mithyātve jñānena bādhādupāsanādivyavahāro na syādityāśaṅkya bādhātprāgeva sa ityāha-satyamiti
GSP33brssgo3u:1625: āha ca śrutiścaitanyamātraṃ vilakṣaṇarūpāntararahitaṃ nirviśeṣaṃ brahma -
GSP33brssgo3u:1626: 'sa yathā saindhavaghano 'ntaro 'bāhyaḥ kṛtsno rasaghana evaivaṃ vā are 'yamātmānantaro 'bāhyaḥ kṛtsnaḥ prajñānaghana eva' (bṛ. 4.5.13) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1627: etaduktaṃ bhavati - nāsyātmano 'ntarbahirvā caitanyādanyadrūpamasti lavaṇarasa eva nirantaro bhavati na rasāntaraṃ tathaiveti // 16 //
GSP33brssgo3u:1629: yataḥ śrutiścinmātramāhātaśca viśeṣo mithyeti sūtrārthamāha-āha ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1634: darśayati ca śrutiḥ pararūpapratiṣedhenaiva brahma nirviśeṣatvāt- 'athāta
GSP33brssgo3u:1635: ādeśo neti neti' (bṛ. 2.3.6) iti, 'anyadeva tadviditādatho aviditādadhi (ke. 1.3) 'yato vāco nivartante aprāpya manasā saha' (tai. 2.4.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:1637: bāṣkalinā ca bādhvaḥpṛṣṭaḥ sannavacanenaiva brahma provāceti śrūyate - 'sa
GSP33brssgo3u:1638: hovācādhīhi bho iti sa tūṣṇīṃ babhūva taṃ ha dvitīye vā tṛtīye vā vacana uvāca brūmaḥ khalu tvaṃ tu na vijānāsi /
GSP33brssgo3u:1642: tathā viśvarūpadharo nārāyaṇo nāradamuvāceti smaryate - 'māyā hyeṣā mayā sṛṣṭā yanmāṃ paśyasi nārada /
GSP33brssgo3u:1648: atha dvaitoktyanantaraṃ jñānahetutvānneti neti upadeśaḥ kriyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1649: adhi anyat punaḥ punaradhīhi bho iti nirbandhakāriṇaṃ taṃ dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ ca praśne tūṣṇībhāvaṃ tyaktvovāca /
GSP33brssgo3u:1651: atastasya tūṣṇīṃbhāva evottaramiti sautraśca atośabdastathārthakaḥ ādimatkāryaṃ tanna bhavatītyanādimat
GSP33brssgo3u:1654: sarvabhūtaguṇairdivyagandhādibhiryuktaṃ māṃ mūrtimantaṃ paśyasīti yatsā māyā, ata eva sadvaito bhagavāniti māṃ draṣṭuṃ nārhasi vastuto dvaitātītatvādityarthaḥ //17//
GSP33brssgo3u:1658: yata eva cāyamātmā caitanyarūpo nirviśeṣo vāṅmanasātītaḥ parapratiṣedhopadeśyo 'ta eva cāsyopādhinimittapāramārthikīṃ viśeṣavattābhipretya jalasūryakādivadityupamopādīyate mokṣaśāstreṣu -
GSP33brssgo3u:1660: upādhinā kriyate bhedarūpo devaḥ kṣetreṣvevamajoyamātmā' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1661: 'eka eva hi bhūtātmā bhūte bhūte vyavasthitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1662: ekadhā bahudhā caiva dṛśyate jalacandravat' (bra.biṃ 12) ityevamādiṣu //
GSP33brssgo3u:1663: kiñca yathā jalādyupādhikalpitaḥ sūryacandrāderbhedacalanādirdharma evamātmana iti dṛṣṭāntaśruteśca nirviśeṣaṃ tattvamityāha-ata eva copameti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1665: yathāyaṃ jyotirmayo vivasvānsvata eko 'pi ghaṭabhedena bhinnāḥ apo
GSP33brssgo3u:1666: 'nugacchan bahudhā kriyate evamajo 'yamātmā devaḥ svaprakāśa eko
GSP33brssgo3u:1667: 'pyupādhinā māyayā kṣetreṣvanugacchan bhedarūpaḥ kriyata iti yojanā
GSP33brssgo3u:1673: sūryādibhyo hi mūrtebhyaḥ pṛthagbhūtaṃ viprakṛṣṭadeśaṃ mūrtaṃ gṛhyate tatra yuktaḥ sūryādipratibimbodayaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:1677: ātmano nīrūpatvāddūrasthopādhyabhāvācca māyayā buddhyādiṣu pratibimbabhedo na yukta ityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:1683: nahi dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭrāntikayoḥ kvacitkañcidvivakṣitāṃśaṃ mukattvā sarvasārūpyaṃ kenaciddarśayituṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1689: jalagataṃ hi sūryapratibimbaṃ jalavṛddhau vardhate jalahrāse hrasati jalacalane calati jalabhede bhidyata ityevaṃ jaladharmānuyāyi bhavati natu paramārthataḥ sūryasya tathātvamasti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1694: dṛṣṭāntasāmye 'pi nīrūpātmanaḥ pratibimbaṃ svabuddhyā kathaṃ kalpyata ityata āha-na cedamiti
GSP33brssgo3u:1699: ātmā pratibimbaśūnyaḥ, nīrūpadravyatvāt, vāyuvadityanumāne ākāśe vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1705: darśayati ca śrutiḥ parasyaiva brahmaṇo dehādiṣūpādhiṣvantaranupraveśam -
GSP33brssgo3u:1707: puraḥ sa pakṣī bhūtvā puraḥ puruṣa āviśat' (bṛ. 2.5.18) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1710: tasmānnirvikalpakaikaliṅgameva brahma nobhayaliṅgaṃ viparītaliṅgaṃ ceti siddham /
GSP33brssgo3u:1714: dvitīyaṃ tu - sthite pratyastamitaprapañcatve kiṃ sallakṣaṇaṃ brahmota bodhalakṣaṇamutobhayalakṣaṇamiti
GSP33brssgo3u:1716: yadi tāvadanekaliṅgatvaṃ parasyabrahmaṇo nirākartavyamityayaṃ prayāsastatpūrveṇaiva na sthānato 'pi ityanenādhikaraṇena nirākartavyamityayamuttaramadhikaraṇaṃ prakāśavacca etadvyarthameva bhavet /
GSP33brssgo3u:1717: naca sallakṣaṇameva bhma na bodhalakṣaṇamiti śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP33brssgo3u:1719: kathaṃ vā nirastacaitanyaṃ brahma cetanasya jīvasyātmatvenopadiśyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:1720: nāpi bodhalakṣaṇameva brahma na sallakṣaṇamiti śakyaṃ vaktum astītyevopalabdhavyaḥ (pha. 6.13)
GSP33brssgo3u:1725: sattāvyāvṛttena ca bodhena bodhavyāvṛttayā ca sattayopetaṃ brahma pratijānānasya tadeva pūrvādhikaraṇapratiṣiddhaṃ saprapañcatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:1729: atha sattaiva bodho bodha eva ca sattā nānayoḥ parasparavyāvṛttirastīti yadyucyeta tathāpi kiṃ sallakṣaṇaṃ brahmota bodhalakṣaṇamutobhayalakṣaṇamityevaṃ vikalpo nirālambana eva syāt sūtrāṇi tvekādhikaraṇatvenaivāsmābhirnītāni /
GSP33brssgo3u:1730: apica brahmaviṣayāsu śrutiṣvākāravadanākārapratipādanena vipratipannasvānākāre brahmaṇi parigṛhīte 'vaśyaṃ vaktavyetarāsāṃ śrutīnāṃ gatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1732: yadyapyāhurākāravādinyo 'pi śrutayaḥ prapañcapravilayamukhenānākārapratipattyarthā eva na pṛthagarthā iti
GSP33brssgo3u:1735: ye hi paravidyādhikāre kecitprapañcā ucyante yathā - 'yuktā hyasya harayaḥ śatā deśetyaya vai harayo 'yaṃ vai sahasrāṇi bahūni cānantāni ca' (bṛ.
GSP33brssgo3u:1738: ye punarupāsanādhikāre prapañcā ucyante yathā 'manomayaḥ prāṇasīro
GSP33brssgo3u:1739: bhārūpaḥ' (chā. 3.14.2) ityevamādayo na teṣāṃ pravilayārthatvaṃ nyāyyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1740: 'sa kratuṃ kurvīta' (chā. 3.14.1) ityevañjātīyakena prakṛtenaivopāsanavidhinā teṣāṃ saṃbandhāt
GSP33brssgo3u:1741: śrutyā caivañjātīyakānāṃ guṇānāmupāsanārthatve 'vakalpyamāne na lakṣaṇayā pravilayārtatvamavakalpate
GSP33brssgo3u:1742: sarveṣāṃ ca sādhāraṇe pravilayārthatve sati 'arūpavadeva hi
GSP33brssgo3u:1744: phalamapyeṣāṃ yathopadeśaṃ kvacidduritakṣayaḥ kvacidaiśvaryaprāptiḥ kvacitkramamuktirityavagamyata evetyataḥ pārthagartyamevopāsanāvākyānāṃ brahmavākyānāṃ ca nyāyyaṃ naikavākyatvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1749: vastumātraparyavasāyīni hi brakahmavākyāni na niyogopadeśīnītyetadvistare pratiṣṭhāpitaṃ 'tattu samanvayāt (bra. sū. 1.1.4) ityatra /
GSP33brssgo3u:1751: puruṣo hi niyujyamānaḥ kurviti svavyāpāre kasmiṃścinniyujyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1753: apravilāpite hi dvaitaprapañce brahmatattvāvabodho na bhavatyato brahmatattvāvabodhapratyanīkabhūto dvaitaprapañcaḥ pravilāpyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1754: yathā svargāmasya yāgo 'nuṣṭhātavya upadiśyata evamapavargakāmasya prapañcapravilayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1755: yathāca tamasi vyavasthitaṃ ghaṭāditattvamavabubhutsamānena tatpratyanīkabhūtaṃ tamaḥ pravilāpyata evaṃ brahmatattavamavabubhutsamānena tatpratyanīkabhūtaḥ prapañcaḥ pravilāpayitavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1756: brahmasvabhāvo hi prapañco na prapañcasvabhāvaṃ brahma, tena nāmarūpaprapañcapravilāpanena brahmatattvāvabodho bhavatīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1757: atra vayaṃ pṛcchāmaḥ - ko 'yaṃ prapañcapravilayo nāma /
GSP33brssgo3u:1758: kimagnipratāpasaṃparkādghṛtakāṭhinyapravilaya iva ppapañcapravilayaḥ kartavya āhosvidekasmiṃścandre timirakṛtānekacandraprapañcavadavidyākṛto brahmaṇi nāmarūpaprapañco vidyayā pravilāpitavya iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1759: tatra tāvadvidyāmano 'yaṃ prapañco dehādilakṣaṇa ādhyatmiko bāhyaśca pṛthivyādilakṣaṇaḥ pravilāpayitavya ityucyeta sa puruṣamātreṇāśakyaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:1761: ekena cādimuktena pṛthivyādipravilayaḥ kṛta itīdānīṃ pṛthivyādiśūnyaṃ jagadabhaviṣyat /
GSP33brssgo3u:1762: athāvidyādhyasto brahmaṇyekasminnayaṃ prapañco vidyayā pravilāpyata iti brūyāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:1763: tato brahmaivāvidyādhyastaprapañcapratyākhyānenāvedayitavyam ekamevādvitīyaṃ brahma, tatsatyaṃ sa ātmā tatvamasi (chā. 6.8.7) iti tasminnāvedite vidyā svayamevotpadyate tayā cāvidyā bādhyate.
GSP33brssgo3u:1765: anāvedite tu brahmaṇi brahmavijñānaṃ kuru prapañcapravilayaṃ ceti śatakṛtvo 'pyukte, na brahmavijñānaṃ prapañpapravilayo vā jāyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1766: nanvāvedite brahmaṇi tadvijñānaviṣayaḥ prapañcavilayaviṣayo vā niyogaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:1771: niyojyoñapi ca prapañcāvasthāyāṃ yo 'vagamyate jīvo nāma sa prapañcasyaiva vā syādbrahmapakṣasyaiva vā /
GSP33brssgo3u:1772: prathame vikalpe niṣprapañcabrahmatattvapratipādanena pṛthivyādivajjīvasyāpi pravilāpitatvātkasya prapañcavilaye niyoga ucyeta kasya vā niyoganiṣṭhatayā mokṣo 'vāptavya ucyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:1773: dvitīye 'pi brahmaivāniyojyasvabhāvaṃ jīvasya svarūpaṃ jīvatvaṃ tvavidyākṛtameveti pratipādite brahmaṇi niyojyābhāvānniyogābhāva eva /
GSP33brssgo3u:1775: loke 'pīdaṃ paśyedamākārṇayeti caivañjātīyakeṣu nirdeśeṣu praṇidhānamātraṃ kurvityucyate na sākṣājjñānameva kurviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1776: jñeyābhimukhasyāpi jñānaṃ kadācijjāyate kadācinna jāyate tasmāttaṃ prati jñānaviṣaya eva darśayitavyo jñāpayitukāmena /
GSP33brssgo3u:1777: tasmindarśite svayameva yathāviṣayaṃ yathāpramāṇaṃ ca jñānamutpadyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1780: yadi punarniyukto 'hamityanyathā jñānaṃ kuryānna tu tajjñānaṃ kiṃ tarhi
GSP33brssgo3u:1783: jñānaṃ tu pramāṇajanyaṃ yathābhūtaviṣayaṃ ca na tanniyogaśatenāpi kārayituṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1787: kiñcānyanniyoganiṣṭhatayaiva paryavasyāmnāye yadabhyupagatamaniyojyabrahmātmatvaṃ jīvasya tadapramāṇakameva syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:1788: atha śāstramevāniyojyabrahmātmatvamapyācakṣīta tadavabodhe ca puruṣaṃ niyuñjīta tato brahmaśāstrasyaikasya dvyarthaparatā viruddhārthaparatā ca prasajyetām /
GSP33brssgo3u:1789: niyogaparatāyāṃ ca śrutahāniraśrutakalpanā karmaphalavanmokṣasyādṛṣṭaphalatvamanityatvaṃ cetyevamādayo doṣā na kenacitparihartuṃ śakyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1792: abhyupagamyamāne 'pi ca brahmavākyechu niyogasadbhāve tadekatvaṃ niṣprapañcopadeśeṣu saprapañcopajadeśeṣu cāsiddham /
GSP33brssgo3u:1793: nahi śabdāntarādibhiḥ pramāṇairniyogabhede 'vagamyamāne sarvatraikā niyoga iti śakyamāśrayitum
GSP33brssgo3u:1798: nahi kṛtsnaprapañcapravilāpanaṃ prapañcaikadeśāpekṣaṇaṃ caikasmindharmiṇi yuktaṃ samāveśayitum

GSP33brssgo3u:1807: evaṃ pratibimbabhāvena bhedādeḥ kalpitatvāt nirviśeṣaṃ brahmeti

GSP33brssgo3u:1916: 'athāta ādeśo neti neti nahyetasmāditi netyanyatparamasti' (bṛ. 2.3.6) iti
GSP33brssgo3u:1919: itiśabdena tvatra pratiṣedhyaṃ kimapi samarthyate neti netītiparatvānnañprayogasya /

GSP33brssgo3u:1921: saṃnihitaṃ cātra prakaraṇasāmarthyādrūpadvayaṃ saprapañcaṃ brahmaṇastacca brahmayasyaite dve rūpe /

GSP33brssgo3u:1928: athavā brahmaiva rūpavatpratiṣidhyate taddhi vāṅmanasātītatvādasaṃbhāvyamānasadbhāvaṃ pratiṣedhārham

GSP33brssgo3u:1947: prakṣālanāddhi paṅ kasya dūrādasparśaṃ varam iti hi nyāyaḥ /

GSP33brssgo3u:1953: prakṛtaṃ yadetāvadiyattāparicchinnaṃ mūrtāmūrtalakṣaṇaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ tadeṣa śabdaḥ pratiṣedhati
GSP33brssgo3u:1954: taddhi prakṛtaṃ prapañcitaṃ ca pūrvasminagranthe 'dhidaivatamadhyātmaṃ ca tajjanitameva ca vāsanālabkṣaṇamaparaṃ rūpamamūrtarasabhūtaṃ puruṣaśabdoditaṃ liṅgātmavyapāśrayaṃ mahājanādyupamābhirdarśitam amūrtarasasya puruṣasya cakṣurgrāhyarūpayogitvānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1955: tadetatsaprapañcaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ saṃnihitālambanenetikaraṇena pratiṣedhakaṃ nañaṃ pratyupanīyata iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1956: brahma tu rūpaviśeṣaṇatvena ṣaṣṭhyā nirdiṣṭaṃ pūrvasmingranthe na svapradhānatvena /

GSP33brssgo3u:1960: tadāspadaṃ hīdaṃ samastaṃ kāryaṃ neti netīti pratiṣiddham /
