GSP33brssgo3u:2359: atra pūrvapakṣe phaladāturīśvarasya tatpadavācyasyāsiddherlakṣyāsiddhiḥ siddhānte tatsiddhiriti phalabhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2361: yadyapi sarvagatatvavatphaladātṛtvaṃ vyavahāradaśāyāṃ sidhyati yathāpi karmaṇa eva phaladātṛtvamiti śaṅkānirāsenoktalakṣyārthanirvāhakavācyārthanirṇayārthamasyādhikaraṇasyārambha iti matvā siddhāntaṃ tāvadāha-tatra tāvaditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:2364: yāgādikriyākhyaṃ karma tāvat kṣaṇikaṃ tatkiṃ svanāśāt phalaṃ janayatyuta phalamutpādya naśyati, āhosvidapūrvātphalasiddhiḥ, nādya
GSP33brssgo3u:2369: apūrvaṃ kiṃ svatantrameva phaladānāya pravartate, cetanādhiṣṭhitaṃ vā,
GSP33brssgo3u:2380: na kevalamupapattereveśvaraṃ phalahetuṃ kalpayāmaḥ kiṃ tarhi śrutatvādapīśvarameva phalahetuṃ manyāmahe /
GSP33brssgo3u:2381: tathāca śrutirbhavati - 'sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātmānnādo vasudānaḥ' (bṛ.
GSP33brssgo3u:2388: 'pūrvasya vā jaḍatvenopakaraṇamātratvātsvatantra īśvara eva phaladāteti siddhānto darśitaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:2394: śrūyate tāvadayamarthaḥ svargakāmo yajeta ityevamādiṣu vākyeṣu /
GSP33brssgo3u:2395: tatra ca vidhiśruterviṣayabhāvopagamādyāgaḥ svargasyotpādaka iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2396: anyathā hyananuṣṭhātṛko yāga āpadyeta tatrāsyopadeśavaiyarthyaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:2397: nanvanukṣaṇavināśinaḥ sarmaṇaḥ phalaṃ nopapadyata iti parityakto 'yaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:2401: śrutiścetpramāṇaṃ yathāyaṃ karmaphalasamabandhaḥ śruta upapadyate tathā kalpayitavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2402: nacānutpādya kimapyapūrvaṃ karma vinaśyatkālāntaritaṃ phalaṃ dātuṃ śaknoti
GSP33brssgo3u:2403: ataḥ karmaṇo vā sūkṣmā kāciduttarāvasthā phalasya vā pūrvāvasthāpūrvaṃ nāmāstīti tarkyate
GSP33brssgo3u:2409: vidhiśrutirvidhyarthaḥ, tasya liṅarthasya preraṇātmano yāgo viṣayastadbhāvāvagamādyāgaḥ svargasādhanamiti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2411: apūrvadvārā karmaṇaḥ phalamupapadyata ityuktvā siddhāntaṃ dūṣayati-īśvarastviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2412: īśvaraḥ kiṃ karmānapekṣaḥ phalaṃ dadāti tatsāpekṣo vā, ādya
GSP33brssgo3u:2414: dvitīye saṃveṣṭanasaṃskāramātrātkaṭādau veṣṭanavatkarmāpūrvādeva phalasiddheḥ kimīśvareṇeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2415: atra vayaṃ vadāmaḥ-candanakaṇḍakādidṛṣṭasaṃpattyaiva sukhādisaṃbhave kṛtaṃ dharmādharmābhyāmiti śrutismṛtibalāttadapekṣāyāmīśvareṇa kimaparāddham /
GSP33brssgo3u:2424: darmādharmayorapi hi kārayitṛtveneśvaro heturvyapadiśyate phalasya ca dātṛtvena 'eṣa hyeṣa sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamebhyo lokebhya unninīṣate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2425: eṣa u evāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamadho ninīṣate' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2426: smaryate cāyamartho bhagavadgītāsu - 'yo yo yāṃ yāṃ tanuṃ bhaktaḥ śraddhayārcitumicchati
GSP33brssgo3u:2429: labhate ca tataḥ kāmānmayaiva vihitānhitān' (7.21) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2431: tadeva ceśvarasya phalahetutvaṃ yatsvakarmānurūpāḥ prajāḥ sṛjatīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2437: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP33brssgo3u:2450: idānīṃ tu prativedāntaṃ vijñānāni bhidyante na veti vicāryate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2451: nanu vijñeyaṃ brahma pūrvāparādibhedarahitamekarasaṃ saindhavaghanavadavadhāritaṃ tatra kuto vijñānabhedābhedacintāvatāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2452: nahi karmabahutvavadbrahmabahutvamapi vedānteṣu pratipipādayiṣitamiti śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP33brssgo3u:2456: yadi punarekasminbrahmaṇi bahūni vijñānāni vedāntāntareṣu pratipipādayiṣitāni teṣāmekamabhrāntaṃ bhrāntānītarāṇītyanāśvāsaprasaṅgo vedānteṣu /
GSP33brssgo3u:2464: atra hi karmavadupāsanānāṃ bhedābhedau saṃbhavataḥ karmavadeva copāsanāni dṛṣṭaphalāni cocyante
GSP33brssgo3u:2470: asti cātra vedāntāntaravihiteṣu vijñāneṣvanyadanyannāma taittirīyakaṃ vājasaneyakaṃ kauthumakaṃ śāṭyāyanakamityevamādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:2477: tathā dharmaviśeṣo 'pi karmabhedasya pratipādaka āśaṅkitaḥ kārīryādiṣu /
GSP33brssgo3u:2483: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - sarvavedāntapratyayāni vijñānāni tasmiṃstasminvedānte
GSP33brssgo3u:2490: evam 'yo ha vai jyoṣṭhaṃ ca śreṣṭhaṃ ca veda' (bṛ.6.1.1, chā. 5.1.1) iti vājasaneyināṃ chandogānāṃ ca tādṛśyeva codanā /
GSP33brssgo3u:2493: rūpamapyubhayatra tadeva vijñānasya yaduta jyeṣṭhaśreṣṭhādiguṇaviśeṣaṇānvitaṃ prāṇatattvam
GSP33brssgo3u:2494: yathā ca dravyadevate yāgasya rūpamevaṃ vijñeyaṃ rūpaṃ vijñānasya tena hi tadrūpyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2498: ye tu nāmarūpādayo bhedahetvābhāsāste prathama eva kāṇḍe na nāmnā syādacodanābhidhānatvāt ityārabhya parihṛtāḥ // 1 //
GSP33brssgo3u:2499: FN: codyata iti codanā puruṣaprayatnaḥ sa hi puruṣavyāpāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2504: iha tatphalaṃ vākyārthajñānamānandādayaḥ pradhānasyeti sūtreṇāpunaruktāpekṣitatatpadadvācyārthopasaṃhāreṇa nirdhāryata iti phalaphalibhāvaḥ saṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2505: saguṇavākyārthavidyācintā tu tadvidyānāṃ cittaikāgryadvārā nirguṇajñānasādhanatvātkriyata iti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2509: vedyabhede vidyābhedacintā syāt brahmaṇastu vedyasyaikyānna cintāvasara ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2513: pūrvapakṣe jñānabhedaśaṅkānupapattimuktvā codanādyabhedājjñānābheda iti siddhānto 'pyayukta ityāha-nāpyasyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2515: saguṇavidyāsveva bhedābhedacintā kriyate nirguṇavidyāyāṃ tvaikyaṃ siddhamiti vācyārtharūpaguṇopasaṃhāramātraṃ kriyate vākyārthanirṇayāyeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2518: atra tu mithobhinnāstāḥ kiṃ pratiśākhaṃ bhidyānte na veti nāmādibhedāccodanādyaviśeṣācca saṃśayaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:2519: pūrvapakṣe vidyābhedādguṇānupasaṃhāraḥ siddhānte tvabhedādupasaṃhāra iti phalabhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2521: tatroktā hetavo nāmādayo vidyābhedārthamihocyante 'athaiṣa jyotirathaiṣa sarvajyotiretena sahasradakṣiṇena yajeta'ityatra
GSP33brssgo3u:2522: prakṛtajyotiṣṭomānuvādena sahasradakṣiṇākhyaguṇavidhimāśaṅkya jyotiritipadasya karmāntaranāmatvasaṃbhave jyotiṣṭomalakṣakatvāyogādatheti prakaraṇavicchedācca jyotiṣṭomātkarmāntaraṃ viśiṣṭadakṣiṇākaṃ vidhīyata iti nāmnaḥ karmabhedakatvamuktama /
GSP33brssgo3u:2524: taptaṃ kṣīraṃ dadhnā kaṭhinamāmikṣā, tatra dravaṃ jalarūpaṃ vājinamiti
GSP33brssgo3u:2525: bhedaḥ, 'tapte payasi dadhyānayati sā vaiśvadevyāmikṣā vājibhyo vājinam'ityatra vaiśvadevyāmikṣāyāge vājinākhyaguṇavidhiḥ vājibhya iti viśvedevānuvādādityāśaṅkyāmikṣāṃ paryupasarjanatvenoktaviśvadevānāṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:2526: vājibhya ityanuvādāyogādutpattiśiṣṭāmikṣāvaruddhe karmaṇi vājinadravyasyānākāṅkṣitasya vidhyayogādvājidevatāko vājinayāgaḥ karmāntaramiti dravyadevatākhyarūpabhedātkarmabhedaḥ siddhāntitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2529: tathā retonyūnā vāgādayaśchāndogye tatsahitā vājināmiti prāṇavidyābhedaḥ, kārīrivākyādhyayane taittirīyakāṇāṃ bhūmau bhojanaṃ dharmaviśeṣo nānyeṣāṃ, agnyadhyayane keṣāñcidupādhyāyārthamudakāharaṇaṃ dharmo nānyeṣāṃ, aśvamedhādhyayane 'śvaghāsānayanaṃ keṣāñcideva
GSP33brssgo3u:2530: nānyeṣāṃ, naca tānyeva kārīryādīni karmāṇi dharmaviśeṣamapekṣante nāpekṣante ceti yuktaṃ, ato dharmaviśeṣācchākhāntare karmabhedaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:2531: śaṅkitastathātrāpi muṇḍakādhyayena keṣāñcideva śirasyaṅgārapātradhāraṇarūpaṃ vrataṃ nānyeṣāmiti vidyābhedaḥ syāt punaruktirabhyāsaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2532: yathā 'samidho yajati tanūnapātaṃ yajati'iti yajatyabhyāsātprayājānāṃ bheda uktastathā śākhāntare 'bhyāsādvidyābhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2533: ādipadānnindādigrahaḥ, 'prātaḥ prātaranṛtaṃ te vadanti purodayājjuhvati ye 'gnihotram'ityanuditahomasya 'yadudite sūrye prātarjuhuyādyathātithaye pradrutāya śūnyāyāvasāthāyāhāryaṃ haranti tādṛgeva tat'ityuditahomasya ca nindāśruterbhedaḥ, ekasyaivodite 'nudite
GSP33brssgo3u:2536: ete nindāprayaścitte vedāntavidyāsu na vidyete iti nodāhriyete /
GSP33brssgo3u:2537: yathā sarvaśākhāvihitasya karmaṇo jñātuṃ kartuṃ cāśakterbhedastathā sarvavedāntādhyayanajñānādyaśaktestattadvedāntavidyābhedaḥ syāt tathā śākhānāṃ sarvāsāmekarūpā samāptirnocyate kintu kasyāścitkvacitkarmaṇi samāptirataḥ samāptivacanabhedātpratiśākhaṃ karmabhedaḥ śaṅkitaḥ, tathā kasyacidvedāntasyoṅkārasārvātmye samāptiḥ kasyacidanyatreti vidyābhedaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2538: anyārthadarśanamarthavādastadbhedātkarmabhedavadvidyābheda iti pūrvapakṣasūtroktā hetavo darśitāste kecitsiddhānte pūrvapakṣe cātropayuñjanta iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2540: tatra nāmadheyaṃ guṇo rūpamabhyāsaśceti trayaṃ vyākhyātaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2541: yajeddadyājjuhuyāditi prakṛtiśabdabhedena dhātvarthabhedāttadavacchinnabhāvanākhyakarmabheda uktastathātra vedopāsta ityādiśabdabhedādvidyābhedaḥ, 'tisra āhutīrjuhoti'iti
GSP33brssgo3u:2548: uktanāmādibhiragnihotrādikarmaṇāṃ pratiśākhaṃ bhede prāpte śākhāntarādhikaraṇasiddhāntasūtraṃ 'ekaṃ vā
GSP33brssgo3u:2553: yathā jyeṣṭhatvādiguṇakaprāṇavidyā sarvaśākhāsvekā tathā pañcāgnividyāpyekā phalasaṃyogādyaviśeṣāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:2556: kāṭhakamityādināmnā karmabhedo na yuktaḥ, kutaḥ acodanābhidhānatvātkāṭhakādiśabdānāṃ granthanāmatayā
GSP33brssgo3u:2559: dharmaviśeṣastvadhyayanāṅgaṃ na karmāṅgamato na karmabhedakaḥ śākhābhede
GSP33brssgo3u:2563: evaṃ samāptivacanabhedo 'pyaprayojaka ityaivaṃ karmābhedapramāṇaprābalye bhedahetavaḥ parihṛtā ityarthaḥ //1//
GSP33brssgo3u:2572: chandogāstu taṃ nāmananti pañcasaṃkhyayaiva ca ta upasaṃharanti 'atha ha ya etānevaṃ pañcāgnīnveda' (chā. 5.10.10) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2573: yoṣāṃ ca sa guṇo 'sti yeṣāṃ ca nāsti kathamubhayeṣāmekā vidyopapadyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:2575: tathā prāṇasaṃvāde śreṣṭhādanyāṃścaturaḥ prāṇānvākcakṣuḥ śrotamanāṃsi chandogā āmananti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2576: vājasaneyinastu pañcamamapyāmananti 'reto vai prajāpatiḥ prajāyate ha prajayā paśubhirya evaṃ veda' (bṛ. 6.1.6) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2577: āvāpodvāpabhedācca vedyabhedo bhavati vedyabhedācca vidyābhedo dravyadevatābhedādiva yāgasyeti cet /
GSP33brssgo3u:2580: yadyapi ṣaṣṭhasyāgnerupasaṃhāro na saṃbhavati tathāpi dyuprabhṛtīnāṃ pañcānāmagnīnāmubhayatra pratyabhijñāyāmānatvānna vidyābhedo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo3u:2582: paṭhyate 'pi ca ṣaṣṭho 'gniśchandogaiḥ - 'taṃ pretaṃ diṣṭamito 'gnaya evaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:2585: vājasaneyinastu sāṃpādikeṣu pañcasvagniṣvanuvṛttāyāḥ samiddhūmādikalpanāyā nivṛttaye 'tasyāgnirevāgnirbhavati samitsamit' (bṛ. 6.2.14) ityādi samāmananti sa nityānuvādaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2586: athāpyupāsanārtha eṣa vādastathāpi sa guṇaḥ śakyatechandogairapyupasaṃhartum /
GSP33brssgo3u:2588: sāṃpādikāgnyabhiprāyā hyeṣā pañcasaṃkhyā nityānuvādabhūtā na vidhisamavāyinītyadoṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2593: FN: ito 'smāllokān diṣṭaṃ lokāntaraṃ pretaṃ gataṃ jñātayo 'gnaye
GSP33brssgo3u:2598: asya pṛthakśāstratvātkarmanyāyānāṃ mānasavidyāsu vinā sūtraṃ duryojatvācca punaruktigandho 'pi nāstīti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2599: nanu tasya mṛtasya dāhārthamagnirantyeṣṭigataḥ ṣaṣṭho yaḥ prasiddhavadvājibhiruktaḥ sa chāndogye upasaṃhārya iti na rūpabhedaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2601: astu prajananaguṇavato retaso vājināmāvāpaśchandogānāṃ ca tasyodvāpastataḥ kimityata āha-āvāpeti
GSP33brssgo3u:2607: nanu chāndogye 'gnimātraṃ śrutaṃ vājibhistu samidādiviśeṣaḥ paṭhyate iti rūpabhedastadavasthaḥ, tatrāha-vājasaneyinastviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2608: ṣaṣṭhāgnestadviśeṣasya cānuvādamātratvenānupāsyatvātpañcāgnaya evopāsyā ubhayatreti na rūpabheda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2610: dyulokādīnāṃ pañcānāmanagnīnāmagnitvasaṃpattividhinaivārthātpañcatvaṃ saṃpattikalpitāgnīnāṃ siddhamanūdyate na dhyeyatvena vidhīyata ityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:2611: chandogairvājiśākhāsthaṃ reta upasaṃhartavyamityuktvānupasaṃhāre 'pi na vidyābheda ityāha-na cāvāpeti //2//
GSP33brssgo3u:2614: svādhyāyasya tathātvena hi samācāre 'dhikārāc ca savavac ca tanniyamaḥ |
GSP33brssgo3u:2615: yadapyuktamātharvaṇikānāṃ vidyāṃ prati śirovratādyapekṣaṇādanyeṣāṃ ca tadanapekṣaṇādvadyābheda iti tatpratyucyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2618: yatastathātvena svādyāyadharmatvena samācāre vedavratopadeśapare granta ātharvaṇikā idamapi vedavratatvena vyākyātamiti samāmananti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2619: 'naitadacīrṇavrato 'dhīte' (mu. 3.2.11) iti cādikṛtaviṣayādecchabdādadhyayanaśabdācca svopaniṣadadhyayanadharma evaiṣa iti nirdāryate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2620: nanu ca 'teṣāmevaitāṃ brahmavidyāṃ vadeta śirovrataṃ vidhivadyaistu
GSP33brssgo3u:2628: yathāca savāḥ sapta sauryādayaḥ sathaudanaparyantā vedāntaroditatretāgnyanabhisaṃbandhādatharvaṇoditaikāgnyabhisaṃbandhāccātharvaṇikānāmeva niyamyante tathaivāyamapi dharmaḥ svādhyāyaviśeṣasaṃbandhāttatraiva niyamyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2630: evaṃ rūpabhedo na vidyābhedaka ityuktvā dharmaviśeṣo 'pi na bhedaka ityāha-svādhyāyasyeti
GSP33brssgo3u:2631: godānavadadhyayanāṅgatvena śirovratamātharvaṇikānāṃ sūtre vihitaṃ na vidyāṅgamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2633: etatprakṛtaṃ muṇḍakamananuṣṭhitaśirovrato naro nādhīta iti śrutermuṇḍakādhyayanāṅgameva śirovratamityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:2634: nanu vidyāṅgatvenāpi idaṃ vrataṃ śrutamiti śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2635: sarvaśākhāsu brahmavidyaikaiva cedvidyāsaṃyuktaṃ vratamapi sarvatra saṃbadhyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:2638: tasya śirovratasya muṇḍakādhyayane niyama ityatra savavaditi nidarśananirdeśaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2641: prasiddhastasminnagnau kāryā iti yathā niyamyante tathetyarthaḥ //3//
GSP33brssgo3u:2645: darśayati ca vedo 'pi vidyaikatvaṃ sarvavedānteṣu vedyaikatvopadeśāt sarve vedā yatparamāmananti (ka. 2.15) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2646: tathā etaṃ hyeva bahvṛcā mahatyukthe mīmāṃsanta etamagnāvadhvarya etaṃ mahāvrate chandogāḥ iti ca /
GSP33brssgo3u:2652: tathā vājasaneyake prādeśamātrasaṃpāditasya vaiśvānarasya chāndogye siddhavadupādānam 'yastvetamevaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:2658: kiñca śākhāntaroktapādārthasya śākhāntare siddhavatparāmarśo vidyaikyaṃ darśayatītyāha-tathā mahadbhayamityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:2659: eṣa nara etasminnadvaye 'lpamapyantaraṃ bhedaṃ yadā paśyatyatha tadā tasya saṃsārabhayaṃ bhavatyeva, yasmādviduṣo narasya bhedadarśinastadeva
GSP33brssgo3u:2674: sthite caivaṃ sarvavedāntapratyayatve sarvavijñānānāmanyatroditānāṃ vijñānaguṇānāmanyatrāpi samāne vijñāna upasaṃhāro bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:2676: ya eva hi teṣāṃ guṇānāmekatrārtho viśiṣṭavijñānopakārakaḥ sa evānyatrāpi /
GSP33brssgo3u:2680: yadi hi vijñānabhedo bhavettato vijñānāntaranibaddhatvādguṇānāṃ prakṛtivikṛtibhāvābhāvācca na syādupasaṃhāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2682: asyaiva tu prayojanasūtrasya prapañcaḥ sarvābhedādityārabhya bhaviṣyati //
GSP33brssgo3u:2684: śākhābhede samānavidyāyāṃ śrutā guṇā yathāśruti vyavasthitā uta ekatrāśrutā itaraśākhāta upasaṃhartavyā iti saṃdehe vidyaikye 'pi tatra tatroktaireva guṇairvidyopakārasiddheḥ śākhābhedena guṇā vyavasthitā iti
GSP33brssgo3u:2692: nanvāgneyayāgāvaruddhānāṃ guṇānāṃ tato 'bhinne saurye prāptivadvidyāntarasthaguṇānāṃ vidyāntare prāptiḥ kiṃ syādityata
GSP33brssgo3u:2694: prakṛtiguṇānāṃ vikāre prāptiryuktā vidyānāṃ tu prakṛtivikṛtibhāvāsiddherna tatprāptirityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:2704: 1.3.2) iti prakramya vāgādīnprāṇānasurapāpmaviddhatvena ninditvā mukhyaprāṇaparigrahaḥ paṭhyate - 'atha hemamāsanyaṃ prāṇamūcustvaṃ na
GSP33brssgo3u:2705: udgāyeti tatheti tebhya eṣa prāṇa udagāyat' (bṛ. 1.3.7) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2708: tathaiva mukhyaprāṇaparigrahaḥ paṭhyate - 'atha ha ya evāyaṃ mukhyaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:2714: anyathā hi prakramante vājasaneyino 'nyathā chandogāḥ 'tvaṃ na udgāya'
GSP33brssgo3u:2723: vājasaneyake 'picodgīthasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ prāṇasya śrutam - 'eṣa u vā udgīthaḥ' (bṛ. 1.3.23) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2732: 'te ha devāḥ sāttvikavṛttayaḥ prāṇā anyonyamucūrhantedānīmasminyajñe udgīthenaudgātreṇa karmaṇā rajastamovṛttirūpānasurānatītya devatvaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:2733: gacchāmaḥ'iti te caivaṃ nirdeṣamudgīthakartāramupāsyaṃ nirdhārayituṃ kṛtasaṃvādāḥ prathamaṃ vācyaṃ parīkṣitavantastvamaudgātraṃ no 'smākaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:2734: kurviti tayā tvanṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ tathā ghrāṇacakṣuḥśrotramanāṃsyapi kāmenāsurapāpmanā grastānīti ninditvā āsanyamāsye bhavaṃ mukhamadhyasthaṃ prāṇamupāsyaṃ nirdhāritavanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2737: atra pūrvādhikaraṇasiddhāntanyāyenodgīthavidyeti saṃjñaikyena vidyaikyamiti pūrvapakṣe mitho guṇopasaṃhāraḥ phalaṃ, siddhānte saṃjñaikye 'pi vidyaikyāpavādādanupasaṃhāra iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2738: evaṃ yatra pūrvanyāyena pūrvapakṣaḥ tatrāpavādikī saṃgatiriti mantavyam
GSP33brssgo3u:2740: saṃpūrṇodgīthakarmakartā prāṇo vājināmupāsyaḥ, udgāyeti kartṛśabdācchandogānāṃ tūdgīthāvayava oṅkāraḥ prāṇadṛṣṭyopāsyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2741: oṃmityetadakṣaramudgīthamityupakramya prāṇamudgīthamiti karmarūpatvaśabdāt, tathāca kartṛkarmaṇorūpāsyayorbhedādvidyayoranyathātvaṃ bheda iti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2745: asurātyayābhiprāyaḥ asurajayārthaṃ saṃvādaḥ, yathāśmānaṃ prāpya loṣṭo
GSP33brssgo3u:2746: vidhvaṃsate tathā prāṇaṃ hantumāgatā asurāstasya vīryeṇa svayameva dhvastā iti śrutamubhayatretyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:2748: udgīthakartṛrūpatvena prāṇasyobhayatra śrutatvādekatra śrutaṃ kartṛtvamapyubhayatra draṣṭavyamityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:2752: na vā vidyaikatvamātra nyāyyaṃ vidyābheda evātra nyāyyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2758: ityevamudgīthāvayavasyoṅkārasyopāsyatvaṃ prastutya rasatamādiguṇopavyākhyānaṃ tatra kṛtvā atha khalvetasyaivākṣarasyopavyākhyānaṃ bhavati (chā. 1.1.10) iti punarapi tamevodgīthāvayavamoṅkāramanuvartya devāsurākhyāyikādvāreṇa tam
GSP33brssgo3u:2760: tatra yadyudgīthaśabdena sakalā bhaktirabhipreyeta tasyāśca kartodgātartviktata upakramaścoparapadhyeta lakṣaṇā ca psajyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:2764: tvaṃ na udgāya (bṛ. 1.3.2) ityapi tasyāḥ kartodgātartvikprāṇatvena
GSP33brssgo3u:2766: yadapi tatrodgīthasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ prāṇasya tadapyudgātṛtvenaiva didarśayiṣitasya prāṇasya sarvātmatvapratipādanārthamiti na vidyaikatvamāvahati /
GSP33brssgo3u:2767: sakalabhaktiviṣaya eva ca tatrāpyudgīthaśabda iti vaiṣamyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2770: tathāca tatraiva śrāvitam- vācā ca hyeva sa prāṇena codagāyat (bṛ. 1.3.24)
GSP33brssgo3u:2773: tathāhyabhyudayavākye paśukāmavākye ca tredhā taṇḍulānvibhajedye madhyamāḥ syustānagnaye dātre puroḍāśamaṣṭākapālaṃ kuryāt ityādinirdeśasāmye 'pyupakramabhedādabhyudayavākye davatāpanayo 'dhyavasitaḥ, paśukāmavākye tu yāgavidhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2776: yathā paramātmadṛṣṭyadhyāsasāmye 'pi 'ākośo hyevaibhyo jyāyānākśaḥ parāyaṇam' (chā. 1.9.1) 'sa eṣa parovarīyānudgīthaḥ sa eṣo 'nantaḥ' (chā.
GSP33brssgo3u:2777: 1.9.2) iti parovarīyastvaguṇaviśiṣṭamudgīthopāsanamakṣyādityādigatahiraṇyaśmaśrutvādiguṇaviśiṣṭodgīthopāsanādbhinnam nacetaretaraguṇopasaṃhāra ekasyāmapi śākhāyāṃ tadvacchākhāntarastheṣvapyevañjātīyakeṣūpāsaneṣviti FN: vaiṣamyamubhayatra vidyānānātvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2782: tadavayavamityarthaḥ pṛthivyādirasānāṃ rasatama oṅkāraḥ, āptiḥ samṛddhiriti guṇānuktvā guṇavatyoṅkāre prāṇadṛṣṭividhānāyākhyāyikā prastutetyāha-rasatameti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2784: saṃpūrṇasāmabhaktiparamastu, prāṇamudgīthamityatrāpyudgīthakartā prāṇa upāsya iti vyākhyāyatāmityata āha-tatra yadyudgītheti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2785: oṅkāropāstyupakramasaṅga udgīthapade kartṛlakṣaṇā ceti doṣadvayaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2786: nanu siddhānte 'pi tatpade 'vayavalakṣaṇā svīkāryā tato varaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:2787: kartṛlakṣaṇā śrutyantarānugrahāttathā copasaṃhāre kartṛprāṇopāstiniścayādupakrame 'pi tanniścaya ityata āha-upakrameti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2793: evaṃ chāndogye oṅkāra upāsya ukta itaratra tu prāṇa ityupāsyabhedādvidyābheda ityāha-vājeti
GSP33brssgo3u:2796: tatrodgītha upāsyatayā noktaḥ kintu prāṇasyopāsyasya guṇatayetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2803: ekatrodgātā prāṇa upāsyo 'nyatroṅkāra ityantaraṅgopāsyarūpabhede spaṣṭe sati bahiraṅgārthavādasāmyamātreṇa nopāsanaikyaṃ yuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2805: 'vi vā etaṃ prajayā paśubhirardhayati vardhayatyasya bhrātṛvyaṃ yasya havirniruptaṃ purastāccandramā abhyudeti tredhā taṇḍulānvibhajedye
GSP33brssgo3u:2806: madhyamāḥ syustānagnaye dātre puroḍāśamaṣṭākapālaṃ kuryādye sthaviṣṭhāstānindrāya pradātre dadhaṃścaruṃ ye 'ṇiṣṭhāstānviṣṇave
GSP33brssgo3u:2808: asyārthaḥ-yasya yajamānasya caturdaśyāmevāmāvāsyābhrāntyādarśakarmārthaṃ pravṛttasya purastātpūrvaṃ havistaṇḍuladadhipayorūpaṃ niruptaṃ darśadevatābhyo 'gnyādibhyaḥ saṅkalpitaṃ candramāśca paścādabhyudeti
GSP33brssgo3u:2809: tametaṃ yajamānaṃ kālavyatyayāparādhāttadeva niruptaṃ haviḥ prajādinārdhayati viyojayati śatruṃ cāsya vardhayati yasmātkālabhrāntimānyajamānaḥ, ye madhyamādibhāvena tredhā bhūtāstaṇḍulā dadhyādisahitā niruptāstānvibhajedagnyādibhyo viyojayadviyojya ca dātṛtvādiguṇakānagnyādibhyo darśadevābhinnebhyo nirvapediti dadhan dadhani sthaviṣṭhataṇḍulacaruṃ śṛte dugdhe 'ṇiṣṭhacarumityarthaḥ atra kālāparādhe devāntarayuktaṃ prāyaścittarūpaṃ darśādbhinnaṃ karma vidhīyata iti prāpte taṇḍulatredhātvādyanuvādena vibhajediti haviṣaḥ prakṛtadevaviyogena tasminneva darśakarmaṇi devatāntarasaṃbandhamātravidhānaṃ na karmāntaramiti siddhāntitam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2810: evamabhyudayavākye kālāparādhenopakramāddarśakarmaṇyeva haviṣaḥ pūrvadevatābhyo 'panayo viyogo 'dhyavasitaḥ, paśukāmavākye tu yadyapi ye sthaviṣṭhāstānagnaye sanimate 'ṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapedye madhyamāstān viṣaṇave śipiviṣṭāya śṛte caruṃ ye kṣodiṣṭhāstānindrāya pradātre dadhaṃścarumiti nirdeśo 'bhyudayavākyena samo 'sti, tathāpi yaḥ paśukāmaḥ syātso 'māvāsyāmiṣṭvā vatsānapākuryāditi nityaṃ darśakarma
GSP33brssgo3u:2811: samāpya punardehārthaṃ vatsāpākaraṇavidhyupakramātpaśukāmasya yāgāntaravidhireva nābhyudayavākyenārthaikyamiti tathā prakṛte 'pi
GSP33brssgo3u:2815: para iti sakārāntaṃ parasmāt paraścāsau varācca varatara iti parovarīyānityekaṃ padam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2821: saṃjñātaś cet tad uktam asti tu tad api |
GSP33brssgo3u:2826: tadeva cātra nyāyyataraṃ śrutyakṣarānugataṃ hi tatsaṃjñaikatvaṃ tu śrutyakṣarabāhyamudgīthaśabdamātraprayogāllaukikairvyahartṛbhirupacaryate asti caitatsaṃjñaikatvaṃ prasiddhabhedeṣvapi parovarīyastvādyupāsaneṣūdgīthavidyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2827: tathā prasiddhabhedānāmapyagnihotradarśapūrṇamāsādīnāṃ kāṭhakaikagranthaparipaṭhitānāṃ kāṭhakasaṃjñakatvaṃ dṛśyate tathehāpi bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssgo3u:2828: yatra tu nāsti kaścidevañjātīyako bhedahetustatra bhavatu saṃjñaikatvādvidyaikatvaṃ yathā saṃvargavidyādiṣu // 8 //
GSP33brssgo3u:2834: asati bādhake saṃjñaikyamapi mānaṃ yathā saṃvargavidyeti saṃjñaikyātsarvaśākhāsu tadvidyaikyaṃ, tathā pañcāgnyādividyaikyamityādyasūtre darśitamityarthaḥ //8//
GSP33brssgo3u:2844: yathā nāmni brahmabuddhāvadhyasyamānāyāmapyanuvartata eva nāmabuddhirna brahmabuddhyā nivartate
GSP33brssgo3u:2847: apavādo nāma yatra kasmiṃścidvastuni pūrvaniviṣṭāyāṃ mithyābuddhau niścitāyāṃ paścādupajāyamānā yathārthā buddhiḥ pūrvaniviṣṭāyā mithyābuddhernivartikā bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:2855: viśeṣaṇaṃ punaḥ sarvavedavyāpina omityetasyākṣarasya grahaṇaprasaṅga audgātraviśeṣasya samarpaṇam
GSP33brssgo3u:2858: evametasminsāmānādhikaraṇyavākye vimṛśyamāna ete pakṣāḥ pratibhānti tatrānyatamanirdhāraṇakāraṇābhāvādanirdāraṇaprāptāvidamucyate - vyāpteśca samañjasamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2860: tadiha kṣayaḥ pakṣāḥ sāvadyā iti paryudasyante /
GSP33brssgo3u:2862: tatrādhyāse tāvadyā buddhiritaratrādhyasyate tacchabdasya lakṣaṇāvṛttitvaṃ prasajyeta tatphalaṃ ca kalpyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:2863: śrūyata eva phalam 'āpayitā ha vai kāmānāṃ bhavati' (chā. 1.1.7) ityādīti cet /
GSP33brssgo3u:2874: nāpyekatvapakṣaḥ saṃgacchate niṣprayojanaṃ hi tadā śabdadvayoccāraṇaṃ syāt
GSP33brssgo3u:2876: naca hautraviṣaya ādhvaryavaviṣaye vākṣara oṅkāraśabdavācya udgīthaśabdaprasiddhirasti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2881: sarvavyāpyakṣaramiha mā prasañjītyata udgīthaśabdenākṣaraṃ viśeṣyate kathaṃ nāmodgīthāvayavabhūta oṅkāro gṛhyeteti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2886: adhyāsapakṣe hyarthāntarabuddhirarthāntare nikṣipyata iti viprakṛṣṭā lakṣaṇā viśeṣaṇapakṣe pravṛttāḥ śabdā avayaveṣvapi pravartamānā dṛṣṭāḥ paṭagrāmādiṣu /
GSP33brssgo3u:2892: pūrvamudgātṛkarmātmakodgīthāvayavatvamoṅkārasya dhyeyasya viśeṣaṇaṃ siddhavatkṛtya dhyeyabhedādvidyābhedaḥ siddhāntitaḥ sa na yukta ityākṣepasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣayati-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2893: atra pūrvapakṣe pūrvoktasiddhāntāsiddhiḥ phalaṃ siddhānte tatsiddhiriti matvā siddhāntasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-caśabda ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:2895: yasyodgīthasya buddhiroṅkāre 'dhyasyate tadvācakodgīthaśabdasyoṅkāre lakṣaṇā syāttadbuddhiviṣayatvaguṇaparatvāttathā saṃbandho 'pyasiddhaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:2896: kalpanīyaḥ, pratīkopāsteḥ phalaṃ ca kalpyamiti gauravaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2899: 'oṅkāra āptiḥ samṛddhiriti' 'ya upāste sa kāmānāpnoti'iti śrutaṃ phalaṃ nādhyāsasyetyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:2901: bhrāntiścet nivarteta na tu nivartata ityabhrantirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2902: kiñca tattvabodhakādvākyādbhrāntyapavādo bhavati nedaṃ vākyaṃ tattvaparamityāha-naceti
GSP33brssgo3u:2908: adhyāsapakṣe tadbuddhiviṣayatvaguṇayogarūpaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kalpya iti viprakṛṣṭā lakṣaṇā avayavalakṣaṇā tu saṃnikṛṣṭā avayavāvayavisaṃbandhasya kḷptatvāt, paṭāvayave dagdhe paṭo dagdha iti loke prayogācca /
GSP33brssgo3u:2909: nāmādau brahmaśabdasya tvagatyā brahmabuddhigrāhyatvaguṇalakṣaṇāśritā tatra pratīkopāstervivakṣitatvāt
GSP33brssgo3u:2910: iha tu pratīkopāstividhikalpane āptyādiguṇakoṅkāre prāṇadṛṣṭividhāne ca vākyabhedaḥ syādataḥ sarvavedavyāpyoṅkāranirāsenoṅkāre prāṇadṛṣṭividhānārthaṃ viśeṣaṇameva samañjasaṃ kalpnālāghavāditi siddham //9//
GSP33brssgo3u:2916: vājināṃ chandogānāṃ ca prāṇasaṃvāde śraiṣṭhyaguṇānvitasya prāṇasyopāsyatvamuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2917: vāgādayo 'pi hi tatra vasiṣṭhatvādiguṇānvitā uktāḥ te ca prāṇe punaḥ pratyarpitāḥ - 'yadvā ahaṃ vasiṣṭho 'smi tvaṃ tadvasiśṣo 'si' (bṛ. 6.1.14)
GSP33brssgo3u:2919: anyeṣāmapi tu śākhināṃ kauṣītaki prabhṛtīnāṃ prāṇasaṃvādeṣu athāto niḥśreyasādānam 'etā ha vai devatā ahaṃśreyase vivadamānāḥ' (kau. 2.14)
GSP33brssgo3u:2920: ityevañjātīyakeṣu prāṇasya śraiḥṣṭamuktaṃ na tvime vasiṣṭhatvādayo 'pi
GSP33brssgo3u:2922: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimime vasiṣṭhatvādayo guṇāḥ kvaciduktā anyatrāpyasyerannuta nāsyeranniti
GSP33brssgo3u:2925: 'atho ya evaṃ vidvānprāṇe niḥśreyasaṃ viditvā' iti tatratatraivaṃśabdena vedyaṃ vastu nivedyate
GSP33brssgo3u:2926: evaṃśabdaśca saṃnihitāvalambano na śākhāntaraparipaṭhimevañjātīyakaṃ guṇajātaṃ śaknoti nivedayitum
GSP33brssgo3u:2928: evaṃ prāpte pratyāha - asyetanniyame guṇāḥ kvaciduktā vasiṣṭhatvādayo
GSP33brssgo3u:2933: abhede ca vijñānasya kathamime guṇāḥ kvaciduktā anyatra nāsyeran /
GSP33brssgo3u:2934: nanvevaṃśabdastatra tatra bhedenaivañjātīyakaṃ guṇajātaṃ vedyatvāya samarpayatītyuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2935: atrocyate - yadyapi kauṣītakibrāhmaṇagatenaivaṃśabdena vājasaneyibrāhmaṇagataṃ guṇajātamasaṃśabditamasaṃnihitatvāttathāpi tasminneva vijñāne vājasaneyibrāhmaṇagatenaivaṃśabdena tatsaṃśabditamiti na paraśākhāgatamapyabhinnavijñānāvaruddhaṃ guṇajātaṃ svaśākhāgatādviśiṣyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2937: ekasyāmapi hi śākhāyāṃ śrutā guṇāḥ śrutā eva sarvatra bhavanti guṇavato bhedābhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:2938: nahi devadattaḥ śauryādiguṇatvena svadeśe prasiddho deśāntaraṃ gatastaddeśyairavibhāvitaśauryādiguṇo 'pyatadguṇo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:2950: te ca guṇāḥ prāṇasya śraiṣṭhyaṃ niścitya vāgādibhistasminnarpitā iti śākhādvayasaṃmator'thaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:2957: yathā vāgādibhyaḥ prāṇaśraiṣṭhyaṃ siddhamatho tathā ya evaṃ śraiṣṭhyaguṇaṃ vidvānupāste sa prāṇe śraiṣṭhyaṃ viditvā śreṣṭho bhavatīti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2958: evaṃ jātīyakavidyaikyātprāptamārthikaṃ vasiṣṭhatvādiguṇajātamevaṃśabdo na gṛhṇāti śrutāvalambitvāditi prāpte siddhāntayati-asyeranniti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2959: vājasaneyibrāhmaṇe tāvadevaṃśabdena vasiṣṭhatvādiguṇajātasya prāṇavidyāsaṃbandhaḥ siddhaḥ saiva vidyā kauṣītakiśrutau pratyabhijñāyate, tathāca guṇānāṃ guṇyavinābhāvenārthataḥ prāptānāmapi śrutaguṇairavirodhātsahaiva śrutamārthaṃ ca guṇajātaṃ śrutyarthābhyāṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:2964: aparigaṇitā api guṇāḥ śrutā evetyatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-nahīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2971: brahmasvarūpapratipādanaparāsu śrutiṣvānandarūpatvaṃ vijñānaghanatvaṃ sarvagatatvaṃ sarvātmatvamityevañjātīyakā brahmaṇo dharmāḥ kvacitkecicchrūyante /
GSP33brssgo3u:2972: teṣu saṃśayaḥ - kimānandādayo brahmadharmā yatra yāvantaḥ śrūyante tāvanta
GSP33brssgo3u:2973: eva tatra pratipattavyāḥ kiṃvā sarve sarvatreti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2975: ānandādayaḥ pradhānasya brahmaṇo dharmāḥ sarve sarvatra pratipattavyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2978: sarvatra hi tadevaikaṃ pradhānaṃ viśeṣyaṃ brahma na bhidyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2979: tasmātsārvatrikatvaṃ brahmadharmāṇāṃ tenaiva pūrvādhikaraṇoditena devadattaśauryadinidarśanena nanvevaṃ sati priyaśirastvādayo 'pi dharmāḥ sarvatra saṃkīryeran /
GSP33brssgo3u:2990: brahmaṇastu nirviśeṣatvātsvaśākhāgatapadaireva pramitisiddhervyarthaḥ padāntaropasaṃhāra iti pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2992: ānandatvasatyatvajñānatvādisāmānyāni brahmaṇi kalpitā dharmāsteṣāṃ sarvaśākhāsūpasaṃhāro nāma tadvācakānandādipadānāmekavākyatayoccāraṇaṃ ānandaḥ satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma śuddhamadvayamātmeti tāni ca samānādhikaraṇāni padāni viruddhadharmatyāgena sarvādhiṣṭhānabhūtāmekāmakhaṇḍavyaktiṃ kṣayanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2993: na caikenaiva padena lakṣyasiddheḥ padāntaraṃ vyarthamiti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3000: tacca viśeṣadarśanaṃ yāvadbhiḥ padairbhavati tāvanti padānyupasaṃhartavyānīti bhāvaḥ //11//
GSP33brssgo3u:3005: priyaśirastvādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ taittirīyaka āmnātānāṃ nāstyanyatra prāptiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3006: yatkāraṇaṃ priyaṃ modaḥ pramoda ānanda ityete parasparāpekṣayā bhoktrantarāpekṣayā copacitāpacitarūpā upalabhyante /
GSP33brssgo3u:3009: nacaite priyaśirastvādayo brahmadharmāḥ, kośadharmāstveta ityupadiṣṭamasmābhiḥ 'ānandamayo 'bhyāsāt' (bra.sū. 1.1.12) ityatra /
GSP33brssgo3u:3010: apica parasminbrahmaṇi cittāvatāropāyamātratvenaite parikalpyante na draṣṭavyatvena /
GSP33brssgo3u:3013: sa ca nyāyo 'nyeṣu niściteṣu brahmadharmeṣūpāsanāyopadiśyamāneṣu netavyaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:3015: teṣu hi satyapyupāsyasya brahmaṇa ekatme prakramabhedādupāsanābhede sati nānyonyadharmāṇāmanyonyatra prāptiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3016: yathā ca dve nāryāvekaṃ nṛpatimupāsate chatreṇaikā cāmareṇānyā tatropāsyaikatve 'pyupāsanābhedo dharmavyavasthā ca bhavetyevamihāpīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3017: upacitāpacitaguṇatvaṃ hi sati bhedavyavahāre saguṇe brahmaṇyupapadyate na nirguṇe parasminbrahmaṇi
GSP33brssgo3u:3018: ato na satyakāmatvādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kvacicchrutānāṃ sarvatra prāptirityarthaḥ // 12 //
GSP33brssgo3u:3019: brahmaikyāccedānandatvādidharmāṇāṃ sarvatra prāptistarhi saguṇabrahmavidyāgatadharmaprāptirapi syāditi śaṅkānirāsārthaṃ sūtraṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3021: putradarśanasukhaṃ priyaṃ tadvārtādinā modastasya vidyādyatiśaye pramoda ityevaṃ tāratamyavanto dharmāstvadvaye jñeye na prāpnuvanti teṣāmabrahmasvarūpāṇāṃ brahmajñānānupayogāditi bhāvaḥ teṣāṃ brahma dharmatvaṃ cāsiddhamityāha-na caita iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3033: itare tvānandādayo dharmā brahmasvarūpapratipādanāyaivocyamānā arthasāmānyātpratipādyasya brahmaṇo dharmiṇa ekatvātsarve sarvatra pratīyeranniti vaiṣamyaṃ pratipattimātraprayojanā hi ta iti // 13 //
GSP33brssgo3u:3042: kāṭhake hi paṭhyate - 'indriyebhyaḥ parā hyarthā arthebhyaśca paraṃ manaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3043: manasastu parā buddhiḥ' (ka. 3.10) ityārabhya 'puruṣānna paraṃ kiñcitsā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ' (ka. 3.11 ) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3044: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimime sarva evārthādayastatastataḥ paratvena pratipādyanta uta puruṣa evaibhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ paraḥ pratipādyata iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3045: tatra tāvatsarveṣāmevaiṣāṃ paratvena pratipādanamiti bhavati matiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3048: nanu bahuṣvartheṣu paratvena pratipipādayiṣiteṣu vākyabhedaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3053: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - puruṣa eva hyebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ paraḥ pratipādya iti yuktaṃ na pratyekameṣāṃ paratvapratipādanam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3056: nahītareṣu paratvena pratipanneṣu kiñcitprayojanaṃ dṛśyate prayojanaṃ mokṣasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3058: apica parapratiṣedhena kāṣṭhāśabdena ca puruṣaviṣayamādaraṃ darśayanpuruṣapratipattyarthaiva pūrvāparapravāhoktiriti darśayati -
GSP33brssgo3u:3065: atratvabrahmasvabhāvasyārthādiparatvasyānupasaṃhāryasya tadupāyatvamucyata ityekaphalakatvaṃ saṃgatiḥ tattatparatvaviśiṣṭatvenārthādīnāmapūrvatayā pratipādyānāṃ bhedādvākyabhedo na doṣa iti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3066: utsūtrasiddhāntaṃ pratijñāya sautraṃ hetuṃ vyācaṣṭe-puruṣa eveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3067: phalavattve satyapūrvatvātpuruṣasyaiva prādhānyena pratipādyatvamaphalārthādīnāṃ paratvaṃ tu taccheṣatvenocyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3068: kiñca 'puruṣānna paraṃ kiñcitsā kāṣṭhā'iti vedaḥ paraniṣedhaliṅgena sarvabādhāvadhitvaliṅgena ca puruṣe tātparyaṃ darśayanpūrvasmātpūrvasmādaparasyāparasya paratvoktistadartheti
GSP33brssgo3u:3070: arthādīnāmatroktirādhyānāya tattatparatvādhyānapūrvakaṃ puruṣadarśanāyaiva svataḥ prayojanābhāvāditi sūtraṃ yojayati-ādhyānāyeti
GSP33brssgo3u:3075: yatkāraṇam 'eṣa sarveṣu bhūteṣu gūḍhotmā na prakāśate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3076: dṛśyate tvagryayā buddhyā sūkṣmayā sūkṣmadarśibhiḥ' (kaṭha. 3.12) iti prakṛtaṃ puruṣamātmetyāha
GSP33brssgo3u:3078: tasyaiva ca durvijñānatāṃ saṃskṛtamitigamyatāṃ ca darśayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3081: evamanekaprakāra āśayātiśayaḥ śruteḥ puruṣe lakṣyate netareṣu /
GSP33brssgo3u:3082: apica 'so 'dhvanaḥ pāramāpnoti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam' (ka. 3.9) ityukte kiṃ tadadhvanaḥ pāraṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3083: padamityasyāmākāṅkṣāyāmindriyādyanukramaṇātparamapadapratipattyartha evāyamāyāma ityavasīyate ātmatvādiliṅgaiśca puruṣa eva pratipādya ityāha-ātmaśabdācceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3091: aitareyake śrūyate - 'ātmā vā idameka evāgra āsīnnānyatkiñcana miṣatsa īkṣata lokānnu sṛjā' (ai. 1.1) iti 'sa imāṃllokānasṛjatāmbho
GSP33brssgo3u:3093: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ para evātmaśabdenābhilapyata utānyaḥ kaściditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3097: nanu vākyānvayaḥ sutarāṃ paramātmaviṣayo dṛśyate prāgutpatterātmaikatvāvadhāraṇāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3101: paramātmani hi sraṣṭari parigṛhyamāṇe mahābhūtasṛṣṭirādau vaktavyā lokasṛṣṭistvihādāvucyate
GSP33brssgo3u:3107: smṛtirapi 'sa vai śarīrī prathamaḥsa vai puruṣaḥ ucyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3108: ādikartā sa bhūtānāṃ brahmāgre samavartata' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3109: aitareyiṇo 'pi athāto retasaḥ prajāpate reto devāḥ ityatra
GSP33brssgo3u:3115: apica tābhyo gāmānayattābhyo 'śvamānayattābhyoḥ puruṣamānayattā abruvannityevañjātīyako bhūyānvyāpāraviśeṣo laukikeṣu viśeṣavatsvātmasu prasiddha ihānugamyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3117: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - 'para evātmehātmaśabdena gṛhyata itaravat /
GSP33brssgo3u:3118: yathetareṣu sṛṣṭiśravaṇeṣu tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' (tai.
GSP33brssgo3u:3120: yathā cetarasmiṃllaukikātmaśabdaprayoge pratyagātmaiva mukhya ātmaśabdena gṛhyate tathehāpi bhavitumarhati yatra tu 'ātmaivedamagra āsīt' (bṛ.
GSP33brssgo3u:3121: 1.4.1) ityevamādau 'puruṣavidhaḥ' (bṛ. 1.4.1) ityevamādi viśeṣaṇāntaraṃ śrūyate bhavettatra viśeṣata ātmano grahaṇam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3126: FN: ambhaḥ svargaḥ , marīcayo 'ntarikṣalokaḥ , maro martyalokaḥ , āpaḥ pātālalokaḥ //
GSP33brssgo3u:3133: ambhaḥ svargaḥ, marīcayo 'ntarikṣalokaḥ, maro martyalokaḥ, āpaḥ pātālaloka ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3138: puruṣavākyādbhedaprasaṅgādarthādivākyānāṃ nārthādipratipādakatvamityuktaṃ tadvadihāpi prajāpate reto devā iti pūrvasmātprajāpativākyādbhedaprasaṅgādātmā vā ityādivākyasya na brahmaparatvamiti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣayati-na paramātmetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:3145: ambho marīcīrmaramāpa iti sūtrayitvā svayameva śrutirvyācaṣṭe-pareṇa
GSP33brssgo3u:3146: divaṃ divaḥ parastāddivi pratiṣṭhitaścandrāmbhasā vyāpto yo lokaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:3147: tadambhaḥ, antarikṣaṃ marīcayaḥ, pṛthivī maraḥ, yā adhastāttā āpa iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3155: kiñca prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā tāḥ prati bhogārthaṃ gāmānayallokasraṣṭā tathāśvamānayat /
GSP33brssgo3u:3156: tāstu gavāśvaprāptyā na tṛptāstataḥ puruṣaśarīre ānīte tā abruvaṃstṛptāḥ sma iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3157: ayaṃ ca vyavahāro lokasraṣṭuḥ prajāpatitve liṅgamityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3176: śrutyantaraprasiddho hi samānaviṣayo viśeṣaḥ śrutyantareṣūpasaṃhartavyo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3179: nahyayaṃ sakalaḥ kathāprabandho vivakṣata iti śakyate vaktuma,
GSP33brssgo3u:3182: tathāhyamabhaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ lokānāṃ lokapālānāṃ cāgnyādīnāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ śiṣṭāvā karaṇāni karaṇāyatanaṃ ca śarīramupadiśya sa eva sraṣṭā 'kathaṃ nvidaṃ madṛte syāt' (ai. 3.11 iti vīkṣyedaṃ śarīraṃ praviveśeti darśayati - 'sa
GSP33brssgo3u:3183: etameva sīmānaṃ vidāryaitayā dvārā prāpadyata' (ai. 3.12) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3185: ityevamādinā karaṇavyāpāravivecanapūrvakam 'atha ko 'ham' (ai. 3.11) iti vīkṣya 'sa etameva puruṣaṃ brahma tatamamapaśyat' (ai. 3.13) iti brahmātmatvadarśanamavadhārayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3186: tathopariṣṭāt eṣa brahmaiṣa indraḥ (ai. 5.3) ityādinā samastabhedajātaṃ saha mahābhūtairamukramya 'sarvaṃ tatprajñānetraṃ prajñāne pratiṣṭhitaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3187: prajñānetro lokaḥ prajñā pratiṣṭhā prajñānaṃ brahma' (aita. 5.3) iti brahmātmatvadarśanamevāvadhārayati
GSP33brssgo3u:3190: vājasaneyake 'katama ātmeti yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu hṛdyantarjyotiḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:3197: tatra saṃśayaḥ - tulyārthatvaṃ kimanayorāmnānayoḥ syādatulyārthatvaṃ veti
GSP33brssgo3u:3211: yaduktamupakramānvayādupakrame cātmaśabdaśravaṇābhāvānnātmagṛhītiriti tasya kaḥ parihāra iti cetso 'bhidhīyate syādavadhāraṇāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3218: anyathā hi yo 'yaṃ mikhya ātmā sa na vijñāta iti naiva sarvavijñānaṃ saṃpadyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:3219: tathā prāgutpatterekatvāvadhāraṇaṃ jīvasya cātmaśabdena parāmarśaḥ svāpāvasthāyāṃ ca tatsvabhāvasaṃpattikathanaṃ paricodanāpūrvakaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ 'tattvamasi' (chā. 6.8.7) ityavadhāraṇamiti ca sarvametattādātmyapratipādanāyāmevāvakalpate na tādātmyasaṃpādanāyām /

GSP33brssgo3u:3223: sacchabdārtho 'pi ca paryālocyamāno na mukhyādātmano 'nyaḥ saṃbhavatyato
GSP33brssgo3u:3236: etameva sīmānaṃ mūrdhnaḥ keśavibhāgāvasānaṃ vidārya chidraṃ kṛtvā etayā brahmarandhrākhyayā dvārā liṅgaviśiṣṭaḥ praviṣṭavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3237: māṃ vinā yadi vāgādibhiḥ svasvavyāpāraḥ kṛtaḥ, atha tadāhaṃ ka iti tvaṃpadārthaṃ vicārya svayametadeva śodhitamātmānaṃ brahma tatamaṃ vyāptatamamapaśyat /
GSP33brssgo3u:3239: prajñā cidātmā netraṃ nīyate 'neneti niyāmakaṃ yasya tat prajñānetraṃ cidātmaniyamyamityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:3244: pūrvapakṣe sattāsāmānye brahmātmatvasaṃpadupāstiśchāndogye, vājaśrutau nirguṇavidyeti bhedānmithoguṇānupasaṃhāraḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:3248: pūrvatra vākyaikyādarthādiparatvaṃ tyaktvā vidyaikyamuktamiha tu sadātmaśabdābhyāṃ jātyātmavācibhyāmupakramabhedādvākyabhede sati vidyābheda iti pratyudāharaṇasaṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3258: suptau jīvaḥ satā saṃpannau bhavatīti kathanaṃ /

GSP33brssgo3u:3275: tatra tvācamanamanagnatācintanaṃ ta prāṇasya pratīyate tkimubhayamapi vidhīyata utācamanamevotānagnatācintanameveti vicāryate /

GSP33brssgo3u:3300: apica 'yadidaṃ kiñcāśvasya ā kṛmibhya ā kīṭapataṅgebhyastatte 'nnam (bṛ.
GSP33brssgo3u:3303: sarvaṃ tu prāṇasyānnamitīyamannadṛṣṭiścodyate tatsāhacaryāccāpo vāsa ityatrāpi nāpāmācamanaṃ codyate prasiddhāsvevatvācamanīyāsvapsu paridhānadṛṣciścodyata iti yuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3308: avaśyavidheye tvanyatarasminvāsaḥkāryākhyānādapāṃ vāsaḥsaṃkalpanamevāpūrvaṃ vidhīyate nācamanaṃ pūrvavaddhi tadityupapāditam /

GSP33brssgo3u:3310: ata evācamanasyāvidhitsitatvādetameva tadanamanagnaṃ kurvanto manyanta ityatraiva kāṇvāḥ paryavasyanti nāmananti tasmādevaṃvidityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3311: tasmānmādhyandinānāmapi pāṭha ācamanānuvādenaivaṃvittvameva prakṛtaprāṇavāsovittvaṃ vidhīyata iti pratipattavyam /

GSP33brssgo3u:3316: 'me kimannaṃ kiṃ vāsaḥ'iti prāṇena pṛṣṭā vāgādayaḥ ūcuḥ, 'yadidaṃ kiṃ cāśvabhya ā kṛmibhyastatte 'nnamāpo vāsaḥ'iti sarvaprāṇibhirbhujyamānaṃ yadidaṃ prasiddhaṃ śvādiparyantamannaṃ tatprāṇasya tavānnamāpa
GSP33brssgo3u:3320: kiṃ tat, bhojanātpūrvamūrdhvaṃ cācāmantīti yattadadbhiḥ prāṇaṃ paridadhatyācchādayantītyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:3322: tat tasmādityuktārthaṃ yataḥ pūrve vidvāṃso 'śanātprāgūrdhvaṃ cācāmanta etamevānāṃ prāṇaṃ tattenācamanenānagnamācchāditaṃ kurvanto manyante
GSP33brssgo3u:3325: saṃdigdhasadupakramasya vākyaśeṣānnirṇayavadācāmantīti padasya vidhitvasaṃdehe ācāmediti vākyaśeṣādvidhitvanirṇaya iti dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣamāha-kiṃ tāvaditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3327: pūrvapakṣe prāṇavidyāṅgatvenāpūrvācamanaṃ vihitamanyatropasaṃhartavyamiti phalaṃ siddhānte tasyāvidheyatvānnāṅgatvenopasaṃhāra iti vivekaḥ ubhayavidhāne vākyabhedaḥ syādityarucyāpakṣāntaramāha-athaveti praśastaṃ hīdamācamanaṃ yasmādanena prāṇamanagnaṃ manyanta iti stutiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3330: smṛtyā śudyarthaṃ kāryatvena vihitasakalakarmāṅgatayā prāptācamanānuvādenāpūrvamanagnatādhyānameva vidhīyata iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3331: smārtamācamanaṃ śrutyā nānūdyate kiṃ tvanayā śrutyā vihitaṃ samṛtyānūdyata iti śaṅkate-nanviti
GSP33brssgo3u:3333: 'dvijo nityamupaspṛśet'ityādyā smṛtiḥ ācamanāntaravidhimupetya mūlamūlitvaṃ nirastaṃ, saṃprati vidhirasiddha ityāha-naceyaṃ śrutiriti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3335: apsu prāṇavāsastvadhyānākhyaḥ saṃkalpaḥ prāṇavidyāṅgatvena vidhīyata ityāha-tasmāditi
GSP33brssgo3u:3340: kiñca yathā pūrvavākye prāṇasyānnadhyānamaṅgaṃ vihitaṃ tathātrāpsu vāsodhyānaṃ vidhīyate anyathācamanavidhau pūrvatra dhyānavidhiruttaratra kriyāvidhirityardhavaiśasaṃ syādityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3341: bhakṣayediti śabdābhāvācchvādyannasya sarvasya manuṣveṇepāsakena bhoktumaśakyatvācca na pūrvavākye kriyāvidhirityarthaḥ /

GSP33brssgo3u:3347: ācāmediti na vidhiḥ kintu viṣṇurūpāṃśu yaṣṭavya itivadanuvāda ityatra liṅgamāha-ata eveti

GSP33brssgo3u:3356: tatra ca guṇāḥ śrūyante - sa ātmānamupāsīta manamayaṃ prāṇaśarīraṃ bhārūpam ityevamādayaḥ. tasyāmeva śāstrāyāṃ bṛhadāraṇyake punaḥ paṭhyate -
GSP33brssgo3u:3357: 'manomayo 'yaṃ puruṣo bhāḥ satyasminnantarhadaye yadā vrīhirvā yavo vā sa eṣa sarvasyeśānaḥ sarvasyādhipatiḥ sarvamidaṃ praśāsti yadidaṃ kiñca' (bṛ.
GSP33brssgo3u:3359: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimiyamekā vidyāgnirahasyabṛhadāraṇyakayorguṇopasaṃhāraścota dve ime vidye guṇānupasaṃhāraśceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3363: bhinnāsu hi śākhāsvadhyetṛbhedātpaunaruktasyaparihāramālocya vidyaikatvamadhyavasāyaikatrātiriktā guṇā itaratropasaṃhriyante prāṇasaṃvādādiṣvatyuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3364: ekasyāṃ punaḥ śākhāyāmadhyetṛveditṛbhedābhāvādaśakyaparihāre paunaruktye na viprakṛṣṭadeśasthaikā vidyā bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3366: tadā hyatiriktā eva guṇā itaratretaratra cāmnāyeranna samānā api tūbhayatrāmnāyante manomayatvadayaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:3368: evaṃ prāpte brūmahe - yathā bhinnāsu śākhāsu vidyaikatvaṃ guṇopasaṃhāraśca bhavatyevamekasyāmapi śākhāyāṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3376: ekaṃ hyāmnānaṃ vidyāvidyāvidhānārthamaparaṃ guṇavidhānārthamiti na kiñcinnopapadyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3377: nanvevaṃ sati yadupaṭhimagnirahasye tadeva bṛhadāraṇyake paṭhitavyam sa eṣa sarvasyeśānaḥ ityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3378: yattu paṭhitameva manomaya ityādi cenna paṭhitavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3381: masānaguṇāmnānena hi viprakṛṣṭadeśāṃ śāṇḍilyavidyāṃ pratyabhijñāpya tasyāmīśānatvādyupadiśyate
GSP33brssgo3u:3383: apicāprāptāṃśopadeśenārthavati vākye saṃjāte prāptāṃśaparāmarśasya nityānuvādatayāpyupapadyamānatvānna tadbalena pratyabhijñopodituṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3390: iha tvekaśākhāyāṃ viprakṛṣṭadeśasthavākyayorekasya vidhitvamanyasyānuvādatvamityaniścayāddvayorapi vidyāvidhitvamiti pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣayati-kiṃ tāvaditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3391: yatpunaruktaṃ, tadvidyāntaramiti na vyāptiḥ prāṇapañcāgnyādividyāsu vyabhicāradityāśaṅkya
GSP33brssgo3u:3393: yathāgnihotravākye karmavidhiḥ, 'dadhnā juhoti'iti vākye guṇavidhistathātrāpyastu na vidyāmeda ityāśaṅkyāha-nacātraikamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3396: uktaguṇoktirna vṛthā katipayaguṇaviśiṣṭopāsyābhedapratyabhijñānārthatvādata upāsyarūpābhedādbhinnaśākhāsviva samānaśākhāyāmapi vidyaikyamiti siddhāntasūtraṃ yojayati-yatheti /

GSP33brssgo3u:3407: cāyatanaviśeṣamupadiśya vyāhṛtiśarīratvaṃ ca saṃpādya dve upaniṣadāvupadiśyete /

GSP33brssgo3u:3421: sadbhūtatrayaṃ tyadvāyvākāśātmakaṃ, satya parokṣabhūtātmakaṃ hiraṇyagarbhākhyaṃ brahmopakramya, taduktaṃ yatsatyaṃ tat sa yo 'sāvādityaḥ kiṃ maṇḍalaṃ na tatra sthāne puruṣaḥ karaṇātmakaḥ sa evādhyātmamakṣisthānastha ityupadiśya 'tasya bhūriti śiro bhuva iti bāhuḥ svariti pādau'iti vyāhṛtirūpaṃ śarīramuktvā dve upaniṣado rahasyadevatānāmanī upadiśyete tasyādityamaṇḍalasthasyāhariti nāma prakāśakatvāttasyākṣisthasyāhamiti nāma pratyaktvāditi /

GSP33brssgo3u:3518: sthānaviśiṣṭabhedānnāmnorvyavasthāvatsaṃbhṛtyād iguṇaviśiṣṭasya brahmaṇaḥ śāṇḍilyādividyoktaguṇaviśiṣṭabrahmaṇaśca mitho bhedena rūpabhedātsaṃbhṛtyādīnāṃ nopasaṃhāra ityuktanyāyātideśatvādasya na saṃgatyādyapekṣā yathaikasminnudgīthe parovarīyastvādiguṇopāsterhiraṇyaśmaśrutvādyupāstirbhidyate tathaikasminnapi brahmaṇi vidyābhedopapatteḥ brahmapratyabhijñā na
GSP33brssgo3u:3526: asti tāṇḍināṃ paiṅgināṃ ca rahasyabrāhmaṇe puruṣavidyā /
GSP33brssgo3u:3531: taittirīyakā api kañcitpuruṣayajñaṃ kalpayanavti - 'tasyaivaṃ viduṣo yajñasyātmā yajamānaḥ śraddhā patnī' (nārā. 80) ityetenānuvākena /
GSP33brssgo3u:3532: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ ya itaratroktāḥ puruṣayajñasya dharmāste taittirīyakeṣūpasaṃhartavyāḥ kiṃvā nopasaṃhartavyā iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3537: yathaikeṣāṃ śākhināṃ tāṇḍināṃ paiṅgināṃ ca puruṣavidyāyāmāmnānaṃ naivamitareṣāṃ taittirīyāṇāmāmnānamasti
GSP33brssgo3u:3541: yadapi kiñcinmaraṇāvabhṛthatvādisāmyaṃ tadapyalpīyastavādbhūyasā vailakṣaṇyenābhibhūyamānaṃ na pratyabhijñāpanakṣamam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3543: viduṣo yajñasyeti hi nacaite samānādhikaraṇe ṣaṣṭhyau vidvāneva yoyajñastasyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3545: vyadhikaraṇe tvete ṣaṣṭhyau viduṣo yo yajñastasyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3547: satyāṃ ca gatau mukhya evārtha āśrayitavyo na bhāktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3548: ātmā yajamāna iti ca yajamānatvaṃ puruṣasya nirbruvanvaiyadhikaraṇyenaivāsya yajñasaṃbandhaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3549: apica tasyaivaṃviduṣaiti siddhavadanuvādaśrutau satyāṃ puruṣasya yajñabhāvamātmādīnāṃ ca yajamānādibhāvaṃ pratipitsamānasya vākyabhedaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3550: apica saṃsanyāsāmātmavidyāṃ purastādupadiśyānantaraṃ tasyaivaṃviduṣa ityādyanukramaṇaṃ phasyantaḥ pūrvaśeṣa evaiṣa āmnāyo na svatantra iti pratīmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3554: āyurabhivṛddhiphalo hyasau 'sa ha --ṣoḍaśaṃ varṣaśataṃ jīvati ya evaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3558: 'puruṣo vāva yajñastasya yāni caturviśati varṣāṇi tatprātaḥ savanamatha yāni catuścatvāriṃśadvarṣāṇi tanmādhyandinaṃ savanamatha yānyaṣṭācatvāriṃśadvarṣāṇi tattṛtīyaṃ savanam'iti
GSP33brssgo3u:3559: prasiddhayajñasāmyārthaṃ savanatrayaṃ kalpitaṃ, 'sa yadaśiśiṣati yatpipāsati yanna ramate tā dīkṣā atha yadaśnāti yatpibati yadramate tā upasadaḥ atha yaddhasati yajjakṣati yanmaithunaṃ carati tāni stutaśastrāṇi atha yattapodānādi sā dakṣiṇā maraṇamevāvabhṛthaḥ vasvādirūpā me prāṇā idaṃ savanatrayaṃ yāvadāyuranusaṃtanute'ityāśīḥ

GSP33brssgo3u:3569: 'gnirdamaḥ śamayitā dakṣiṇā vāgghotā prāṇa udgātā cakṣuradhvaryurmano
GSP33brssgo3u:3572: kiñca chāndogye tridhāvibhaktāyuṣi savanatvakalpanā, atra tu sāyaṅkālādāviti vairūpyamāha-yadapīti
GSP33brssgo3u:3573: yanmaraṇaṃ tadavabhṛtho yadramate tadupasada iti tittiriśrutau sārūpyamapi bhātītyata āha-yadapi kiñciditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3575: kiñca chāndogye puruṣayajñayoraikyaṃ śrutamatra tu bheda iti
GSP33brssgo3u:3577: yadyapi niṣādasthapatinyāyena sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ṣaṣṭhyoryuktaṃ tathāpyaprasiddhaikyakalpanāgauravādyajñasyātmeti bhedokterekasyaiva yajñatvayajamānatvavirodhādātmavido yo yajñaḥ prasiddhastasyeti vaiyadhikaraṇyameva yuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3578: kiñca vidvatsaṃbandhiyajñarūpaviśeṣyānuvādena vidvadaṅgairaṅgasaṃpadvidhāvekavākyatā pratīyate tasyāṃ satyāṃ viśeṣyasyāṅāgānāṃ ca pṛthagvidhivādinastava vākyabhedadoṣaḥ syādityarthaḥ kiñca satyādibhyo nyāsa evāpare ca yaditi saṃnyāsamuktvā sarvaiḥ sarvamidaṃ jagadityevaṃ tamātmānaṃ jñātvā bhūyo na mṛtyumupayāti vidvāniti saṃnyāsasādhyātmavidyāṃ purastātprājāpatyānuvāke upadiśyānantarānuvāke tasyaivaṃ viduṣa ityuktātmavidyānuvādena praśaṃsārthatvena, taccheṣatayāyajñasaṃpattiḥ kriyate phalaikyaśruteḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3586: astyātharvaṇikānāmupaniṣadārambhe mantrasamāmnāyaḥ - 'sarvaṃ pravidhya hṛdayaṃ pravidhya dhamanīḥ pravṛjya śiro 'bhipravṛjyatridhā vipṛktaḥ'
GSP33brssgo3u:3590: kaṭhānāṃ taittirīyāṇāṃ - 'śaṃ no mitraḥ śaṃ varuṇaḥ' (tai. 1.1.1) ityādiḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:3591: vājasaneyināṃ tūpaniṣadārambhe pravargyabrāhmaṇaṃ paṭhyate - 'devā ha vai niṣeduḥ' ityādi
GSP33brssgo3u:3595: kimime sarve pravidhyamādayo mantrāḥ pravargyādīni ca karmāṇi vidyāsūpasaṃhriyerankiṃvā nopasaṃhriyeranniti mīmāṃsāmahe /
GSP33brssgo3u:3596: kiṃ tāvannaḥ pratibhāti upasaṃhāra evaiṣāṃ vidyāsviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3603: nanu naiṣāṃ mantrāṇāṃ vidyāviṣayaṃ kiñcitsāmarthyaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3604: kathaṃ ca pravargyādīni karmāṇyanyārthatvenaiva viniyuktāni santi vidyārthatvenāpi pratipadyemahīti
GSP33brssgo3u:3606: sāmarthyaṃ tāvanmantrāṇāṃ vidyāviṣayamapi kiñcicchakyaṃ kalpayituṃ hṛdayādisaṃkīrtanāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3607: hṛdayādīni hi prayeṇopāsaneṣvāyatanādibhāvenopadiṣṭāni taddvāreṇa ca hṛdayaṃ pravidhyetyevañjātīyakānāṃ mantrāṇāmupapannamupāsanāṅgatvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3610: tathā pravargyādīnāṃ karmaṇāmanyatrāpi viniyuktānāṃ satāmaviruddho vidyāsu viniyogo vājapeya iva bṛhaspatisavasyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3615: hṛdayaṃ pravidhyetyevañjātīyakānāṃ hi mantrāṇāṃ yer'thā hṛdayavedhādayo bhinnā anabhisaṃbaddhāsta upaniṣaduditābhirvidyābhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3619: hṛdayamātrasaṃkīrtanasya hyevamupayogaḥ kathañcidutprekṣyeta naca hṛdayamātramatra mantrārthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:3620: hṛdayaṃ pravidhya dhamanīḥ pravṛjyetyevañjātīyako hi na sakalo mantrārthe vidyābhirabhisaṃbadhyate
GSP33brssgo3u:3621: ābhicārikaviṣayo hyeṣor'thastasmādābhicārikeṇa karmaṇā sarvaṃ pravidhyetyetasya mantrasyābhisaṃbandhaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:3623: evamanyeṣāmapi mantrāṇāṃ keṣācilliṅgena keṣāñcidvacanena keṣāñcitpramāṇāntareṇātyevamarthāntareṣu viniyuktānāṃ rahasyapaṭhitānāmapi satāṃ na saṃnidhimātreṇa vidyāśeṣatvopapattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3624: durbalo hi saṃnidhiḥ śrutyādibhya ityuktaṃ prathame tantre
GSP33brssgo3u:3631: api caiko 'yaṃ pravargyaḥ sakṛdutpanno balīyasā pramāṇenānyatra viniyukto na durbalena pramāṇenānyatrāpi viniyogamarhati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3632: agṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatve hi pramāṇayoretadevaṃ syānnatu balavadabalavatoḥ pramāṇayoragṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatā saṃbhavati balavadabalavattvaviśeṣādeva /
GSP33brssgo3u:3633: tasmādevañjātīyakānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ vā na saṃnidhipāṭhamātreṇa vidyāśeṣatvamāśaṅkitavyam
GSP33brssgo3u:3637: he devate, madripoḥ sarvamaṅgaṃ pravidhya vidāraya viśeṣataśca hṛdayaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3638: bhindhi dhamanīḥ śirāḥ pravṛñjaya troṭaya śiraścābhito nāśaya, evaṃ tridhā vipṛkto viśliṣṭo bhavatu me śatrurityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3639: he deva savitaḥ, yajñaṃ tatpatiṃ ca prasuva nirvartayetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3640: uccaiḥ śravāḥ śveto 'śvo yasyendrasya sa tvaṃ haritamaṇivannīlo
GSP33brssgo3u:3643: agniṣṭomo brahmaiva sa yasminnahani kriyate tadapi brahma tasmādya etadahaḥ sādhyaṃ karmopayantyanutiṣṭhinti te brahmaṇaiva sādhanena brahmopayanti te ca krameṇāmṛtatvamāpnuvantīti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo3u:3647: nanu teṣāṃ śeṣatve mānābhāvānnopasaṃhāra iti śaṅkate-nanveṣāmiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3651: aphalamantrādīnāṃ phalavaccheṣatvabodhanaṃ saṃnidherarthavattvaṃ tatsaṃbhave satyakasmādarthaśūnyatvenāsau saṃnidhirāśrayituṃ nahi yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3652: nañpāṭhetvakasmāddhetuṃ vināsāvartho nāśrayituṃ nahi yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3654: purastādupasadāṃ pravargyeṇa pracarantīti vākyena pravargyasya kratuśeṣatvaṃ śrutaṃ, agniṣṭomādeśca tattadvākyena svargādyarthatvamato
GSP33brssgo3u:3657: upāstiṣu mantraprayogaḥ kvāpi na dṛṣṭa ityata āha-dṛṣṭaśceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3658: putrasya dīrghāyuṣyārthaṃ chāndogye trailokyasya keśātvenopāstiruktā tatra piturayaṃ prārthanāmantraḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:3659: tatrāmuneti putrasya trirṇāma gṛhṇāti amunā putreṇa saha bhūritīmaṃ lokamamuṃ ca prapadye na me putraviyogaḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3660: tattadvākyenānyatra viniyuktānāmapi karmaṇāṃ saṃnidhinā vidyāsu viniyogo na virudhyata ityatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-vājapeya iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3661: 'brahmavarcasakāmo bṛhaspatisavena yajeta'iti vākyena brahmavarcasaphale viniyuktasyāpi bṛhaspatisavasya 'vājapeyeneṣṭvā bṛhaspatisavena
GSP33brssgo3u:3664: yadyapyekena vākyena prakaraṇāntarasthabṛhaspatisavasya pratyabhijñānamaṅgatvavidhānaṃ ca kartumayuktaṃ vākyabhedaprasaṅgādato māsāgnihotravatkarmāntarameva bṛhaspatisavākhyamaṅgatayā vidhīyata iti na viniyuktasya viniyoga iti bhaṭṭagurutantradvayasiddhaṃ, yathāpi yathā nityāgnihotrasyāśvamedhaprakaraṇe vāgyatasyaitāṃ rātrimagnihotraṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3665: juhotīti nāmnā pratyabhijñā, yathāvā darśapūrṇamāsavikṛtīṣṭāvājyabhāgau yajatītyekasminvākye prakṛtisthājyabhāgayoḥ padena pratyabhijñānaṃ vākyena vidhānaṃ tathātrāpi bṛhaspatisavapadena pratyabhijñānaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3667: naca sādhyabhāvārthavidhāyakākhyātaparatantraṃ nāmapadaṃ na siddhakarmapratyabhijñākṣamamiti vācyaṃ, siddhasyāpyaṅgatayā punaḥ sādhyatvasaṃbhave 'nyathāsiddhākhyātasyaiva
GSP33brssgo3u:3669: nacaivaṃ sati kuṇḍapāyisatre 'pyaṅgatvena nityāgnihotrasyaiva vidhiḥ syāditi vācyaṃ, iṣṭatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3672: tasmādekasyaiva bṛhaspatināmakasya dhātvarthasya brahmavarcase viniyuktasyāpi vājapeyāṅgatayā viniyoga iti bhagavatpādatātparyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3673: astica viniyuktasya viniyoge sarvasaṃmatamudāharaṇaṃ khādiratvādikaṃ tasya kratau viniyuktasya vīryādiphale 'pi viniyogāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3674: tathā mantrakarmaṇāmanyatra viniyuktānāṃ vidyāśeṣatvamiti prāpte siddhāntayati-naiṣāmityādinā
GSP33brssgo3u:3677: 'deva savitaḥ prasuva'iti pradakṣiṇato 'gniṃ paryukṣediti vākyādagniparyukṣaṇe 'sāvitraṃ juhoti karmaṇaḥ purastātsavane savane
GSP33brssgo3u:3682: nanu liṅgādibharanyatra viniyuktānāmapi saṃnidhinā vidyāsvapi viniyogo
GSP33brssgo3u:3684: samavāye samānaviṣayatvena dvayorvirodhe, parasya daurbalyaṃ, kutaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:3687: ayamāśayaḥ-ekatra viniyuktasya nirākāṅkṣatvādanyatra viniyogo viruddha eva parantu viniyojakapramāṇayoḥ samabalatve 'nyataraviniyogatyāgāyogādagatyākāṅkṣotpādanena viniyuktaviniyogaḥ svīkriyate 'yathā khādiro yūpo bhavati''khādiraṃ vīryakāmasya yūpaṃ kuryāt'iti vākyābhyāṃ kratau viniyuktasya khādiratvasya vīryaphale viniyogaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3688: yatra tu pramāṇayoratulyatvaṃ tatra na svīkriyate prabalapramāṇena durbalaviniyogabādhāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3689: yathā 'kadācana starīrasi'ityasyā ṛca aindryā gārhapatyamupatiṣṭhata iti tṛtīyāvibhaktiśrutyānyanirapekṣatayā gārhapatyopasthānaśeṣatvabodhikayendraprakāśanasāmārthyarūpaliṅgaprāptamindraśeṣatvaṃ bādhyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3690: liṅgaṃ hi na sākṣāccheṣatvaṃ bodhayati kintvindraprakāśanamātraṃ karoti,
GSP33brssgo3u:3691: tena ca liṅgenānena mantreṇa indra upasthāpayitavya iti śrutiḥ kalpanīyā,
GSP33brssgo3u:3692: tayā śeṣatvabodha iti śrutivyavadhānena śeṣatvabodhakaṃ liṅgaṃ jhaṭiti svārthabodhakaśrutyā bādhyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3693: tathā liṅgena vākyaṃ bādhyaṃ yathā 'syo 'naṃ te sadanaṃ karomi ghṛtasya dhārayā kalpayāmi', 'tasminsīdāmṛte pratitiṣṭha vrīhīṇāṃ medha
GSP33brssgo3u:3694: sumanasyamānaḥ'iti mantrābhāgayoḥ pratyekaṃ sadanakaraṇe puroḍāśāsādane ca tatprakāśanasāmarthyaliṅgena śrutidvārā viniyoge sati
GSP33brssgo3u:3695: pratītamekavākyatvaṃ bādhyate, tasya kṛtsne 'pi mantre sadanakaraṇaprakāśanasāmarthyaṃ puro 'ḍāśāsādanaprakāśanasāmarthyaṃ ca liṅgaṃ kalpayitvā śrutikalpanayobhayatra kṛtsnamantraviniyogabodhane dvābhyāṃ liṅgaśrutibhyāṃ vyavadhānena
GSP33brssgo3u:3697: naca sāmarthyaṃ na kalpyamiti vācyaṃ, asamarthasya viniyogāyogāt ata eva gaṅgāpadasya tīrabodhaviniyoge lakṣaṇārūpaṃ sāmarthyaṃ kalpyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3698: tathā vākyena prakaraṇaṃ bādhyaṃ yathā sāhnaprakaraṇāmnātadvādaśopasadāṃ dvādaśāhīnasyeti vākyenāhīnāṅgatva bodhakena prakaraṇaprāptasāhnāṅgatvabādhādutkarṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3699: pradhānasyāṅgākāṅkṣārūpaṃ prakaraṇaṃ tasyāṅgapradhānavākyaikavākyatāsāmarthyaśrutibhiḥ kalpyamānābhiḥ svārthaviniyogapramitau vyavadhānenāṅgasāmarthyaśrutyordvayoḥ kalpakavākyāddurbalatvāt tathā prakaraṇena saṃnidhirbādhyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3700: yathā rājasūyaprakaraṇena tadantargatābhiṣecanīyākhyasomayāgaviśeṣasaṃnidhipāṭhaprāptaṃ śunaḥ śepopākhyānāderabhiṣecanīyaśeṣatvaṃ bādhitvā kṛtsnarājasūyaśeṣatvamāpāditaṃ saṃnidheḥ prakaraṇādikalpakatvena
GSP33brssgo3u:3704: karmaṇe'iti mantra āmnātastatra samākhyābalenāsya mantrasya puroḍāśapātraśundhanaśeṣatvaṃ prāptaṃ saṃnidhinā bādhitvā sānnāyyapātraśundhanaśeṣatvamāpādyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3707: evaṃ virodhe sati śrutirbādhikaiva samākhyā bādhyaiva, madhyasthānāṃ tu caturṇāṃ pūrvabādhyatvaṃ parabādhakatvaṃ ceti śrutiliṅgasūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3708: tasmālliṅgādinānyatra viniyuktānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ durbalasaṃnidhinā na vidyāsu viniyoga iti siddham
GSP33brssgo3u:3710: karmaṇāṃ vidyopakāratve tābhiḥ sahaikaphalatve ca mānaṃ kiñcinnāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3712: nanu tarhi vedhādivākyānāmupaniṣadbhiḥ saha pāṭhasya kā
GSP33brssgo3u:3719: hānau tūpāyanaśabdaśeṣatvāt kuśāc chandaḥstutyupagānavat tad uktam |
GSP33brssgo3u:3720: asti tāṇḍānāṃ śrutiḥ - 'aśva iva romāṇi vidhūya pāpaṃ candra iva
GSP33brssgo3u:3725: tathā śāṭyāyaninaḥ paṭhanti 'tasya putrā dāyamupayanti sihṛdaḥ sādhukṛtyāṃ dviṣantaḥ pāpakṛtyām' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3726: tathaiva kauṣītakinaḥ 'tatsukṛtaduṣkṛte vidhūnute tasya priyā jñātayaḥ sukṛtamupantyapriyā duṣkṛtam' (kau. 1.4) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3727: tadiha kvacitsukṛtaduṣkṛtayorhānaṃ śrūyate kvacittayoreva vibhāgena priyairapriyaiścopāyanaṃ kvacittūbhayamapi hānamupāyanaṃ ca tadyatrobhayaṃ śrūyate tatra tāvanna kiñcidvaktavyamasti yatrāpyupāyanameva śrūyate na hānaṃ tatrāpyarthādeva hānaṃ saṃnipatati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3729: yatra tu hānameva śrūyate nopāyanaṃ tatropāyanaṃ sanipatedvā na veti vicikitsāyāmaśravaṇādasaṃnipātaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:3731: apicātmakartṛkaṃ sukṛtaduṣkṛtayorhānaṃ parakartṛkaṃ tūpāyanaṃ tayorasatyāvaśyakabhāve kathaṃ hānenopāyamākṣipyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:3742: itthaṃ mahābhāgā vidyā yatsāmarthyādasya viduṣaḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛte saṃsārakāraṇabhūte vidhūyate te cāsya suhṛdviṣatsu niviśete itai /
GSP33brssgo3u:3743: stutyarthe cāsminsaṃkīrtane hānānantarabhāvitvenopāyasya kvacicchrutatvādanyatrāpi hānaśrutāvupāyanānuvṛttiṃ manyate stutiprakarṣalābhāya /
GSP33brssgo3u:3745: kathaṃ hīhaikaviṃśatādityasyābhidhīyatānapekṣyamāṇer'thavādāntare dvādaśa māsāḥpañcartavastraya ime lokā asāvāditya ekaviṃśaḥ ityetasmin /
GSP33brssgo3u:3746: tathā triṣṭubhau bhavataḥ sendriyatvāya ityevamādiṣu indriyaṃ vai triṣṭup ityevamādyarthavādāntarāpekṣā dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3747: vidyāstutyarthatvāccāsyopāyanavādasya kathamanyadīye sukṛtaduṣkṛte anyairupeyete iti nātīvābhiniveṣṭavyam
GSP33brssgo3u:3748: upāyanaśabdaśeṣatvāditi tu śabdaśabdaṃ samuccārayanstutyarthameva hānāvupāyanānuvṛttiṃ sūcayati
GSP33brssgo3u:3752: tadyathā bhāllavinām - 'kuśā vānaspatyāḥ stha tā mā pāta' ityetasminnigame kuśānāmaviśeṣeṇa vanaspatiyonitvena śravaṇe śāṭyāyanināmaudumbarāḥ kuśā
GSP33brssgo3u:3759: yathaiteṣu kuśādiṣu śrutyantaragataviśeṣairanvaya evaṃ hānāvapyupāyanānvaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3760: śrutyantarakṛtaṃ hi viśeṣaṃ śrutyantare 'nabhyupagacchataḥ sarvatraiva vikalpaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3762: taduktaṃ dvādaśalakṣaṇāyām - 'api tu vākyaśeṣatvāditaraparyudāsaḥ syātpratiṣedhe vikalpaḥ syāt' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3767: na hānaṃ vidhūnanamabhidhīyate 'dhañ kampane' iti smaraṇāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3768: dodhūyante dhvajāgrāṇīti ca vāyunā cālyamāneṣu dhvajāgreṣu prayogadarśanāt
GSP33brssgo3u:3770: cālanaṃ tu suṣkṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ kañcitkālaṃ phalapratibandhanādityevaṃ prāpayya prativaktavyam
GSP33brssgo3u:3774: yadyapīdaṃ parakīyayoḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ parairupāyanaṃ nāñjasaṃ saṃbhāvyate tathāpi tatsarntanāttāvattadānuguṇyena hānameva vidhūnanaṃ nāmeti nirṇetuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3775: kvacidapi cedaṃ vidhūnanasaṃnidhāvupāyanaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ kuśāchandastutyupagānavadvidhanūnaśrutyā sarvatrāpekṣāmāṇaṃ sārvatrikaṃ nirṇayakāraṇaṃ saṃpadyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3778: aśvaśca romāṇi vidhūnvānastyajanrajaḥ sahaiva tena romāṇyapi jīrṇāni śātayati 'aśva iva romāṇi vidhūya pāpam' (chā. 8.13.1) iti ca brāhmaṇam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3782: yathāśvo rajoyuktāni jīrṇaromāṇi tyaktvā nirmalo bhavati tathāhamapi pāpaṃ vidhūya kṛtātmā nirmalīkṛtacittaḥ san yathā vā rāhugrastaścandro rāhumukhātpramucya spaṣṭo bhavati tathā śarīraṃ dhūtvā tyaktvā dehābhimānānmuktaḥ sannakṛtaṃ kūṭasthaṃ brahmātmakaṃ lokaṃ abhi pratyaktvena saṃbhavāmītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3783: yathā nadyaḥ samudraṃ prāpya nāmarūpe tyajanti tathā vidvānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3784: tasya mṛtasya viduṣaḥ, dāyaṃ dhanaṃ, tattena vidyābalena sukṛtaduṣkṛte
GSP33brssgo3u:3788: yatra tu tyāga eva śrutaḥ tatra hānopāyanayoḥ sahabhāvasyāvaśyakatvānāvaśyakatvābhyāṃ saṃśayamāha-yatra tviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3789: atra pūrvapakṣe stutiprakarṣāsiddhiḥ siddhānte tatsiddhiriti phalam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3790: yadyapi tāṇḍyātharvaṇaśrutyornirguṇavidyārthayoḥ karmahānameva śrutaṃ nopāyanaṃ tathāpi kauṣītakiśrutau paryaṅkasthasaguṇabrahmavidyāyāmupāyanaṃ śrutamatropasaṃhartavyamityāśaṅkya vidyābhedānnopasaṃhāra ityāha-vidyāntareti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3791: kiñca yathā mantrakarmaṇāmanāvaśyakatvādvidyāsvanupasaṃhāra uktaḥ tathā parairupādānaṃ vināpi hānasaṃbhavenopādanasyānāvaśyakatvānna prāptiriti dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyā prāpte siddhāntayati-hānau tviyādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:3793: aśvaromadṛṣṭāntena vidhūtayoḥ puṇyapāpayoḥ paratrāvasthānasāpekṣatvātparairūpādānaṃ vācyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3794: vidyābhede guṇānupasaṃhāra iti vyavasthānuṣṭhānaviṣayā na stutiviṣayetyāha-yaducyata iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3798: nanvarthavādasya vidhinā saṃbandhaḥ prasiddho nārthavādāntareṇetyata āha-prasiddhā ceti
GSP33brssgo3u:3801: yajñasya puruṣarūpakalpanāyāṃ sendriyatvāya triṣṭubhau bhavata ityuktaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3806: vidvanniṣṭhayoreva tayoḥ phalaṃ pare prāpnuvanti vidyāsāmarthyādityupayantipadenocyata ityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:3811: naca yathā putrakṛtaśrāddhasya pitṛṣu phalaṃ tathātreti vācyaṃ, yasya phalamuddiśya yatkarma vihitaṃ tasya tatphalamiti nyāyena pitṛṇāṃ tṛptyuddeśena kṛtakarmaṇo vyadhikaraṇaphalatve 'pi viduṣaḥ karmakāle 'nuddiṣṭavyadhikaraṇaphalāyogāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3812: kiñca viduṣo dehapāte karmaṇo 'sattvādyāvajjīvaṃ vidvatsevakasya taddveṣiṇo vā phalaṃ syādityata āha-nātīvābhiniveṣṭavyamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3813: vidvatsevādveṣābhyāṃ vidvanniṣṭhapuṇyapāpatulye puṇyapāpe sevakadveṣiṇorjāyete jātayoḥ phalataḥ svīkāra upāyanamiti parihārasya sulabhatvādanāgraha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3815: upāyanavivakṣāyāmupāyanasyaivopasaṃhāraṃ sūtrakāro brūyādataḥ śabdasya taṃ brūvanstutiṃ sūcayatītyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:3816: vidyāvicārātmake pāde stutivicārasya kā saṃgatirityata āha-tasmāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3817: śākhāntarastho viśeṣaḥ śākhāntare 'pi grāhya ityatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-kuśeti
GSP33brssgo3u:3818: kuśā udgātṛṇāṃ stotragaṇanārthāḥ śalākā dārumayyaḥ, bho kuśāḥ, yūyaṃ vānaspatyāḥ vanasthamahāvṛkṣo vanaspatiḥ tatprabhavāḥ stha tā itthaṃbhūtā yūyaṃ mā pāta māṃ rakṣateti yajamānaprārthanā atra tā iti strīliṅganirdeśādaudumbarya iti bhāṣyācca śalākāsu kuśaśabdasya strītvaṃ mantavyaṃ darbhaviṣayasya na strītvaṃ, astrī kuśamityanuśāsanāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3820: navākṣarāṇi chandāṃsi āsurāṇyanyāni daivāni teṣāṃ kvacchindobhiḥ stuvata ityatrāviśeṣaprāptau paiṅgivākyādviśeṣagraha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3822: ātirātre ṣoḍaśino grahasyāṅgabhūtaṃ stotraṃ kadeti chandogādīnāmākāṅkṣāyāmudayasamayāviṣṭe sūrye ṣoḍaśinaḥ stotramityārcaśruteḥ kālaviśeṣagraha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3829: sāmānyaviśeṣayorekavākyatārūpāyāṃ gatau satyāṃ vākyabhedaṃ kṛtvā nādhvaryuriti niṣedhādaviśeṣaśruteścādhvaryurupagāyati nopagāyati cetyevaṃ sarvatra vikalpo na yuktaḥ, vrīhiyavayostvagatyā vikalpa āśrita
GSP33brssgo3u:3835: evaṃ vrīhivākyepi catvāro doṣā ityevaṃ duṣṭavikalpaparihārāya bhinnaśākhaśrutyorapyekavākyatā jaiminisaṃmatetyāha-taduktamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3836: jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇe 'dīkṣito na juhoti', iti śrutaṃ 'yāvajjīvamagnihotraṃ juhuyāt'iti cānyatra śrutaṃ tatra yadi nadīkṣitavākyaṃ homapratiṣedhakaṃ syāttadā kratvarthatvānniṣedho 'nuṣṭheyaḥ, yāvajjīvavidhinā homo vānuṣṭheya iti vikalpaḥ syāt, sa cānyāyyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3837: api tu yāvajjīvavākyaṃ prati nadīkṣitavākyasya śeṣatvānnakāra itaraparyudāsārthakaḥ syāddīkṣitānyalakṣakaḥ syāt, na homapratiṣedhakaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3839: atra bhagavatpādaiḥ sūtrameva paṭhitaṃ, miśraistu paryudāsādhikaraṇasiddhāntasūtraṃ 'api tu vākyaśeṣaḥ syādanyāyyatvādvikalpasya vidhīnāmekadeśaḥ syāt'iti sthitamatrārthataḥ paṭhitamityuktaṃ taccintyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3840: sūtrārthastu yajñamātre yeyajāmahe iti prayoktavyamiti śrutaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3841: nānuyājeṣu yeyajāmahaṃ karotītyapi śrutaṃ, tatra nakārasya niṣedhakatve
GSP33brssgo3u:3842: 'pyatirātre ṣoḍaśigrahaṇāgrahaṇayorivānuyājeṣu yajñatvāviśeṣātprayoktavyaṃ niṣedhānna prayoktavyamiti vikalpaḥ syāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:3845: tathā cānuyājabhinneṣu yāgeṣu yeyajāmaha iti prayoktavyamityekavākyateti
GSP33brssgo3u:3850: vidhūnanasya hi phaladvayamaśvaromādiṣu dṛṣṭaṃ pūrvasvabhāvāt cyutiranyatra saṃkrāntiśceti
GSP33brssgo3u:3852: tatra vidhūnanaśabdasya kampanaṃ mukhyārtha iti tāvatsarvasaṃmatam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3854: atastayoryaḥ svabhāvaḥ phaladātṛtvaśaktistataścālanaṃ vidyayā pratibandhāccyutiḥ sā lakṣaṇīyā na hāniramūrtayoranyatra saṃkrāntyayogādanyasāpekṣatvācceti pūrvapakṣārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3857: naca yatra dhunoterūpāyanaśabdasāṃnidhyaṃ tatra hānirlakṣyate na kevaladhunoterhāniścānyatra viduṣaḥ sevakādau tulyakarmasaṃkrāntiriti nāsaṃbhava iti vācyaṃ, kevaladhunoterapi mukhyārthāsaṃbhavenānyatra lakṣyatayā buddhisthahānilakṣaṇāyā eva yuktatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3858: upāyanasyāmukhyatvānna kvāpi hānilakṣaṇābījatvamiti śaṅkitvā puṇyapāpayoḥ phalataḥ svīkārātmakamupāyanaṃ hāniṃ vinānupapannaṃ sallakṣaṇānirṇāyakamiti pariharati-yadyapītyādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:3859: yathānyatraśrutamaudumbaratvādikaṃ kuśādinirṇāyakaṃ tathedamupāyanaṃ vidhūnanasya hānatve niścāyakamityāha-kvacidapīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3861: tathāpi hānaṃ kathaṃ lakṣyata ityāśaṅkya mukhyasaṃbandhādityāha-aśvaśceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3866: yadvā hānavācakamevāstu naca dhūñ kampana iti
GSP33brssgo3u:3868: śākhāntarasthamupāyanaṃ vidhūnanasya hānatvaniścāyakamityatra jaiminisūtraṃ taduktamiti gṛhītapūrvaṃ vyākhyātamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3869: evaṃ vidhṛnanasya hānitvisiddheḥ kevalahānāvupāyanopasaṃhāra iti siddham
GSP33brssgo3u:3875: devayānena pathā paryaṅ kasthaṃ brahmābhiprastitasya vyadhvani sukṛtaduṣkṛtayorvibhāgaṃ kauṣītakinaḥ paryaṅ kavidyāyāmamananti 'sa etaṃ devayānaṃ pantānamāsādyāgnilokamāgacchati' (kau. 1.3) ityupakramya 'sa
GSP33brssgo3u:3876: āgacchati virajāṃ nadīṃ tāṃ manasaivātyeti tatsukṛtaduṣkṛte vidhūnute'
GSP33brssgo3u:3878: tatkiṃ yathāśrutaṃ vyadhvanyeva viyogavacanaṃ pratipattavyamāhosvidādāveva dehādapasarpaṇa iti vicāraṇāyāṃ śrutiprāmāṇyādyathāśruti pratipattiprasaktau paṭhati - sāṃparāya itai /
GSP33brssgo3u:3879: sāṃparāye gamana eva dehādapasarpaṇa idaṃ vidyāsāmarthyātsukṛtaduṣkṛtahānaṃ bhavatīti pratijānīte
GSP33brssgo3u:3881: nahi viduṣaḥ saṃparetasya vidyayā brahma saṃprepsato 'ntarāle
GSP33brssgo3u:3882: sukṛtaduṣkṛtābhyāṃ kiñcitprāptavyamasti yadarthaṃ katicitkṣaṇānakṣīṇe te kalpeyātām /
GSP33brssgo3u:3883: vidyāviruddhaphalatvāttu vidyāsāmarthyena tayoḥ kṣayaḥ sa ca yadaiva vidyā phalābhimukhī tadaiva bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3887: iti, 'tasya putrā dāyamupayanti suhṛdaḥ sādhukṛtyāṃ dviṣantaḥ pāpakṛtyām'
GSP33brssgo3u:3891: pūrvoktaṃ vidhūnanasya hānatvamupajīvya hānasya nadītaraṇānantaryaśruteraśvaiva romāṇi ityādau dehatyāgātprākkālatvaśruteśca saṃśayamāha-tatkimiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3893: vidhūnute, ityatra taditisarvanāmaśrutyāstenetyarthatayā saṃnihitanadītaraṇasya karmahānihetutvokterardhapathe karmakṣaya iti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3894: tatra vidyāyāḥ karmakṣayahetutvāsiddheḥ pūrvapakṣe, siddhānte tatsiddhiriti matvā siddhāntayati-sāṃparāya iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3896: saṃparetasya mṛtasya kañcitkālaṃ karmasattve phalābhāvāddevayānamārgapraveśāyogāccādāveva kṣaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3903: yadi ca dehādapasṛptasya devayānena pathā prasthitasyārdhapathe sukṛtaduṣkṛtakṣayo 'bhyupagamyeta tataḥ patite dehe
GSP33brssgo3u:3904: yamaniyamavidyābhyāsātmakasya sukṛtaduṣkṛtakṣayahetoḥ puruṣaprayatnasyecchāto 'nuṣṭhānānupapatteranupapattireva taddhetukasya sukṛtaduṣkṛtakṣayasya syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3908: kiñca mṛtasya chandato yathākāmaṃ vidyānuṣṭhānānupapatterubhyorvidyākarmakṣayayoḥ śruto hetuphalabhāvo virudhyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3909: kiñca sati puṣkalahetau na kāryavilamba iti nyāyopetatāṇḍyādiśrutivirodhastava syādasmatpakṣe
GSP33brssgo3u:3918: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ hānāvaviśeṣeṇaiva devayānaḥ panthāḥ saṃnipateduta vibhāgena kvacitsaṃnipatet kvacinneti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3920: gaterdevayānasya pathor'thavattvamubhayathā vibhāgena bhavitumarhati kvacidarthavatī gatiḥ kvacinneti nāviśeṣeṇa /
GSP33brssgo3u:3922: 'puṇyapārape vidhūya nirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyamupaiti' (mu. 3.1.3) ityasyāṃ śrutau deśāntaraprāpaṇī gatirvirudhyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:3924: gantavyaṃ ca paramaṃ sāmyaṃ na deśāntaraprāptyāyattamityānarthakyamevātra gatermanyāmahe // gaterarthavattvaṅkvacitsaguṇavidyāyāṃ mārgaḥ śrūyate nirguṇavidyāyāṃ na śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3925: tatra hānasaṃnidhau mārgasya śrutatvādanapekṣitatvācca saṃśaye dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣamāha-yathā tāvaditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3927: atra nirguṇavido 'pi muktyarthaṃ mārgāpekṣā pūrvapakṣe, siddhānte tvanapekṣeti phalam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3936: yatra hi paryaṅ kārohaṇaṃ paryaṅ kastena brahmaṇā saṃvadanaṃ viśiṣṭagandhādi prāptiścetyevamādi bahu deśāntaraprāptyāyattaṃ phalaṃ śrūyate tatrārthavatī gatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3939: lokavaccaiṣa vibhāgo draṣṭavyo yathā loke grāmaprāptau deśāntaraprāpaṇaḥ panthā apekṣyate nārogyaprāptāvevamihāpīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3941: nanu tarhi saguṇavidyāyāmapi mārgo vyartha ityata āha-upapanna iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3942: sā gatirlakṣaṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ yasyārthasya sa tallakṣaṇārthaḥ //30//
GSP33brssgo3u:3948: saguṇāsu vidyāsu gatirarthavatī na nirguṇāyāṃ paramātmavidyāyāmityukhtam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3949: saguṇāsvapi vidyāsu kāsucidgatiḥ śrūyate yathā paryaṅ kavidyāyāmupakosalavidyāyāṃ pañcāgnividyāyāṃ daharavidyāyāmiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3950: nānyāsu yathā madhuvidyāyāṃ śāṇḍilyavidyāyāṃ ṣoḍaṣakalavidyāyāṃ vaiśvānaravidyāyāmiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3951: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ yāsvevaiṣā gatiḥ śrūyate tāsveva niyamyetotāniyamena
GSP33brssgo3u:3956: yadyanyatra śrūyamāṇāpi gatirvidyāntaraṃ gacchecchrutyādīnāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ hīyeta sarvasya sarvārthatvaprasaṅgāt
GSP33brssgo3u:3957: apicārcirādikaikaiva gatirupakosalavidyāyāṃ pañcāgnividyāyāṃ ca tulyavatpaṭhyate tatsarvārthatve 'narthakaṃ punarvacanaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3958: tasmānniyama ityevaṃ prāpte paṭhati - aniyama iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3962: tathāhi śrutiḥ - 'tadya itthaṃ viduḥ' (chā. 5.10.1) iti pañcāgnividyāvatāṃ devayānaṃ panthānamavatārayantī 'ye ceme 'raṇye śraddhātapa ityupāsate'
GSP33brssgo3u:3967: nahi kevalābhyāṃ śraddātapobhyāmantareṇa vidyābalameṣā gatirlabhyate 'vidyayā tadārohanti yatra kāmāḥ parāgatāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3968: na tatra dakṣiṇā yanti nāvidvāṃsastapasvinaḥ' iti śrutyantarāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3970: vājasaneyinastu pañcāgnividyādhikāre 'dhīyate - 'ya evametadvidurye cāmī araṇye śraddhāṃ satyamupāsate' (bṛ. 6.2.15) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3971: tatra śraddhalavo ye satyaṃ brahmopāsata iti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3974: 'atha ya etau panthānau na viduste pataṅgā yadidaṃ dandaśūkam' (bṛ.
GSP33brssgo3u:3977: samṛtirapi - 'śuklakṛṣṇe gatī hyete jagataḥ śāśvate mate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3979: yatpunardevayānasya patho dvirāmnānamupakosalavidyāyāṃ pañcāgnividyāyāṃ ca tadubhayatrāpyanucintanārtham
GSP33brssgo3u:3984: atrāpyarcirādimārga eva viṣayastatra vidyāviśeṣaprakaraṇādaviśeṣaśruteśca saṃśaye pūrvapakṣamāha-kiṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3985: saguṇanirguṇavidyāsu mārgasya bhāvābhāvavyavasthāvatsaguṇāsvapi vyavastheti dṛṣṭāntena prāptau siddhānte vyavasthāpavādādgatiniyamo 'niyama ubhayatra phalam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3990: aviśeṣaśrutyādinā prakaraṇabādho na doṣa ityāha-naiṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3991: tattatra adhikṛtānāṃ madhye ya itthaṃ pañcāgnīnvidurye cāmī araṇye śraddhātapa ityupāsate śraddhātapaupalakṣitaṃ brahma dhyāyanti te
GSP33brssgo3u:3994: aviduṣāṃ gatiniṣedhācchraddhātapaḥśabdābhyāṃ tatsādhyabrahmavidyālakṣaṇeti pariharati-naiṣa doṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3995: tat brahmalokasthānaṃ, parāgatāḥ parāvṛttāḥ, kāmakrodhadoṣā na santīti
GSP33brssgo3u:4004: śukla gatirārcirādikā, kṛṣṇā dhūmādikā, jagato vidyākarmādhikṛtasya,
GSP33brssgo3u:4006: tatraikayā śuklayā punarāvṛttivarjaṃ kāryaṃ brahma gacchati anyayā svarge gatvā punarāyātītyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:4008: tatra tatra mārgaśrutiranvahaṃ mārgacintanārthaṃ, prakaraṇena mārgadhyānasya vidyāṅgatvāvagamāt
GSP33brssgo3u:4010: yeṣāṃ na śruto mārgaste mārgadhyānaṃ vināpi vidyāsāmarthyānmārgaṃ labhanta iti jñāpanārthā punaruktirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4017: viduṣo vartamānadehapātānantaraṃ dehāntaramutpadyate na veti cintyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4018: nanu vidyāyāḥ sādhanabhūtāyāḥ saṃpattau kaivalyanirvṛttiḥ syānna veti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4020: nahi pākasādanasaṃpattāvodano bhavenna veti cintā saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:4023: tathāhyapāntaratamā nāma vedācāryaḥ purāṇarṣirviṣṇuniyogātkalidvāparayoḥ saṃdhau kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ saṃbabhūveti smaranti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4024: vasiṣṭhaśca brahmaṇo mānasaḥ putraḥ sannimiśāpādapagatapūrvadehaḥ punarbrahmādeśānmitrāvaruṇābhyāṃ saṃbabhūveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4025: bhṛgvādināmapi brahmaṇa eva mānasaputrāṇāṃ vāruṇe yajñe punarutpattiḥ śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4026: sanatkumāro 'pi brahmaṇa eva mānasaḥ putraḥ svayaṃ rudrāya
GSP33brssgo3u:4028: evameva dakṣanāradaprabhṛtīnāṃ bhūyasī dehāntarotpattiḥ kathyate tena tena nimittena smṛtau
GSP33brssgo3u:4030: te ca kecitpatite pūrvadehe dehāntaramādadatte kecittu sthita eva tasminyogaiśvaryavaśādanekadehādānanyāyena
GSP33brssgo3u:4032: tadeteṣāṃ dehāntarotpattidarśanātprāptaṃ brahmavidyāyāḥ pākṣikaṃ mokṣahetutvamahetutvaṃ veti
GSP33brssgo3u:4036: yathāsau bhagavānsavitā sahsrayugaparyantaṃ jagato 'dhikāraṃ caritvā tadavasāna udayāstamayavarjitaṃ kaivalyamanubhavati 'atha tata ūrdhvaṃ udetya naivodetā nāstametaikala eva madhye sthātā' (chā. 3.11.1) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4038: 'tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye 'tha saṃpatsye' (chā. 6.14.2) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4040: niyuktāḥ santaḥ satyapi samyagdarśane kaivalyahetāvakṣīṇakarmāṇo yāvadadhaikāramavatiṣṭhante, tadavasāne cāpavṛjyanta ityaviruddham /
GSP33brssgo3u:4041: sakṛtpravṛttameva hi te phaladānāya karmāśayamativāhayantaḥ svātantryeṇaiva gṛhādiva gṛhāntaramanyamanyaṃ dehaṃ saṃcarantaḥ svādhikāranivartanāyāparimuṣitasmṛtaya eva dehendriyaprakṛtivaśitvānnirmāya dehānyugapatkrameṇa vādhitiṣṭhanti /

GSP33brssgo3u:4062: te paścādaiśvaryakṣayadarśanena nirviṇṇāḥ paramātmajñāne pariniṣṭhāḥ kaivalyaṃ prāpurityupapadyate

GSP33brssgo3u:4070: 1.4.10) iti ca samyagdarśanakālameva tatphalaṃ sarvātmatvaṃ darśayati /

GSP33brssgo3u:4077: nirguṇavidyāyāṃ gatirvyarthā muktiphalatvāt, saguṇavidyāsu sarvatrārthavatī brahmalokaphalatvāditi vyavasthā kṛtā, sā na yuktā,
GSP33brssgo3u:4080: pūrvapakṣe jñānānmuktiśrutīnāṃ jñānastutimātratvena jñānasya muktiphalatvābhāve sati brahmalokaphalatvāviśeṣādarcirādimārgopasaṃhāraḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:4084: vasiṣṭha urvaśīputre jāta ityevamartho bahvṛcārthavāda ityarthaḥ /

GSP33brssgo3u:4092: ekala eva advitīyaḥ, madhye udāsīnātmakasvarūpe tiṣṭhatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4093: nanu jñānināmapi janmāntaraṃ cetkathaṃ muktirityata āha-sakṛtpravṛttamiti /

GSP33brssgo3u:4096: kintu bahujanmaphalāya sakṛdudbhūtaṃ prārabdhaṃ te kṣapayanti,
GSP33brssgo3u:4097: janmagrahaṇe 'pi jñānayogabalānna śocanti prārabdhasamāptau mucyanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4099: yo hyajātismaratve sati karmāntarādhīnajanmāntaravān, sa luptasmṛtiriti vyāpteḥ /

GSP33brssgo3u:4107: nimittābhāve naimittikābhāva iti nyāyānugṛhītānāṃ jñānānmuktiśrutīnāṃ na
GSP33brssgo3u:4112: viduṣo dehapātāvadhiśruteranubhavācca jñānasyāvarakājñānāṃśanivartakasya prārabdhavikṣepasthityanukūlājñānāṃśanivartanasāmarthyābhāvasiddherbhogenaiva prārabdhakṣaya iti bhāvaḥ /

GSP33brssgo3u:4130: tāsāṃ viśeṣapratiṣedhabuddhīnāṃ kiṃ sarvāsāṃ sarvatra prāptiruta vyavastheti saṃśaye śrutivibhāgādvyavasthāprāptāvucyate - akṣaraviṣayāstu viśeṣapratiṣedhabuddhayaḥ sarvāḥ sarvatrāvaroddhavyāḥ sāmānyatadbhāvābhyām - samāno hi sarvatra viśeṣanirākaraṇarūpo brahmapratipādanaprakāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4131: tadeva ca sarvatra pratipādyaṃ brahmābhinnaṃ pratyabhijñāyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4132: tatra kimityanyatra kṛtā buddhayo 'nyatra na syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4134: tatra vidhirūpāṇi viśeṣaṇāni cintitānīha pratiṣedharūpāṇīti viśeṣaḥ /

GSP33brssgo3u:4144: atrākṣarabrahmapramāpakā niṣedhaśabdā viṣayāḥ, teṣu yatra yāvantaḥ

GSP33brssgo3u:4149: akṣare dharmiṇi dvaitaniṣedhadhiyo 'kṣaradhiyastaddhetavaḥ śabdā iti yāvat, tāsāmavarodha upasaṃhāra iti sūtrayojanā /

GSP33brssgo3u:4345: sa yaḥ kaścidadhikārī mahadvyāpakaṃ yakṣaṃ pūjyaṃ bhautikeṣu prathamajametatsacca tyacceti sattyaṃ brahma hiraṇyagarbhākhyaṃ vedopāste tasya lokajayaḥ phalamityarthaḥ /
