GSP33brssgo3u:4347: madhyasthamakṣaramanṛtamubhayataḥ satyena saṃpuṭitatvātsattyaprāyameva bhavatīti nāmākṣaropāsanā satyavidyāṅgatvenoktā /
GSP33brssgo3u:4353: pūrvapakṣe guṇānāṃ vyavasthayānuṣṭhānaṃ, siddhānte tvanuṣṭhānaikyamiti phalam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4354: yathā jīveśayoranyenyātmatvaśrutibhedānmatidvairūpyamuktaṃ, tathātra phalaśrutibhedādvidyābheda iti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣayati-dve iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4355: viśeṣyabrahmamātrākarṣaṇamayuktaṃ, tadyattaditi sarvanāmabhiḥ pūrvoktaguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ brahma ākṛṣyādityākṣisthānādiguṇavidhānāt, tathāca vākyādeva vidyaikyasiddhiriti siddhāntayati-ekaiveti yathā daharaśāṇḍilyavidyayorbrahmaikyapratyabhijñānamātraṃ tathātra
GSP33brssgo3u:4358: evaṃ vidyābhede 'pyetadupāsyaikyajñānaṃ syādatra tūbhayathāsaṃbhave vidyaikyanānātvasaṃśaye satyamityupāsyarūpaikyajñānādvidyaikyaniścaya ityakṣarārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4361: kiñca yatra pradhānavidhāvevaṅkāma iti phalaṃ śrutaṃ, tatra pradhānaphalenaivāṅgānāṃ phalākāṅkṣānivṛtteraṅge
GSP33brssgo3u:4362: stutimātratvaṃ, iha tu prathamaja satyaṃ brahmeti vedeti
GSP33brssgo3u:4364: vastutastu pradhānavidhāvapyevaṅkāmapadābhāvādrātrisatranyāyena phale kalpanīye sati pradhāne tadaṅge vā yatkiñcitphalaṃ śrutaṃ tasya sarvasyāpi śrutatvāviśeṣājjāteṣṭiphalanyāyena samuccityaikapradhānaphalatvabhedo 'siddha ityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4369: pṛthivyagnyātmanā dṛṣṭe ṛksāme geṣṇau, tasmādṛksāmageṣṇatvāt, puruṣa udgītha ityevaṃ vidvānudgātā karmaphalasamṛddhisamartha iti śrutyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:4377: atha yadidamasminbrahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo
GSP33brssgo3u:4381: tathā vājasaneyinaḥ - sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātmā yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu ya eṣo 'ntarhadaya ākāśastasmiñchete sarvasya vaśī (bṛ. 4.4.22) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:4382: tatra vidyaikatvaṃ parasparaguṇayogaśca kiṃ vā neti saṃśaye vidyaikatvamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4386: yadetaccāndogye hṛdayākāśasya satyakāmatvādiguṇajātamulabhyate taditaratra vājasaneyake vaśitvādyupalabhyate tadapītaratra chāndogye eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmā (chā. 8.1.5) ityatra saṃbadhyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4388: samānaṃ hyubhayamatrāpi hṛdayamātanaṃ samānaśca vedya īśvaraḥ samānaṃ ca tasya setutvaṃ lokāsaṃbhedaprayojanamityevamādi bahu sāmānyaṃ dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4390: ñapi dṛśyate chāndogye hṛdayākāśasya guṇayogo vājasaneyake tvākāśāśrayasya brahmaṇa iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4395: saguṇā hi brahmavidyā chāndogya upadiśyate 'atha ya ihātmānamanuvidya vrajantyetāṃśca satyānkāmān' (chā. 8.1.6) ityātmavatkāmānamapi vedyatvaśravaṇāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4396: vājasaneyake tu nirguṇameva paraṃ brahmopadiśyamānaṃ dṛśyate 'ata ūrdhvaṃ vimokṣāya brūhi' (bṛ. 4.3.14) asaṅgo hyayaṃ puruṣaḥ (bṛ. 4.3.15)
GSP33brssgo3u:4398: vaśitvādi tu tatstutyarthameva guṇajātaṃ vājasaneyake saṃkīrtyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4399: tathācopariṣṭāt 'sa eṣa neti netyātmā' (bṛ. 3.9.26) ityādinā nirguṇameva brahmopasaṃharati
GSP33brssgo3u:4400: guṇavatastu brahmaṇa ekatvādvibhūtipradarśanāyāyaṃ guṇopasaṃhāraḥ sūtrito nopāsanāyeti draṣṭavyam kāmādītaratra /
GSP33brssgo3u:4401: saguṇanirguṇavidyayoḥ śrutāḥ satyakāmādayo vaśitvādayaśca guṇā mitha upasaṃhartavyā na vetyupasaṃhārasya phalabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ saṃdehe satyavidyāyā ekatvādguṇasāṃkarye 'pyatra vidyayoḥ saguṇanirguṇarūpabhedena bhedānnirguṇavidyāyāṃ guṇopasaṃhārasya phalābhāvāccānupasaṃhāra iti bahireva prāpte siddhāntayati-tatredamityādinā evaṃ vidyābhede sphuṭe kathaṃ guṇopasaṃhāraḥ, tatrāha-guṇavatastviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4403: jñānastutiprakarṣasyākāṅkṣitatvāt, yatra kvaciddṛṣṭaguṇaiḥ stuteḥ kartuṃ yogyatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4404: yadyapi saguṇasthasatyakāmādiṣu nirguṇasthaguṇā antarbhūtā eva tathāpi nopasaṃhāroktervaiyarthyaṃ nirguṇastāvakatvena śrutaguṇānāmanyatrāpyadhyeyatvamiti śaṅkanirāsenāntarbhāvadārḍhyātvādityanavadyam END BsCom_3,3.25.39
GSP33brssgo3u:4410: prathamamāgacchettaddhomīyaṃ sa yāṃ prathamāmāhutiṃ juhuyāttāṃ juhuyātprāṇasya svāhā' (chā. 5.19.1) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:4412: tāsu ca parastādagnihotraśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ 'ya etadevaṃ vidvānagnihotraṃ juhoti' (chā. 5.24.2) iti 'yatheha kṣudhitā bālā mātaraṃ paryupāsate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4414: tatredaṃ vicāryate - kiṃ bhojanalope lopaḥ prāṇāgnihotrasyotālopa itai /
GSP33brssgo3u:4420: yathā ha vai svayamahutvāgnihotraṃ parasya juhuyādevaṃ tat'
GSP33brssgo3u:4421: ityatithibhojanasya prāthamyaṃ ninditvā svāmibhojanaṃ prathamaṃ prāpayantī prāṇāgnihotra ādaraṃ karoti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4422: yā hi na prāthamyalopaṃ sahate netarāṃ sā prāthamyavato 'gnihotrasya lopaṃ sahateti manyate
GSP33brssgo3u:4426: prākṛte hyagnihotre payaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ dravyāṇāṃ niyatatvādihāpyagnihotraśabdātkauṇḍapāyināmayanavattaddharmaprāptau satyāṃ bhaktadravyaikatāguṇaviśeṣavidhānārthamidaṃ vākyaṃ tadyadbhaktamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4435: nanu yadbhaktamiti yacchabdena bhojanākṣiptaṃ bhaktamanūdya yaddhomīyamiti homasaṃyogavidhinādākṣepakabhojanalope tadākṣiptabhaktāśritahomalopa iti siddhāntī śaṅkate-tadyaditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:4437: prāṇāgnihotrasyādareṇa stutinirvāhārthamalopa iti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣasūtreṇa pariharati-evaṃ prāpta iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4442: payodravyādīnāṃ prāptistathehāpi prāṇāhutiṣvagnihotraśabdavaśātpayodravyādīnāmutsargataḥ prāptau satyāṃ bhojanārthabhaktadravyavidhināpavādaḥ kṛtaḥ, ato bhaktavidherapavādārthatvādbhojanalope bhaktākhyaguṇasyāṅgasya lope 'pi
GSP33brssgo3u:4443: na mukhyasyāgnihotrasya lopaḥ, apavādābhāve utsargaprāptapayādinā tasya
GSP33brssgo3u:4446: ādhāne santi pavamāneṣṭyastatrāgnaye pavamānāya puroḍāśamaṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapediti nirvāpaḥ śrutastadaṅgatvenāgnihotrahavaṇyāṃ havīṃṣi nirvapediti darśapūrṇāmāsākhyaprakṛtau vihitāgnihotra havaṇyatideśena prāpta ādhānakāle cāgnihotrābhāvāttasyā guṇabhūtāyā lope 'pi mukhyasya nirvāpasya na lopa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4459: tā aprayojakalakṣaṇāpannāḥ satyaḥ kathaṃ bhojanalope dravyāntaraṃ pratinidhāpayeyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4461: kuṇḍapāyināmayane hi māsāgnihotraṃ juhotīti vidhyuddeśagato 'gnihotraśabdastadvadbhāvaṃ vidāpayediti yuktā taddharmaprāptiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4470: ata eva cehāpi sāṃpādikānyevāgnihotrāṅgāni darśayati - 'ura eva vedirlomāni bahurhṛdayaṃ gārhapatyo mano 'nvāhāryapacana āsyamāhavanīyaḥ'
GSP33brssgo3u:4485: āśritya vihitāhutīnāmāśrayalope lopa eva na dravyāntarākṣepakatvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4486: yathā kratuprayuktātpraṇayanāśritasya godohanasya kratulope lope na tvāśrayāntaraprayojakatvaṃ tatheti phalitamāha-tā
GSP33brssgo3u:4492: mukhyāgnihotrāṅgāni saṃpādyante cetkathaṃ tadanaṅgaṃ vediratra saṃpādyate tatrāha-vediśrutiśceti
GSP33brssgo3u:4497: nanu svāmibhojanasyottarakālatvaṃ śrutyādivihitaṃ kathaṃ pūrvo 'tidhibhyo 'śnīyāditivacane bādhyate tatrāha-na hyastīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4509: kiṃ tāni nityānyeva syuḥ karmasu parṇamayītvādivadutānityāni godohanādivaditi vicārayāmaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:4513: yattveṣāṃ svavākyeṣu phalaśravaṇam 'āpayitā ha vaikāmānāṃ bhavati' (chā.
GSP33brssgo3u:4515: tasmādyathā yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavati na sa pāpaṃ ślokaṃ śṛṇoti ityevamādīnāmaprakaraṇapaṭhitānāmapi juhvādidvāreṇa kratupraveśātprakaraṇapaṭhitavannityataivamudgīthādyupāsanānāmapīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4517: yānyetānyudgīthādikarmaguṇayāthātmyanirdhāraṇāni rasatama āptiḥ samṛddhirmukhyaprāṇa āditya ityevamādīni naitāni nityavatkarmasu niyamyeran /
GSP33brssgo3u:4519: tathāhyaniyatatvamevañjātīyakānāṃ darśayati śrutiḥ - 'tenobhau kuruto yaścaitadevaṃ veda yaśca na veda' (chā. 1.110) ityaviduṣo 'pi
GSP33brssgo3u:4521: prastāvādidevatāvijñānavihīnānāmapi prastotrādīnāṃ yājanādhyavasānadarsanāt 'prastotaryā devatā prastāvamanvāyattā tāṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:4524: api caivañjātīyakasya karmavyapāśrayasya vijñānasya pṛthageva karmaṇaḥ phalamupalabhyate karmaphalasiddhiddyapratibandhastatsamṛddhiratiśayaviśeṣaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:4525: 'tenobhau kuruto yaścaitadevaṃ veda yaśca na veda /
GSP33brssgo3u:4526: nānā tu vidyā cāvidyā ca yadeva vidyayā karoti śraddhayopaniṣadā tadeva vīryavattaraṃ bhavati' (chā. 1.1.10) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4527: tatra nānā tviti vidvadavidvatprayogayoḥ pṛthakkaraṇādvīyarvattaramiti ca tarappratyayaprayogādvidyāvihīnamapi karmaviryavaditi gamyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4531: tathā lokasāmādiṣu pratiniyatāni pratyupāsanaṃ phalāni śiṣyante 'kalpante
GSP33brssgo3u:4532: hāsmai lokā ūrdhvāścāvṛttāśca' (chā. 2.2.3) ityevamādīni, nacedaṃ phalaśravaṇamarthavādamātraṃ yuktaṃ pratipattum /
GSP33brssgo3u:4535: prayājādiṣu tvitikartavyatākāṅkṣasya kratoḥ prakṛtatvāttādarthye sati yuktaṃ phalaśruterarthavādatvam
GSP33brssgo3u:4542: vākyenaiva tu juhvādyāśrayatāṃ vivakṣitvā phale 'pi vidhiṃ vivakṣato vākyabhedaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4543: upāsanānāṃ tu kriyātmatvādviśiṣṭavidhānopapatterudgīthādyāśrayāṇāṃ phale vidānaṃ na virudhyate
GSP33brssgo3u:4545: ata eva ca kalpasūtrakārā naivañjātīyakānyupāsanāni kratuṣu kalpayāñcakruḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:4548: yathānārābhyādhītaparṇamayītvaṃ juhūdvārā kratvaṅgatayā karmasu nityaṃ prayujyate, tathāṅgāśritopāsanānyudrīthādidvārāṅgatayā nityāni, uta kratvaṅgāppraṇayanaśrayo godohanasaṃyogaḥ paśuphalārthatvādanityatvena yathā prayujyate yathā vā paśvaṅgayūpāśrayaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:4550: pūrvapakṣe upāsanānāṃ prayoganityatvaṃ, siddhānte tvanityatvamiti phalabhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4553: tathā cāṅgatayā prayogavidhinā nityena prayujyanta iti prāpte siddhāntasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-yānītyādinā
GSP33brssgo3u:4554: udgīthādayaḥ karmaṇāṃ guṇāḥ aṅgāni teṣāṃ yāthātmayaṃ rasatamatvādikaṃ tannirdhāraṇānyupāsanāni yāni tāni karmasu nityaparṇamayītvādivanna niyamyerannityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4555: eṣāṃ karmāṅgatve taddhīnasyāviduṣaḥ karma na syādaṅgalopāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:4559: tāṃ cedavidvānprastoṣyasi mūrdhā te vyapatiṣyatīti cākrāyaṇenartvijāmākṣiptatvādanupāsakānāmapi karmaprayogo 'stītyāha-prastāvādīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4561: tenomityakṣareṇa yaścaitadakṣaramevaṃ rasatamatvādirūpeṇa vedopāste yaśca na veda tāvubhau karma kuruta eva yadyapi tu vidyāvidyayornānātvaṃ bhinnaphalatvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4562: dṛṣṭaṃ hi maṇivikraye jñānājñānābhyāṃ vaṇikśabarayoḥ phalavaiṣamyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4563: tasmādyadeva karma vidyayodgīthādyupāstyā śraddhayāstikyabuddhyopaniṣadā rahasyadevatādhyānena karoti tadeva karma phalātiśayavadityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4564: karmaṇo vīryavattvaṃ nāma phalavattvaṃ vidyāhīnasyāpi gamyamānaṃ vidyāyā anaṅgatve liṅgamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4567: asmai viduṣe kalpante bhogāya samarthā bhavanti bhūmerūrdhvā lokā āvṛttā adhastanāścetyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:4569: phalaśruterarthavādamātratve stutilakṣaṇā syāt, sā na yuktā,
GSP33brssgo3u:4573: nāsti tathāpi teṣu phalaśruteḥ stutitvaṃ, teṣāmakriyātvena kriyāsaṃbandhaṃ vinā phalahetutvānupapatteratasteṣāṃ phalārthaṃ kriyāpekṣitvātkratośca juhūprakṛtidravyākāṅkṣitvāt parṇamayī
GSP33brssgo3u:4574: juhūrityādivākyenaiva prakṛtidravyārpakeṇa juhūdvārā saṃnihitakratvaṅgatvasiddheryuktaṃ phalaśruterarthavādatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4577: yadapaḥ praṇayettat paśukāmasya sato godohanena brahmavarcasakāmasya kaṃsnyeti phalārthavidhireva nārthavādaḥ godohanādeḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:4579: tathā khādiratvena nirākāṅkṣakratvaṅgayūpamāśritya bailvamannādyakāmasya khādiraṃ vīryakāmasyeti phalārthavidhirevārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4580: parṇamayītvādiṣu phalavidhiḥ kiṃ na syādata āha-na tviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4583: juhvāḥ prakṛtidravyāpekṣitvādanenaiva vākyena kratvaṅgatayā juhūprakṛtidravyasaṃbandho vidheyaḥ paścānnirākāṅkṣajuhūmāśritya tasyaiva prakṛtidravyasya phalasaṃyogo vidheya iti vākyabheda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4594: vājasaneyake - 'vadiṣyāmyevāhamīti vāgdadhre' (bṛ. 1.5.21) ityatrādhyātmaṃ vāgādīnāṃ śreṣṭho 'vadhārito 'dhidaivatamagnyādīnāṃ vāyuḥ tathā chāndogye
GSP33brssgo3u:4595: - 'vāyurvāva saṃvargaḥ' (chā. 4.3.1) ityatrādhidaivatamagnyādīnāṃ vāyuḥ sarṅgo 'vadhāritaḥ 'prāṇo vāva saṃvargaḥ' (chā. 4.3.2) ityatrādhyātmaṃ vāgādīnāṃ prāṇaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4596: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ pṛthagevemau vāyuprāṇāvupagantavyau syātāmapṛthagveti
GSP33brssgo3u:4601: tathā 'ta ete sarva eva samāḥ sarvo 'nantāḥ' (bṛ. 1.5.13) ityādhyātmikānāṃ prāmānāmādhidaivikīṃ vibūtimātmabhūtāṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:4602: tathānyatrāpi tatra tatrādhyātmamadhidaivataṃ ca bahudhā tattvabhedadarśanaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:4603: kvacicca 'yaḥ prāṇaḥ sa vāyuḥ iti spaṣṭameva vāyuṃ prāṇaṃ caikaṃ karoti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4607: tasmādekameva vrataṃ caretprāṇyāccaivāpāyānyācca' (bṛ. 1.5.23) iti ca prāṇavratenaikenopasaṃharennetadeva draḍhayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:4608: tathā chāndogye 'pi parastāt 'mahātmanaścaturo deva ekaḥ kaḥ sa jāgara bhuvanasya gopāḥ' (chā. 4.3.6) ityekameva saṃvargaṃ gamayati na bravītyeka ekeṣāṃ caturṇāṃ saṃvargo 'paro 'pareṣāmiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4619: 'sa yathaiṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇa evametāsāṃ devatānāṃ vāyuḥ' (bṛ.
GSP33brssgo3u:4624: bhagnavratāni hi vāgādīnyuktāni 'tāni mṛtyuḥ śramo bhūtvopayeme' (bṛ.
GSP33brssgo3u:4626: 'na vāyuvratanivṛttyarthaḥ athāto vratamīmāṃsā' (bṛ. 1.5.21) iti prastutya tulyavadvāyuprāṇayorabhagnavratatvasya nirdhāritatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4627: 'ekameva vrataṃ caret' (bṛ. 1.5.23) iti cektvā 'teno etasyai devatāyai sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati (bṛ. 1.5.23) iti vāyuprāptiṃ phalaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:4631: tathā 'tau vā etau dvau saṃvargau vāyureva deveṣu prāṇaḥ prāṇeṣu' (chā.
GSP33brssgo3u:4632: 4.3.4) iti bhedena vyapadiśati 'te vā ete pañcānye pañcānye daśa santastatkṛtam' (chā. 4.3.8) iti ca bhedenaivopasaṃharati /
GSP33brssgo3u:4636: ato vacanādindrābhedācca sahapradānāśaṅkāyāṃ rājādiguṇabhedādyājyānuvākyavyatyāsavidhānācca yathānyasameva devatāpṛthaktvātpradānapṛthaktvaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:4638: taduktaṃ saṃkarṣe 'nānā vā devatā pṛthagjñānāt' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4639: tatra tu dravyadevatābhedādyāgabhedo vidyate naivamiha vidyābhedo 'sti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4646: astu karmāṅgānāṃ tatsaṃbaddhopāstīnāṃ ca phalabhedānnityatvānityatvarūpaḥ prayogabhedaḥ, iha tu vāyuprāṇayoḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:4652: kiñca yadi vāyuprāṇayoḥ pṛthagdhyānaṃ syāttarhi dhyānāṅgavratabhedo 'pi
GSP33brssgo3u:4655: kiñca vāyuprāṇo saṃvargau bhedenopakramya parastādvākyaśeṣe saṃvargadevaikyaśruteḥ prayogaikyamityāha-tatheti
GSP33brssgo3u:4657: caturaścatuḥ saṃkhyākānagnisūryodakacandrānaparāṃśca vākcakṣuḥśrotramanorūpāneko devaḥ kaḥ prajāpatiḥ jagāra gīrṇavānupasaṃhṛtavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4661: 'annādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda'ityutpannāyāḥ saṃvargavidyāyā ekatve 'pyutpannaśiṣṭavāyuprāṇākhyaguṇabhedātprayogabheda
GSP33brssgo3u:4667: tato 'dhyātmādhidaivāvasthābhedenoktasya dhyeyabhedasya nirāse 'yataścodeti'iti ślokasya na śaktirityāha-śloketi /
GSP33brssgo3u:4670: nanvevakārādvāyuvratanivṛtteḥ prāṇa evaiko dhyeyo bhātītyata āha-ekameveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4671: vadanadarśanādīni vākcakṣurādīnāṃ vratāni śramarūpamṛtyunā bhagnānītyuktvā prāṇasyābhagnavratatvaṃ nirdhāritaṃ, tathā jvalanatāpādīnyagnyādityādīnāṃ vratāni bhagnānītyuktvā vāyorabhagnavratatvaṃ nirdhāritaṃ, 'sa yathaiṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ madhyamaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:4672: prāṇaḥ sthiravrata evametāsāṃ devanāṃ vāyurlocanti hyanyā devatā na vāyuḥsaiṣānastamitā devatā yadvāyiḥ'iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4673: ato bhagnavatanirāsārtha evakāro na vāyuvratanivṛttyartha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4676: tena vratena vāyoḥ sāyujyaṃ samānadehatvaṃ salokatāṃ ca jayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4678: tasmāttattvābhedadṛṣṭyā vrataikyamiti sthitaṃ, saṃprati pūrvoktaṃ pṛthagupadeśaṃ vivṛṇoti-tathā tau vā iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4680: trayaḥ puroḍāśā asyāṃ santīti tripuroḍāśinīṣṭistasyāṃ kiṃ sahapradānamuta bhedeneti saṃdehe pūrvapakṣamāha-sarveṣāmiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4683: yadvā sarvadevārthaṃ yugapadavadānaṃ kāryamityatra heturacchaṃvaṭkāramiti avyarthatvāyetyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:4684: ekārthamavatte haviṣi śeṣo yāgānarhatayā vṛthā syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4685: evaṃ sahāvadānaśruterdevaikyācca puroḍāśānāṃ sahaprakṣepe prāpte pṛthakprakṣepa iti siddhāntamāha-rājeti
GSP33brssgo3u:4687: kiñcādhvaryuṇā yajeti praiṣe kṛte hotrā yo mantraḥ paṭhyate sā yājyā,
GSP33brssgo3u:4688: anubrūhīti praiṣānantaramantraḥ puronuvākyeti bhedo 'sti, tatrāsyāmiṣṭau prathamapuroḍāśapradāne yā kḷptā yājyā sa dvitīyapradāne puronuvākya, yā ca pūrvamanuvākya, sa paścādyājyeti vyatyāsamanvāheti śrutyā vidhānāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:4691: vāśabdo 'vadhāraṇe, nānaiva devatā rājādiguṇabhedena bhedāvagamāditi sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4693: karmotpattivākyasthadevatābhedaḥ karmabhede heturiha tvannādo bhavati ya evaṃ vedetyutpattāvekatvena jñātavidyāyāḥ paścācchrutavāyuprāṇabhedo na bhedakaḥ, agnihotrasyeva dadhyādidravyabheda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4705: teṣu saṃśayaḥ - kimete manaścidādayaḥ kriyānupraveśinastaccheṣabhūtā uta svatantrāḥ kevalavidyātmakā iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4706: tatra prakaraṇākriyānupraveśe prāpte svātantryaṃ tāvatpratijānīte liṅgabhayastvāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:4707: bhūyāṃsi hiliṅgānyasminbrāhmaṇe kevalavidyātmakatvameṣāmupodbalayanti dṛśyante tadyatkiñcemāni bhūtāni manasā saṃkalpayanti teṣāmeva sā kṛtiḥ iti, 'tānhaitānevaṃvide sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtāni cinvantyapi svapate' iti caivañjātīyakāni /
GSP33brssgo3u:4712: utpatteḥ prāgidaṃ sarvaṃ naiva sadāsīnnāpyasadityupakramya manaḥ sṛṣṭimuktvā tanmana ātmānamaikṣatetīkṣaṇapūrvakamagnīnapaśyaditi
GSP33brssgo3u:4715: tābhiriṣṭakātvena kalpitābhirmanasaiva saṃpāditā agnayo manaścitasthānarkānpūjyānmanovṛttiṣusaṃpāditānātmanaḥ svasya saṃbandhitvena mano 'paśyat, tathā vākprāṇādayo 'pi
GSP33brssgo3u:4717: prāṇo ghrāṇaṃ karmendriyeṇa hastādinā citaḥ karmacitaḥ agnistvak pūrvatrāgnicayanaprakaraṇātkimete 'gnayaḥ kratvarthā uta prādhānyajñāpakaliṅgādibhūyastvātpuruṣārthā veti saṃśayamāha-teṣviti kevalavidyātmakāḥ kriyāṅgatvaṃ vinā bhāvanāmayā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4720: pūrvapakṣe bhāvanāgnīnāṃ kratvaṅgatvamiṣṭaṃ teṣāṃ kriyāṅgatvaṃ vikalpaḥ samuccayo vāstu /
GSP33brssgo3u:4722: tattatra sarvaprāṇimanovṛttibhirmama sadāgnayaḥ cīyanta iti dhyānadārḍhye sati sarvabhūtāni yatkiñcit manasā saṃkalpayanti teṣāmevāgnīnāṃ sā kṛtiḥ karaṇamityekaṃ liṅgaṃ, kriyāṅgasya yatkiñcitkaraṇena sidyadarśanādityāha-tadyaditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:4723: evaṃvide svapate jāgrate 'pi tadīyāgnīnbhūtāni sarvadā cinvantīti
GSP33brssgo3u:4731: pūrvasya kriyāmayasyāgneḥ prakaraṇāttadviṣaya evāyaṃ vikalpaviśeṣopadeśaḥ syānna svatantraḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:4737: anyārthadarśanaṃ cāsatyāmanyasyāṃ prāptau guṇavādenāpyupapadyamānaṃ na prakaraṇaṃ bādhitumutsahate
GSP33brssgo3u:4740: yathā daśarātrasya dasaṇe 'hanyavivākye pṛthivyā pātreṇa samudrasya
GSP33brssgo3u:4742: sa ca mānaso 'pi grahakalpaḥ kriyāprakaraṇātkriyāśeṣa eva
GSP33brssgo3u:4746: pūrvasyeṣṭakābhiragniṃ cinuta ityuktasya sa eṣa tviṣṭakāgniriti saṃnihitasyāyaṃ vikalpaviśeṣopadeśaḥ saṃkalpamayatvākhyaprakārabhedopadeśaḥ kriyāgnivatsāṃkalpikāgnayo 'pyaṅgamiti yāvat /
GSP33brssgo3u:4747: kiṃ vidhivākyasthaṃ liṅgaṃ prakaraṇādbalīyaḥ, arthavādasthaṃ vā /
GSP33brssgo3u:4752: nanu akriyārūpāgnīnāṃ dhyānamayānāṃ kathaṃ kriyāṅgatvaṃ tatrāha-mānasavaditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:4753: dvādaśāhasyādyantāhardvayaṃ tyaktvā madhyasthadaśarātrasyaiva dvirātrādiṣu prakṛtitvaṃ, taddharmamāṇāmeva teṣvatideśāttasya madhyadaśarātrasya daśame 'hanyarthādekādaśe 'hani mānasagrahaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:4754: śrūyate-'anayā tvā pātreṇa samudraṃ rasayā prājāpatyaṃ manograhaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:4756: anayā rasayā pṛthivyā pātreṇa samudraṃ tvāṃ prajāpatidevatākaṃ manograhaṃ gṛhyate iti grahaḥ somarasaḥ, manasā rasatvena bhāvitamadhvaryurgṛhṇātītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4757: ata evartvijāṃ dhyāyitayā vividhavākyoccāraṇābhāvādavivākyasaṃjñā ahnaḥ prāptaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4758: grahaṇaṃ nāma somapātrasyopādānaṃ, gṛhītasya svasthāne sthāpanamāsādanaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:4759: somasya homo havanaṃ hutaśeṣādānamāharaṇaṃ śeṣabhakṣaṇāyartvijāṃ mitho
GSP33brssgo3u:4761: sa ca mānaso graho dvādaśāhādaharantaraṃ svatantramityāśaṅaḍkya dvādaśāhasaṃjñāvirodhānnāharantaraṃ kintu prakaraṇādavivākyasyāhno
GSP33brssgo3u:4764: kecittvatra bhāṣye daśarātraśabdo vikṛtiparaḥ, tatrāpi daśame 'hanyavivākyasaṃjñake mānasagrahasyātideśaprāptatayāṅgatvādityāhuḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:4779: vidyātmakā evaite svatantrā manaścidādayo 'gnayaḥ syurna kriyāśeṣabhūtāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4780: tathāhi nirdhārayati - 'te haite vidyācita eva' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4781: vidyayā haivaita evaṃvidaścitā bhavanti iti ca // 47 //
GSP33brssgo3u:4791: nanu liṅgamapyasatyāṃmanyasyāṃ prāptāvasādhakaṃ kasyacidarthasyetyapāsya tatprakaraṇasāmarthyātkriyāśeṣatvamadhyavasitamityata uttaraṃ paṭhati -
GSP33brssgo3u:4799: tathā liṅm 'sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtāni cinvantyapi svapate' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4801: 'vidyācita eva' iti hi sāvadhāraṇeyaṃ śrutiḥ kriyānupraveśe 'mīṣāmabhyupagamyamāne pīḍitā syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4804: tadabhiprāyatāyāṃ hividyocita itīyatā svarūpasamakīrtanenaiva kṛtatvādanarthakamavadhāraṇaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brssgo3u:4810: yathā sāṃpādike vākyaprāṇamaye 'gnihotre 'prāṇaṃ tadā vāci juhoti - vācaṃ tadā prāṇe juhoti' (kau. 2.5) iti coktvocyate - 'ete anante āhutī jāgracca
GSP33brssgo3u:4813: kriyānupraveśe tu kriyāprayogasyālpakālatvena na sātatyeṣāṃ prayogaḥ kalpeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:4815: yatra hi vispaṣṭo vidhāyako liṅgādirupalabhyate yuktaṃ tatra saṃkīrtanamātrasyārthavādatvam
GSP33brssgo3u:4816: iha hi vispaṣṭovidhyantarānupalabdheḥ saṃkīrtanādevaiṣāṃ vijñānavidhānaṃ kalpanīyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4817: tacca yathāsaṃkīrtanameva kalpayituṃ śakyata iti sātatyadarśanāttathābhūtameva kalpyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4819: etena tadyatkiñcemāni bhūtāni manasā saṃkalpayanti teṣāmeva sā kṛtiḥ ityādi vyākhyātam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4820: tathā vākyamapi evaṃvide iti puruṣaviśeṣasaṃbandhamevaiṣāmācakṣaṇaṃ na kratusaṃbandhaṃ mṛṣyate
GSP33brssgo3u:4831: sarvadā sarvabhūtāni madarthamagnīn cinvantīti dhyāyedityapūrvārthatayā vidhikalpanāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4840: yatkriyāvayavānmana-ādivyāpāreṣvanubadhnāti 'te manasaivādhīyanta manasācīyanta manasaiva grahā agṛhyanta manasāstuvanmanasāśaṃsanyatkiñca
GSP33brssgo3u:4841: yajñe karma kriyate yatkiñca yajñiyaṃ karma manasaiva teṣu tanmanomayeṣu manaścitsu manomayameva kriyate' ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:4843: naca pratyakṣāḥ kriyāvayavāḥ santaḥ saṃpadā lipsitavyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4845: nahyatra kriyāṅgaṃ kiñcidādāya tasminnado nāmādhyavasitavyamiti vadati /
GSP33brssgo3u:4846: ṣaṭtriṃśatsahasrāṇi tu manovṛttibhedānādāya teṣvagnitvaṃ grahādīṃśca kalpayati puruṣayādivat
GSP33brssgo3u:4847: saṃkhyā ceyaṃ puruṣāyuṣasyāhaḥsu dṛṣṭā satī tatsaṃbandhinīṣu manovṛttiṣvāropyata iti draṣṭavyam
GSP33brssgo3u:4850: tathāhi - 'teṣāmekaika eva tāvānyānānasau pūrvaḥ' iti kriyāmayasyāgnermāhātmyaṃ jñānamayānāmekaikasyātidiśankiriyāyāmanādaraṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:4852: naca satyeva kriyāsaṃbandhe vikalpaḥ pūrveṇottareṣāmiti śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP33brssgo3u:4853: nahi yena vyāpāreṇāhanīyadhāraṇādinā pūrvaḥ kriyāyāmupakaroti tenottara upakartuṃ śaknuvanti
GSP33brssgo3u:4854: yattu pūrvapakṣe 'pyatideśa upodbalaka ityuktaṃ sati hi sāmānye 'tideśaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:4860: yathā prajñāntarāṇi śāṇḍilyavidyāprabhṛtīni svena svenānubadhyamānāni pṛthageva karmabhyaḥ prajñāntarebhyaśca svatantrāṇi bhavantyevamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4865: saṃpadupāstyai manovṛttiṣu kriyāṅgānāṃ yojanamanubandhaḥ śrutyā kriyate tadanyathānupapattyāpyagnīnāṃ puruṣārthatvaṃ kratvarthatve 'ṅgānāṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:4867: te agnayaḥ, adhīyanta teṣāmādhānaṃ manasaiva kuryādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4870: grahāḥ pātrāṇi, astuvan, udgātāraḥ stuvanti, aśaṃsan hotāraḥ śaṃsanti,
GSP33brssgo3u:4871: kiṃ bahūktyā yatkiñcidyajñe karmārādupakārakaṃ yajñiyaṃ yajñasvarūpotpādakaṃ ca tatsarvaṃ manomayaṃ kuryāditi śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4876: anādarārtho 'tideśo na bhavati kintu vikalpārtha ityata āha-naceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4877: ekasminmādhye nirapekṣasādhanayorvikalpo bhavati yathā vrīhiyavayoratra tu kriyāgnerdhyānāgnīnāṃ sādhyabhedānna vikalpa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4883: artha iti śeṣaḥ manaścidādīnāṃ svātantraye kriyāprakaraṇādutkarṣaḥ syādityāśaṅkya sa iṣṭa ityāha-dṛṣṭaśceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4888: tasyāṃ varṇabhedena prayogabhedaḥ, śrūyate-'yadi brāhmaṇo yajeta bārhaspatyaṃ madhye nidhāyāhutimāhutiṃ hutvābhighārayedyadi vaiśyo vaiśvadevaṃ caruṃ madhye nidadhyādyadi rājanyastadaindram'iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4890: tatrāgneyādicaruṣu aṅgānāṃ tantreṇa prayogo bhavati madhyenidhānaliṅgātprayogabhede madhye nidhānāyogādetayānnādyakāmaṃ yājayedityekavacanācca /
GSP33brssgo3u:4891: sa ca tantraprayogo rājasūyakratubāhyāyāmannādyakāmavarṇatrayakartṛkāyāmevāveṣṭau jñeyo na tu kratvantargatāyām /
GSP33brssgo3u:4892: nanu kimatra niyāmakaṃ kratvarthāyāmapyaveṣṭau tantraprayogaḥ kiṃ na syāditi cet /
GSP33brssgo3u:4894: varṇatrayasaṃyuktānāṃ kāmyāyāmevāṅgatantraikyasādhakasya madhye nadhānādiliṅgasya sattvādato liṅgaikavacanābhyāṃ tantraikye sati hiraṇyādikā militaikaivā dakṣiṇādheyā, anyathā prayogaikyāyogāt rājamātrakartṛkakratvantargateṣṭau tu varṇatrayasaṃyogābhāvānmadhye nidhānādiliṅgaṃ nāsti tataśca tantraikyasādhakābhāvāddakṣiṇābhedena tantrabheda ityaṅgānāmāvṛttireva caruṣviti sūtrārthaḥ atra caikaprayogaliṅgasya kratvartheṣṭāvasaṃbhavaṃ kāmyeṣṭau ca saṃbhavaṃ vadatānena sūtreṇa kāmyeṣṭeḥ kratvartheṣṭivilakṣaṇatvātkratuprakaraṇādutkarṣa iti sūcitam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4895: sa cotkarṣo yukta eva, rājamātrakartṛkarājasūyakratau varṇatrayakartṛkeṣṭerantarbhāvāyogāditi sthitaṃ, tathā manaścidādīnāmutkarṣa iti bhāvaḥ //50//
GSP33brssgo3u:4905: yathā 'sa vā eṣa eva mṛtyurya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale puruṣaḥ' iti 'agnirvai
GSP33brssgo3u:4906: mṛtyuḥ' (bṛ. 3.2.10) iti cāgnyādityapuruṣayoḥ samāne 'pi mṛtyuśabdaprayoge nātyantasāmyāpattiḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:4907: yathā ca 'asau vāva loko gautamāgnistasyāditya eva samit' (chā. 5.4.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:4914: pareṇa ca śabdasya tādvidhyaṃ bhūyastvāt tv anubandhaḥ |
GSP33brssgo3u:4915: parastādapi 'ayaṃ vāva loka eṣo 'gniścittaḥ' ityasminnanantare brāhmaṇe tāvadvadhyaṃ kevalavidyāvidhitvaṃ śabdasya prayojanaṃ lakṣyate na
GSP33brssgo3u:4917: tatra hi -' vidyayā tadārohanti yatra kāmāḥ parāgatāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4918: na tatra dakṣīṇā yanti nāvidvāṃsastapasvinaḥ' ityanena ślokena kevalaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:4920: tathā purastādapi yadetanmaṇḍalaṃ tapati ityasminbrāhmaṇe vidyāpradhānatvameva lakṣyate so 'mṛto bhavati mṛtyurhyasyātmā bhavati iti vidyāphalenaivopasaṃhārānna karmapradhānatā tatsāmānyādihāpi tathātvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4921: bhūyāṃsastvagnyavayavāḥ saṃpādayitavyā vidyāyāmityetasmātkāraṇādagninānubadhyate vidyā na karmāṅgatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4923: kiñca pūrvottarabrāhmaṇayoḥ svatantravidyāvidhānāttanmadhyasthasyāpi brāhmaṇasya svatantravidyāvidhiparatvamityāha-pareṇa ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4924: cite 'gnau lokadṛṣṭividhānaṃ svatantramuttaratra gamyate pūrvatra maṇḍalapuruṣopāstistatsāṃnidhyānmadhye 'pi mānasāgnayaḥ svatantrā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4925: tarhi kriyāgninā saha pāṭhaḥ kimarthamityata āha-bhūyāṃsastviti //52//
GSP33brssgo3u:4932: nahyasati dehavyatiriktātmani paralokāścodanā upapajadyerankasya vā brahmātmatvamupadiśyeta
GSP33brssgo3u:4933: nanu śāstrapramukha eva prathame pāde śāstraphalopabhogyasya dehāvyatiriktasyātmano 'stitvamuktam
GSP33brssgo3u:4935: iha tu svayameva sūtrakṛtā tadastitvamākṣepapuraḥsaraṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4936: ita eva cākṛṣyācāryeṇa śabarasvāminā pramāṇalakṣaṇe varṇitam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4937: ata eva ca bhagavatopavarṣeṇa prathame tantra ātmāstitvābhidhānaprasaktau śārīrake vakṣyamāḥ ityuddhāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4938: iha cedaṃ codanālakṣaṇeṣūpāsaneṣu vicāryamāṇeṣvātmāstitvaṃ vicāryate kṛtsnaśāstraśeṣatvapradarśanāya

GSP33brssgo3u:4967: yadyapi samasteṣu militeṣu bhūteṣu caitanyaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ taptodakumbhasya jñānābhāvādvyasteṣu tu nāstyeva tathāpi dehātmakabhūteṣu syāditi tebhyo bhūtebhyaścaitanyaṃ saṃbhāvayanto madaśaktivadvijñānaṃ saṃghātajaṃ tadviśiṣṭasaṃghāta ātmetyāhurityanvyaḥ /

GSP33brssgo3u:4969: nanu dehaḥ svayaṃ na cetanaḥ ghaṭavadbhautikatvāt kintu cetanaḥ kaścitsvargādibhoktāsti tatsāṃnidhyāddehasya caitanyavibhrama ityata
GSP33brssgo3u:4977: yadi dehabhāve bhāvāddehadharmatvamātmadharmāṇāṃ manyeta tato dehabhāve

GSP33brssgo3u:5049: 'gniścitaḥ' ityevamādyā ya udgīthādikarmāṅgāvabaddhāḥ pratyayāḥ prativedaṃ śākhābhedeṣu vihitāste tattacchākhāgateṣvevodgīthādiṣu bhaveyurathavā sarvaśākhāgateṣviti viśayaḥ /

GSP33brssgo3u:5060: svaśākhāvyavasthāyāṃ hyudgīthamupāsīteti sāmnyaśrutiraviśeṣapravṛttā satī saṃnidhānavaśena viśeṣe vyavasthāpyamānā pīḍitā syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:5071: nanūdgīthādīnāṃ sarvaśākhāsvekatvādupāstayaḥ sarvatreti vedyaikyānniścaye kathaṃ saṃśaya ityata āha-pratiśākhaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5072: yathā dehātmanorbhedādātmadharmā dehe na saṃbhavanti tathā prativedamudgīthādīnāṃ bhinnatvādekasminvede vihitodgīthādyupāstayo vedāntarasthodgīthādiṣu na saṃbhavantīti dṛṣṭāntena
GSP33brssgo3u:5075: sāmānyaśruteḥ saṃnihitavyaktigrahākhyasaṃkocastatra kartavyo yatra vyaktimātragraho nopapadyate, yathā śuklaṃ gāmānayetyatra gośruteḥ saṃnihitaśuklavyaktiparatayā saṃkocaḥ, atra nānupapattyabhāvādvyaktimātrasaṃbandhasāmānyamupāsyamiti siddhāntayati-evamityādinā //55//
GSP33brssgo3u:5082: tathāhi mantrāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ guṇānāṃ ca śākhāntarotpannānāmapi śākhāntara upasaṃgraho dṛśyate
GSP33brssgo3u:5083: yeṣāmapi hi śākhināṃ kuṭarurasītyaśmādānamantro nāmnātasteṣāmapyasau viniyogo dṛśyate kukkuṭarasītyaśmādānamantro nāmnātasteṣāmapyasau viniyogo dṛśyate kukkuṭo 'sītyaśmādānamādatte kudarurasīti veti /

GSP33brssgo3u:5100: phsamānatratulyakarmasthale hotavyā iti pañcatvaguṇavidhānādguṇinaḥ śākhāntaravihitāḥ saṃbadhyanta iti bhāvaḥ /

GSP33brssgo3u:5116: tathā samastopāsanamapi 'tasya ha vā etasyātmano vaiśvānarasyamūrdhaiva sutejāścakṣurviśvarūpa prāṇaḥ pṛthagvartmātmā saṃdeho bahulo bastireva rayiḥ pṛthivyeva pādau' (chā. 5.18.2) ityādi tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimihobhayathāpyupāsanaṃ syādvyastasya samastasya cota smastasyaiveti /

GSP33brssgo3u:5124: yathā kratuṣu darśapūrṇamāsāprabhṛtiṣu sāmastyena sāṅgapradhānaprayoga evaikovivakṣyate na vyastānāmapi prayogaḥ prayājādīnām /

GSP33brssgo3u:5132: punaśca vyastopāsanaṃ vyāvartya samastopāsanamevānuvartya 'sa sarveṣu lokeṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu sarveṣvātmasvannamatti' (chā. 5.18.1) iti bhūmāśrayameva phalaṃ darśayati /

GSP33brssgo3u:5179: śabdabhedāśca karmabhedahetuḥ samadhigataḥ purastācchabdāntare karmabhedaḥ kṛtānubandhatvāditi

GSP33brssgo3u:5221: daharadhyātuḥ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati vaiśvānaradhyātā sarvatrānnamattītyādiphalabheda ityarthaḥ /

GSP33brssgo3u:5245: tasmādyathākāmyaprāptāvucyate vikalpa evāsāṃ bhavitumarhati na samuccayaḥ

GSP33brssgo3u:5262: pūrvapakṣe yathecchamanuṣṭhānamityaniyamaḥ siddhānte vikalpenānuṣṭhānamiti niyama iti phalabhedaḥ tatrāniyamaṃ sādhayati-tatra sthitatvādityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:5263: ekapuroḍāśaphalatvādyathā vrīhiyavayorvikalpastathā vikalpaniyama evāsāṃ vidyānāṃ nyāyyaḥ, tulyaphalatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:5264: naca phalabhūyastvārthinaḥ kāmyakarmasamuccayo 'pi dṛṣṭa iti vācyam,
GSP33brssgo3u:5269: yasya puṃsaḥ, addhā īśvaro 'hamiti sākṣātkāraḥ syādvicikitsā ca nāsti ahamīśvaro na veti tasyaiveśvaraprāptirityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:5270: jīvanneva bhāvanayā devatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtya dehapātottarakālaṃ devānprāpnotīti śrutyantarārthaḥ

GSP33brssgo3u:6648: garbhasya eva ca vāmadevaḥ pratipede brahmabhāvamiti vadantī janmāntarasaṃcitātsādhanājjanmāntare vidyotpattiṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:6650: samṛtāvapi - 'aprāpya yogasaṃsiddhiṃ kāṃ gatiṃ kṛṣṇa gacchati' (gī. 6.36)
GSP33brssgo3u:6651: ityarjunena pṛṣṭo bhagavānvāsudevaḥ 'nahi kalyāṇakṛtkaściddurgatiṃ tāta gacchati' (gī. 6.40) ityuktvā punastasya puṇyalokaprāptiṃ sādhukule saṃbūtiṃ cābhidhāyānantaram 'tatra taṃ buddhisaṃyogaṃ labhate
GSP33brssgo3u:6656: aihikamapi saṃnyāsādibālyāntaṃ sādhanajātamuktvā tatsādhyavidyājanma vicāryata iti saṃgatiṃ vadan sādhanasya dvidhā
GSP33brssgo3u:6661: śuddhidvārā yajñādibhiḥ śravaṇādiṣu sākṣādvidyāhetuṣu ghaṭiteṣu vidyāvilambo na yuktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6662: dṛśyate ca vilambaḥ ataḥ śravaṇādervidyāhetutvamasiddhamiti pūrvapakṣe phalam /
GSP33brssgo3u:6663: pratibandhakavaśādvilambe 'pi hetutvasiddhiriti siddhānte phalaṃ matvā citrādivadaniyataphalaṃ śravaṇādikamiti siddhāntayati-evamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6664: nanu prārabdhakarmaviśeṣeṇa śravaṇādiphalapratibandhaḥ kimiti kriyate śravaṇādinaiva karmavipākapratibandhaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-upasthitavipākatvaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6666: tena śravaṇādikameva kimiti na vipacyante, tatrāha-yāni ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6670: tathāpi karmaṇaiva śravaṇādipratibandho na vaiparītyamityatra ko
GSP33brssgo3u:6683: yathā mumukṣorvidyāsādhanāvalambinaḥ sādhanavīryaviśeṣādvidyalakṣaṇe phala aihikāmuṣmikaphalatvakṛto viśeṣapratiniyamo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6686: na khalu muktiphale kaścidevaṃbhūto viśeṣapratiniyama āśaṅkitavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6692: purastāt' (muṇḍa. 2.2.11) 'idaṃ sarvaṃ yadayamātmā' (bṛ. 2.4.6) 'sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātmājaro 'maro 'mṛto 'bhayo brahma' (bṛ. 4.4.25) 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet' (bṛ. 4.5.15) ityādiśrutibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6693: apica vidyāsādhanaṃ svavīryaviśeṣāsvaphala eva vidyāyāṃ kañcidatiśayamāsañjayenna vidyāphale muktau /
GSP33brssgo3u:6695: naca tasyāmapyutkarṣanikarṣātmako 'tiśaya upapadyate nikṛṣṭāyā vidyātvābhāvādutkṛṣṭaiva hi vidyā bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:6700: saguṇāsu tu vidyāsu - 'manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīraḥ' (chā. 3.14.2) ityādyāsu guṇāvāpodvāpavaśādbhedopapattau satyāmupapadyate yathāsvaṃ phalabhedaniyamaḥ karmaphalavat /
GSP33brssgo3u:6701: tathāca liṅgadarśanam - 'taṃ yathā yathopāsate tadeva bhavati' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6703: tathāca smṛtiḥ - 'nahi gatiradhikāsti kasyacitsati hi guṇe
GSP33brssgo3u:6707: asati prārabdhakarmapratibandhe śravaṇādinehaiva vidyodayaḥ yajñādibhiḥ saṃcitapāpapratibandhasya nirastatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:6708: sati tu bhogena tannirāsādamutreti vidyāyā aihikāmuṣmikatvaviśeṣaniyama uktastadvatphale 'pi mokṣe kaścidutkarṣādiviśeṣaḥ syādityata āha-evaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:6711: tasyāṃ vidyāvadviśeṣaniyamo 'sti na veti phalasyobhayathāsaṃbhavātsaṃśaye pūrvapakṣamāha-yatheti
GSP33brssgo3u:6712: muktiḥ saviśeṣā, phalatvādvidyāvadataḥ karmasādhyā muktiriti phalam /
GSP33brssgo3u:6714: kiñca śravaṇāditāratamyādvidyāyāṃ kañcidatiśayamaṅgīkṛtya vidyālabhyamuktau nātiśaya ityāha-apica vidyāsādhanamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6717: vidyayābhivyaktatvena brahmānanda eva mukhyaphalamabhivyaktiravidyānivṛttirānandasvarūpasphūrtipratibandhakābhāvatayā vidyayā sādhyate sā cānirvācyeti na dvaitāpattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6728: kathaṃ tarhi pūrvādhikaraṇe vidyāyā viśeṣa uktaḥ, tatrāha-tasmāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:6729: satyāmapi sāmagryāṃ jñāne vilamba ukto na tāratamyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6730: tarhi satyapi jñāne muktau vilambaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-natviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6732: tamonivṛttivilambādarśanātsati jñāne nājñānanivṛttau vilamba iti bhāvaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:6733: kiñca karmaṇāmupāsanānāṃ ca guṇabhedena tāratamyātphalatāratamyaṃ yuktam
GSP33brssgo3u:6739: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatkṛtau śārīrakavyākhyāyā bhāṣyaratnaprabhāṭīkāyāṃ tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //4//
